reviews.review_title: Bay trying to outdo, after being outdone
reviews.content: As Transformers got ridiculous, Bay became pinned as the big CGI Action flick Guy- Then as Fast & Furious raised the bar with its action scenes grossing over $300M and Hobbes & Shaw going bananas with Tanks, Submarines and pulling down Helicopters- and Mission Impossible going big on Action extreme- MBay has to have felt left behind and outdone. Now, on the NetFlix platform, Bay returns to regain his title of the explosion mayhem king-Taking the recipe transparently from Fast & Furious guys, we see a loose team thrown together to structure the crazy CGI effects, and add quip humor, in a movie form made to stream. You find yourself thinking what next. It's more like a ride than a movie. Story? Who cares- it's not about that. If you like tense situations involving explosions and seeing impossible things blow up, fall, and explode- all to pop rock beats. You will love this. If your looking for plots, story development, character insight, or dramatic buildup- Forget it. What is new is the adaptation of intense, cuss and testosterone fueled action movie being streamable first on Netflix. I like it as a male at 40- entertaining- but to see again for the characters, plot or chemistry? Probably not.

I grew up watching and loving Michael Bay films. This isn't anywhere near the caliber of his better movies. I love action films and this was straight up boring and unoriginal. I think they banked on Ryan Reynolds being able to make the movie funny and interesting but that never happened. Michael Bay's strength lies in the beautiful images he captures but he's lost his touch for making something truly good. Such a snooze fest. Skip it.

I felt dizzy watching this, cut here cut to there without getting any bearings or trying to figure out where its going. 1000million camera angles that just mess with the flow.
good god this is bad. even ryan reynolds couldnt save it
I loved it for what is it! A great action movie!If you are into action movies, this is one one the best this year!

I've been a Michael Bay fan since the 90s. He has given several classic movies but lately his movies were not up to par. 6 UNdERGROUND changed this fact and brought Michael Bay back to the best. Ryan Reynolds and the entire cast have done a superb job.
For the rest, you'll have to watch the movie yourself ;)
1 star only for the crew/hardwork/time and money spent to make the movie.

Ahh, it's so refreshing to watch a movie giving us new heroes. Not to believe in, not to inspire us to our own new heroics. Just to entertain without shoving any star-spangled-banner-waving down our throats."6 underground" is mostly a movie for those enchanted by the skill of special effect magicians, rather than high level scriptwriters. Ryan Reynolds delivers yet another lead character with the humor of a bachelor party. And yes, there are similarities with "Deadpool". At times, the twisted details are carrying the leading role
alongside some oh so spot-on footage. This movie doesn't want you to take it seriosly. It wants you to sit up straight, or you will miss something. You will sit up straight, so you don't miss anything.
So you definitely need to go into this movie with the mentality of, "this is an action movie". It's a fun thrilling movie, and keeps it interesting the whole time.

James Bond and Seal Team 6 wrapped into one action flick! Create cast, non-stop action, lots of gratuitous violence, excellent cinematography. Along with a plot story about regime change. Michael Bay has done it again.

reviews.review_title: I know what it's supposed to be... but it's still not that fun or that good.
reviews.content: Ok, yes it's supposed to be another mindless Michael Bay spectacle but even in that context it's pretty bad. Sure there are explosions but a lot of the action scenes (stunts, but especially fighting scenes) are just not good due to questionable editing, mediocre special effects, or unconvincing performances from the actors/stuntmen. I can usually appreciate a fun, stupid Bay for what it is but this didn't even manage to entertain me. Hard pass.
Nonsense. Every single aspect of the movie. Even if you like a action movies... Such a garbage.

reviews.review_title: Even for Bay this is bad
reviews.content: God.... I just.... Did I actually watch this or did I somehow slip into Michael Bay's mind and witness a dream of his?The action was just so incredibly generic, the constant car flips and explosions, the parkour chase scenes, the shooting of gormless rent a thugs, the inevitable survival of our team of 'heroes'. The car chase at the start through Florence somehow felt Transformers like, in the way that the cars went flying through the air. In addition to the generic car chase sequences, the gun fights felt like something I'd scene a million times before, as did the (limited) hand to hand combat scenes. None of the action really hit the spot for me on this one, and I found myself experience a constant level of boredom throughout.The plot was all a bit bizarre, and to be honest I'm not entirely sure what was going on with the non-linear story telling in the first act. It was all far too confusing and wholly unnecessary, adding nothing to the picture. I think Bay was attempting to add a semblance of high brow to this generic and run of the mill film. I'm not really sure why any of the characters decided to fake their deaths and turn to a life of magnanimous mercenary work, but I'm not entirely sure I cared.Speaking of the characters, I really was not emotionally connected to any of them. They were about as two dimensional as film characters come, and I found myself not caring at all about their fates.6 Underground also displayed some of Michael Bay's 'humour'... which much like the action just didn't hit the mark for me. Even Ryan Reynolds couldn't save the godawful script, and I'm really none the wiser at to why he signed on for this. Surely Deadpool has lined his pockets enough that he doesn't have to bother with films like this?A lacklustre and derivative attempt at an action thriller which falls flat on so many notes. It isn't even funny how bad it is... it's just bad.
Never ending action film.people who like fast pace action film will love it.strongly recommended.
I loved the movie, lots of action. Fun entertainment!

It is such a pity all these money were spent on such a bed movie. The cast is great and, with a proper director, it could've been a great movie.
The plot is chaotic and makes no sense. Why would you go to all that trouble killing a bad guy when you could've done it at the opera? Simple answer: so you won't have to finish the movie in 15 minutes.
People are always going to hate on stuff one way or another. This is a face paced, at points gruesome, entertaining action movie. Sit back and relax for 2 plus hours and enjoy it!

As soon as I heard the slow motion scenes I knew Michael Bay had directed this. The story seemed all over the place and the direction of the story was lost. Too many cut backs and talking about there plan.The bit that got lost was the scene towards the end on the yacht. Went day to night to day. Somehow days had gone past.Pretty much a standard action film with a weak story line and with a confusing bunch of characters.

What did I just watch. That was a waste of time and I'm annoyed at myself for choosing to watch this movie instead of anything else. Let's put in a long car chase and signature Michael Bay explosions everywhere, this does not make a watchable movie.

reviews.review_title: Thank you Netflixs its the kind of movie I want MORE MORE MORE
reviews.content:
Nonstop action for the braindead and how a movie should be plus I hate all these negative reviewers that seem to be expecting something completely different ...
6 Underground is easily worth 10 stars just to defend it from negative reviews with 4 stars considering it must of cost a fortune to make and plus it seems to go on for ever and someone said it was a mess but it was so easy to follow if you paid attention on what was going on

reviews.review_title: Pretty much exactly what you would expect.
reviews.content: I'm not going to dive deep into this, I will say that if you enjoy Bay films you should enjoy this one. To sum it up it is violently entertaining if poorly, poorly edited.

It's worth the watch for the special effects alone. Beautiful locations and good old fashioned story. The comedy is the best though. I love that Netflix has joined the ranks of the studios with their star power. Love that I don't have to pay a bazillion dollars to see great movies also!
If you like Ryan Reynolds and lots of violence, you will enjoy this movie.

If I were selling it I would say it's is a next gen A-Team style of movie. Most of the reviews on here are from self important wannabe film critics that don't like the fact that Michael Bays name is on it. I liked the story line it's about redemption but with that Ryan Reynolds spin. The action scenes were done well and tend to add to the story instead of distract you from it.

reviews.review_title: Classic Michael Bay But Wayyy Better.
reviews.content:
Netflix did it guys. It conquered every genre of movies out there.
One of the Best Action Movies out there.
Typical Action in that sense... you sit back, keep all logics aside and your brain enjoys all the blasts and guns and parkour.
The Whole 2 hours is action-packed, with a nice plot. So If you have some folks coming over and some pizza. One of the best movies to watch.TOP TIER MICHAEL BAY CERTIFIED.

reviews.review_title: What a total waste of time
reviews.content: Please please avoid this movie. This is not a movie. It is sample video for car stunts.

Movie has little to no plot and it does a terrible job introducing any of the characters to the point where you do not care what happens to them or whether they accomplish what they want to or not. Movie is somewhat entertaining when it is fast paced and filled with explosions and car chases but when it slows down and has to rely on plot and dialogue you realize how bad it is. Feels at least 30 minutes too long.
One of the best car chases on screen, in recent years.

reviews.review_title: Fun, entertaining, over-the-top action, awesome visuals and Ryan Reynolds
reviews.content: Do you expect high intelligence dialogue, deep characters or complex plot from a Michael Bay movie? If yes, you're in a wrong place. If not, buckle up and enjoy the ride!6 Underground is adrenaline-packed action flick that reminds a lot of Mission Impossible -movies, with the slight difference that this is more fun and somewhat gory presentation. Not so serious stuff here.The movie opens with a 20+ minute car chase around beautiful Venice, that nicely presents the main characters to us. Fast cars, funny details (A baby! A dog! David!), exhilarating stunts and exploding objects. Great opening!After that, the plot is basically this: a team of "ghosts" are trying to stop a mass-murdering dictator in a made up country of Turgistan. Lot's of action follows in a similarly great, real locations around the world.The characters are somewhat memorable, each one has a place to shine and some good scenes together. Ryan Reynolds plays Ryan Reynolds, and he is good at it :)What strikes me most is how gorgeous the movie looks in 4K. This would have gone really well in theaters too, but oh well. The colors are vibrant, details pop out and camera-angles are interesting. It just looks soo good. Thanks for Michael Bay for that too.The budget for this movie was 150 million, and it shows. But I bet most of the money comes from sponsors, there is SO MUCH of product placement here, not only showing the logos, and objects, but also in dialogue: "A BMW is following us!" or "You just had to go with Ferrari?" If you'd start a drinking game with product placement spotting, you'd be wasted after the opening scene.But overall everything plays out really well. Fun movie, looking forward for a sequel!

Typical Bay movie, with tons of explosions, choppy scenes, clichés and comic book level vilain. The story is bad, really bad, riddled with plot holes like swiss cheese. But... we don't know Bay for his airtight plots, no sir, we go for the action. And the action is there to make up for the flaws.Biggest downside however was that in the end, it felt like I was watching a (decent) fast & furious ripoff with all the lollygagging and nonsense about "family", but unfortunately without the actual star power to keep you glued to the screen. The sequel had better have The Rock in it!

reviews.review_title: I would say it as full blown action movie
reviews.content: You can see and feel the hard work, action arrangements done by the team. It's hell lot of work. Although nothing much new stuff as lot of action movies has shown something similar, but still full of action. It's a good time pass.No slow scenes or only dialogues exchanges scene. Pace is fast in the movie.

reviews.review_title: A Great movies.... that wont be understood by millenials
reviews.content:
M.Bay. doing it again.
average story line good acting and lots of action and explosions.
if you can get by the below par editing.... and lower your expectations. you will enjoy this6.1

As a kid did you push cars along carpet making gun and bomb sounds?
What's that you say, you still do?
Oh your going to love most of this 2 hours!
But then you go straight to bed, don't forget to wash your teeth

ALL THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS ARE BY BY NEW ACCOUNTS SET UP BY D***EY..AND SOME OTHERS >>>just to sabotage NETFLIX.... i have seen 500 of them in ONLY NEGATIVE REVIEWS that is 1 or below 3...ON ACCOUNTS SETUP UP 1-2-3 DAYS AGO........perfect plan by d**ney A**le and all other new streaming networks *TO DETHRONE THE KING*.....>>AND NOW THEY ARE TRYING TO REVIEW NEGATIVELY ON ALL OF MY POSTS.... GET A LIFE GUYS......6 underground was not groundbreaking but deserves 7-8....and is happening to all NETFLIX original Ratings...would like you folk to check........keep up the propaganda.......Netflix needs to counter it....it happened with WATCHMEN......it is happening here......GOOD CONTENT SABOTAGED BY PAID GUYS.....

Honestly can't believe Ryan Reynolds would take on such a piece of garbage. This harks back to the bad old days of mindless propaganda-like 'Murica kicks brown ass and saves the world movies. A group of medium-to-no combat experienced 'ghosts' take on hundreds of bad guys who repeatedly miss at close range. Bad guy cars launch into the air at random. But at least we can all pat ourselves on the back because these mavericks fight for democracy with the best intentions. All copies should be burnt.

I gave it a 10 to balance all the ridiculous wanna-be film critics talking about a tired story line.Really? You're watching a Michael Bay film for character arc?It's fast, it's fun. The action is diverse. The banter is funny. What else do you want from an action flick.I'd like to see a part two.

The editing, story and script are just painful. Nothing makes sense. You feel the movie is a reel made by a kid who just got a drone and is playing with it taking shoots of cities. The story doesn't make any sense... Hlwho is letting Michael Bay making movies? How come he get to work with good actors like R. Raynolds and M. Laurent? Hope this awfulness gets buried deep. And please Netflix.... Bring some quality

Like watching a bad commercial. A really long, bad, boring, poorly written, pointless, commercial.
Why bother making this film? Time is better spent watching paint dry.
Absolutely not a masterpiece. Bollywood action and show off. However, i wonder how Dubai security guard called 911 when they dont have 911 and have something else. It is watchable.
The usual Bay style editing and quick shots, but the characters and humor shine through. Over the top action and some good humor throughout.

reviews.review_title: Ryan Reynolds should forget this movie not green lantern
reviews.content: Honestly, anyone that knows me knows I'm the biggest RR fan and he should try to forget this movie rather than green lantern. I couldn't believe I suffered through this for 2 hours while awaiting the sweet release of death when the end credits started scrolling on my tv. We could've done without this in our lifetime but I guess money rules everything around us (C.R.E.A.M.).

A must see movie but not for the faint hearted.Director Micheal Bay did what he always does best entertain his audiance great action sequences great visual effects and the use of his close up camera work, he really does magic with the cameras the use of colour in the movie makes it even more attractive to watch this was really a entertaining movie,well done to him and his team.

"6 Underground" is the most Michael Bay'ish' film ever. Flying cars, Guns, Explosions; this is Bay's tempestuous dreams coming true. Had he cared the same for other aspects; the outcome would have been utterly different.
Michael Bay is one of those directors, whose work is either admired or denounced amongst viewers.
He has this offbeat style in direction wherein excluding Action, everything else is put to tributary position.This one is no exception.The deluge of enthralling action pieces & fanciful shots; this bears strong resemblance to his previous outings with Transformers.
Sumptuous sets, opulent locations, hot women.
All of being part of Bay's Trademark execution.All show, no substance...Generic storyline, which no one really cares for!
One dimensional antagonist who's just there to fill up the gaps.
Defunct characterization for the leads,
hence I couldn't care less for any of them!
A disjointed screenplay seemed to be unnecessarily stretched quite a bit.
Ghastly editing rubbing salt to an already inflicted wound.In brief, This was a woeful attempt at Action-Comedy;
A highly forgettable affair.

reviews.review_title: Good action movie not to be taken seriously
reviews.content:
This could have been so much better.
If it wasnt so exagerated, there were some good ideas, some good jokes, some good quotes...
But the car chases are so long and exagerated, the parkour(why???), the gunfights (why the good guys always have to fight 100men??, the bad guys always have an army with them??).
IMO.. a simpler movie would have been better.
The parkour guy has any part in the film? What does he do the whole time?

I won't say much other than thanks for the 2 hours of great entertainment, great acting. been a long time since I laughed, even if it was only a few times I did make me laugh for a few min after, and even small hint reference jokes, nice, just what I needed after a sh.. week. Thanks for setting up for a good weekend!

reviews.review_title: I am a bit disappointed. It wasn't bad,but wasn't good either
reviews.content: I didn't like the camerawork. In 2019 any movies that have shaky cameras are LOL. It's not artsy, it's just really stupid... After 30 minutes your eyes start to hurt. Camerawork itself was ok, but not perfect either.Fun: Movie was attempting fun dialogs once in a while,but they weren't always successful.Plot: That's the biggest drawback and the reason of the majority of the score. It was on the boringish side and the story wasn't straightforward, It felt too complex yet not explained. It took 30 minutes to realize who is who and why they are where they are. It works for thrillers,but this is not it and it just didn't work. Because of it, it lost some valuable time to get to know the actors. I didn't like anyone, I didn't care about anyone. If most of them died, I wouldn't care and that's not good for a movie.Action: There was a good amount of it,but it wasn't sequenced well or shot well either so it felt not enough at times.Acting: Good by some and just average by some "team members".If you like action movies, It's a nice flick to watch, as long as you don't expect too much. I rated Hubs and Shaw really law for a ton of action,but beyond horrible directing with 100s of flaws. This one also had a ton of flaws(. too many,but bullets ricocheting off cars is one),but was less and more real world gadgets.5.7/10

I'll be the first to say, I don't have a hatred for Michael Bay like many do. He's made some very entertaining and stylish movies that are fun to watch. 6 Underground was not one of them. The narrative was all over the place, jumping back and forth between over the top action scenes that seemed to have no bearing or sense of importance. Sure, there were some cool shots and Bay did assemble a fun, cast but that's where it ends. The potential was there. The execution was simply missing and you have to wonder if Netflix is regretting giving Bay such a huge budget to work with.

No, I was not expecting Scorsese or Tarantino, I was ready for a brainless piece of action, Michael Bay style, but man this is just boring.Even the opening chase was boring. Again - I was not expecting Shakespiere or complicated Nolan-style twists. Quite contrary actually - I'm a motorcycle racer and an extreme sports lover. But this is so booooooh-ring. I mean how can you spoil a 20 minute sportcar chase though an old European city with explosions and all? Turns out you can. I have to go rewatch Ronin right now, the lengendary scene with Robert DeNiro and Jean Reno just to shake this off and get back in shape.The dialogs are shallow, the story is primitive, the actors are (mostly) doing a bad job. Even Ryan Renolds doesn't save the show.Pity

I get it, Hollywood doesn't know squat about the real world but are we supposed to believe Seven had a military shave profile for that lame attempt at a goatee? Keep in mind that all goatees are weak but no service member would have permission for such boo-boo. Solid movie otherwise. I look forward to a sequel even if Ryan is in it again.
Please let us have the option to give 0 🌟 This movie is one of the worst ive seen in my life.

Two big stars, check. Lots of action, check. Great cinematography, check. Storyline & plot.... totally missing. Two big stars, check. Lots of action, check. Great cinematography, check. Storyline & plot.... totally missing.
Fun over the top action as it should be! Feels like old Michael Bay playing with new toys.

reviews.review_title: Very entertaining and quite a different angle into action lenses!
reviews.content:
A new action hit is born and we enjoyed every bit of it.
The story is not an unusual one but the action and the chemistry between actors keeps you up interested all the way through the movie.I will definitely watch the second one.

reviews.review_title: ONE OF THE BEST ACTION MOVIE OF THE YEAR
reviews.content: Somehow Michael Bay knows what going on around the globe. But this flick is breathtaking! The details is perfect... na'am haja khair. You can say Deadpool, Fast furious, Hitman bodyguard and Mission Impossible blend into one delicious movie. You better don't miss it! For people of Turkey and my fellowship moslems everywhere I assume Turgistan is not Turkey but East Turkistan 1949. Well known as Xinjiang Uighur right now in 2019. I think you are knows what going on at there and Bay just pointed out. I wonder if One, Two, Three, Four, Five and Seven would please have one operation in the south east asia. Would you please saving my beloved country from overun by communis and corrupt dictator... Let them see the "No One"

reviews.review_title: Pointless, and a real mess of a film
reviews.content: The 6 underground should be buried 6 foot underground. This action film is a pretty boring, over produced mess. The colour palate makes it looks more like a MTV pop video. The story, humm.

reviews.review_title: Speechless at how bad it is
reviews.content: It is cringe worthy bad. Unfortunately some people got paid lots of money to make this. Thankfully netflix has The Office you can put on after and actually enjoy.

The 1's and 2's are absolutely right.It is an "incoherent mess", and yes it's an "awful story and terrible screenplay". "storyline & plot.... totally missing".But the action scenes... You have never seen such spectacular action scenes. Okay, maybe you have seen one... or two in a movie. This entire movie is series of spectacular actions scenes one after another, with hardly a breather in between.Michael Bay demonstrated that he has absolute mastery over this part of movie making. This was a showcase for his talent.And the production values... well, money was no object. Incredibly rich and exquisitely detailed sets from beginning to end. Dozens of exotic and beautiful locations. The quality of the CGI was unmatched. It looked real. I couldn't tell it was CGI from looking at it, but it was, because it had to be.It was a BORING movie, but I have never seen anything like it... A feast for the eyes. I may watch it again, after I rest. I gave it a ten for being the best at what it did... Action.
What a pile of crap. The first 20mins is a car chase with three different music tracks. The banter was the last straw. Cheesy one liners.
Just no.Whoever signed this off with Netflix should be torn apart in a painfully jump-cut, incoherent car crash. Just like the rest of this pile of trash movie.It's not even enjoyable trash.

Highly recommended action movie to watch and have a great fun time!Breathtaking action sequences with great direction by mastermind Michael Bay and great performance by cast and cutting edge visual effects.This is a full testosterone stuff!!Do not miss that!

I watched the first half hour and had to quit. The joking, the tough chicks, the no concern for collateral. This movie is made for non thinkers. Its like listening to rap when your used to classical rock. If your a true movie buff don't waste your time.
Watched it in one breath. Would have given 10 stars, but there is nothing original in it whatsoever. You seen pieces of it over the years. So 2 stars down.

reviews.review_title: Ryan Reynolds and Netflix you can't go wrong
reviews.content: Not sure why this movie is getting bagged out so much. What did you expect it's a Netflix movie with Ryan Reynolds just enjoy it for what it is. It's deadpool meets fast and the furious type of combo. I didn't pay $15-20 to go watch it at the cinema it's a Netflix movie soon as people realize this and watch it with that mindset and don't have big standards of this movie prior you might actually enjoy it.

After reading the many other reviews, I feel vindicated for leaving the movie to another room at the end of the first action scene. I was told it got better, I'm not buying it. What I saw was an excess of foul language, gratuitous bloody violence, a very poor attempt at (failed) humor, impossible action sequences plagued by awful slow mo and ridiculous explosions, and no character or plot development to care. It was pathetically rudimentary and formulaic. Ryan Reynolds should stick to what he does best- boy next door rom-com. And this movie should go directly in the trash. Most people are more intelligently evolved than this barbaric garbage.PS. Parkour. Really?

reviews.review_title: Good flashy movie with rubbish music
reviews.content: It's got a B-movie story with a flashy cast doing preposterous action in cool cars. Good. Michael Bay let's the editors pick up the slack and try and fix it in the edit. The music is below par as it's music for old people. The Fast franchise picks cool new tunes not boring rock, get with it Bay. Apart from that solid action movie.

Money can't buy you a good movie, not even $150 000 000.
This is awful, I really wanted to like it but could only manage half the movie.
What an utter waste of money and energy. I am really easy to please and this is a disjointed steaming pile of crap

Welcome back Michael Bay! Oh how I've missed his signature, classic, witty, over the top action power house's.Possibly one of the best action opening scenes ever. The first 20 minutes of the movie is utterly insane, high adrenaline and pure Action movie porn. From the opening, until 19 minutes in, you can barely catch your breathe.6 Underground really is classic Michael Bay. You've got the action, the thrills, the explosions, over the top CGI, great scenery and dark humour.Whilst the action does die down after an extremely fast paced opening scene, which felt a little like it had peaked too early, how can you make the rest of the movie match up to that?!Although a little silly and unbelievable at times, there's so much that made this a great action flick. Breathtaking stunts and cinematography, oh and Ryan Reynolds, makes this a highly enjoyable 2 hours.

This movie goes back and forth, and from one side to the next. I'm unsure if they knew what they wanted editing it like they did. Also, what's with the unnecessary sex scenes? They add literally nothing to the story. I'm convinced Michael Bay is just sexually frustrated.Other than the story, the editing and the unnecessary sex... the action scenes are sometimes very good. But the car scene in the beginning of the movie is at the edge of too much, I almost had a seizure halfway through.I just wish they had focused on the main story instead of trying to force more things into it than it needed. If they had just skipped most of the first 2/3 of the movie, and just focused on the big heist, then it would've been better.

What's with the negative reviews, haven't watched a good movie in this genre for a while. It's a simple plot with over the top details, with a touch of comedic scenes to make it less boring. That's what action movies should be. It's fun and entertaining.

reviews.review_title: It's a Michael Bay Movie, not Shakespeare
reviews.content:
Before watching, I wanted to read some reviews. Some were quite funny. People complaining about senseless violence, explosions, excess blood.
It's a Michael Bay Movie. It's like watching a John Hughes movie, and being upset by young actors and family themes. Or watching Deadpool, and being upset about the swearing.
You pretty much know what you're going to get before even watching it.
It wasn't a bad movie, had it moments. The actors had some good on screen chemistry, Ryan Reynolds was harnessing his inner Deadpool, too.
It's good for what the movie is. A random shoot-em up action movie.
Nothing more, nothing less.

reviews.review_title: Not the best of the year, yet, very entertaining
reviews.content: I enjoyed the pace and some elements of the storyline, but I did not like the start, I'd prefer a more straightforward and linear storytelling, but after the introduction the movie really takes off, funny, witty and explosive. Hoping for a part 2

reviews.review_title: Action, comedy, car chase and Ryan Reynolds what's not to love
reviews.content: If you like car chase and action then you will enjoy. It has action for the boys and Ryan for the girls as well as Ben Hardy who played Peter Beale showing his brilliant acting skills.

reviews.review_title: No brain needed - just have fun
reviews.content: Just for fun, good effects, scenes for laughing. Enjoy

reviews.review_title: This is my first movie review.....
reviews.content:
I just watched a 2 hour movie where I still have no idea what the plot was. It was exhausting and never ending. I still don't understand what the first "fight scene" in Florence was all about- all I remember is Ryan Reynolds holding someone's eyeball to open a phone with millions of extra bad guys chasing after them....
More questions: what is the back story to number 5? She was a "doctor performing surgery in the car" with blood intermittently splattering all over her face and that was it. She had another role walking around in a pink dress- and then was locked in the closet on the yacht then somehow made it onto the helicopter...The best part of this movie was the song from Muse in the beginning.

reviews.review_title: Michael Bay and Ryan Reynolds Fun!
reviews.content: The movie is just fun. From Reynolds' personality and wit to unrelenting action, its just fun. A great movie to turn your brain off and ignore the world for 2 hours If you are looking for deep and spiritual, this isnt it.

6 underground is just another bad bay film full of buyasisms,story in this film is really atrocisious and so over the top that in end becomes annoying as hell,even ryan reynolds who is usually funny guy ,in here he is so lazy writen that none of his jokes worked,i think that bay should consider to stop making films since almost every one exept pain and gain at least for me are filled with bad quality and lazy in basicly evreything else
Bay... back in the Simpson/Bruckheimer era you were excellent. But this... WHAT HAPPENED???It's an incoherent and noisy mess.
If you like Action this is the movie for you.The entire movie was filled with action. A different kind of movie than most but a good one worth watching!

reviews.review_title: Ridiculous yes, but entertaining still yes
reviews.content: It's a funny feel good film quite predictable but if your here for a plot twister you're already off on the wrong foot. It's all about action and entertainment value and Michael Bay did what he does best, entertain. Great film tons of action and definitely would pay to see it in theaters.

Action packed start to finish. Great special effects. Not a big fan of Ryan Reynolds but was pleasantly surprised I liked him in this role. Didn't mine his humor. Don't understand low reviews but I think the movie will have you hooked right out the gate.

The only thing higher than the innocent body count in this film is the number of brain cells you'll lose watching it. A turd with a firework stuck in it and shot with lots of lens flare.I've never found a film so offensively stupid that I felt the need to warn others not to waste 2+ hours of your life. I won't go over the reasons this is terrible, just read the other negative reviews as they're all accurate. Not even Ryan Reynolds can save this mess.

Painfully stupid and absurd
Politically incorrect at so many levels even to the point of being offending
Staging a coup casually what the hell..
The actions and visuals are good but again someobody should work on the storyline

The story is so poor. Turned off for majority of it. Weak characters. What is the point of this film? It jumped from scene to scene? Never explained the actual main point?Acting very poor. Trying to use the same Deadpool feel to pull it through. Boring and terrible.

Action . Horrible.This was the worst waste of time in 2019.
Whatever was spent on making it was all blithering action .
People commenting there were explosions and cut scenes, what did you even expect from a michael bay movie

reviews.review_title: Michael Bay needs to stop making movies
reviews.content: 45 minutes in and I tired of cringing.Explosions, blood, guts and gore does not make a movie.Stop it right now

It's an awful stitched together mess. Horrible dialogue and atrocious camera work makes for one of the worst movies of 2019. To be fair some of the action sequences are pretty badass but that's it. It's that bad.

This is such a strange movie. I didn't realize it was produced by Michael Bay when I watched it, but that makes some sense. By far the best part of this film is the action scenes and cinematography along with some beautiful settings. Those are done with superb style.I see the film is listed as an action and a comedy. I can't think of a single time I laughed or even smiled during the film. I had no idea it was supposed to have comedic elements.The acting is passable, dialogue terrible, and plot a jumbled mess.I don't hate that I watched it, but I never plan to watch it again.

It's action, it's fun, it's fast, it's exciting.
Cutting is a bit unusual, but it what gives the movie its nonstop motion.
It has a good story, good acting, amazing stunts. Don't expect some deep hidden twisted plot, it's not that kind of movie. If you're for entertainment - get a beer and watch the movie!
Anything you would expect from the most typical Micheal Bay movie, fun movie to not think about and just enjoy

reviews.review_title: Jerky with over the top fake action but fun if you ignore the impossibilities
reviews.content: It's stupid fun and you actually get to like the characters, but the jerkiness of the timeline and endless over the top Bayisms make it feel longer than it is. The actors do a decent job but the editing and the colourist work needs, well some workWritten to be a series

reviews.review_title: It gives you want you came for
reviews.content: Loved the action, driving, great friday night blockbuster. Not every great movie needs to be a mind bending storyline. Keep serving these up netflix!
Non stop action ..stunt fabulous I really enjoyed it and some dialogues are powerful

I can't think of a worse way to use $150,000,000. Hyped up and with a decent IMDB score, one would perhaps expect some entertainment value, but instead it's just a jumble of special FX and "jokes" falling flat on their faces. The special FX, which is where all the money most likely went, aren't even compelling - the scenes it seeks to create aren't interesting.It must be the most extreme example of a no attention span or mental effort required -movie so far (possibly... I try to avoid most of those), and no mental investment leaves no mental reward. Watching it was a blank, flat and meaningless "experience". Perhaps a postliterate society's idea of a fun movie?It gets 1 star for having colours and sound, even though those were kind of annoying.

A absolutly decent actionmovie with Ryan Reynolds where he plays a mortal Deadpool. It's fun, it's action and it's forgot 2 days later.I liked it and I will properly rewatch it again over the next couple of years.

reviews.review_title: michael bay to the max... but sloppy
reviews.content: More than anything, this movie was sloppy, in many ways. the action was mixed, some was awesome, some was shaky and... sloppy. the dialogue was sloppy. the story was sloppy. this is a poorly made movie with decent entertainment value (1 viewing, 4/7/2020)

reviews.review_title: Dollar for dollar the worst movie ever
reviews.content:
How dare some to compare this pathetic and atrocious director (Michael Bay) with Zack Snyder. I know, Snyder also cares about making a visually compelling movie. But other than that, there is just nothing else with Bay.This movie is so stupid that it makes the "Fast and Furious" saga feel like classes of quantum physics. But I'm not laughing.
This movie is dangerous. You can be dumb (I am too). But this is not that.
This movie purposely and proudly shouts how stupid it is. This movie tells us that being an idiot is liberating. This movie celebrates being stupid.
This movie is disgusting. I'm 99% sure Michael Bay is disgusting too.
The actors? Probably just wanted easy money. Morally questionable, but I can understand I guess.
But Michael Bay? He's a corrupt soul.PD: By the way, this movie is political too. But I guess right wingers won't protest the political messages in movies if they agree with them.

reviews.review_title: Worst movie i have seen in a while
reviews.content:
This movie is stupid on so many ways, it's almost funny. Almost. It's so badly written, looks like the script was made by a 12 year old D student. Nothing makes goddamn sense in this movie. It's just puke. And the shooting looks is worse, so much shaky cam and you don't really make sense of what is happening.
Don't watch this.
Solid movie and worth a watch the action scenes are pretty epic and the first 40 mins of the movie are cool.The movie is left open for more and I do hope they make more of these!!

Don't read all those reviews that are less than 8, this movie deserves at least that. The only thing that makes it less than 10 is that Ryan Reynolds uses some puns reminiscent of other movies or characters.
So a bored rich dude hires former military ops with special backgrounds to take down a corrupt dictator. The End
Great action! Great fun! Ryan Reynolds, exploding cars, slow motion and jokes! What else can you ask for?

I watched this film 2x in two days. It is excellent. A couple times it was a challenge to define the timeline, but my 2nd viewing helped with that!Dave Franco's photo is mix-matched in the stream view of the actors. Dave's photo is correct in the IMDb posting.I am curious as to how much Billy performed his own stunts. The lad is seriously gifted. Well, I actually may watch this film at least one more time!!!

The dialog seems to be written by someone that has never read ANYTHING. Insipid and trite comes to mind. Reynolds carried this on his back but...His back must be hurting from carrying all the loot he made on his big hits...If you're young and haven't really experienced anything outside your GTA video games; this is probably right up your alley...If you're over 25 and you like this; you need to examine your life a bit...The only good part was the "billionaire" moniker for Reynolds...:)

Reynolds joins up with 5 other specialists who go on deadly missions to rid the world of baddies and for this film, one very bad baddie indeed.Being a Michael Bay film, this is an endless series of frantically edited action pieces 'joined' together with a story written on the back of a matchbox. These scenes are slick to be sure, albeit the magnet scenes are daft, but it's almost impossible to work out what's going on amidst the explosions and general carnage - no car just crashes, they all somersault 10 times before exploding and crushing another 5 or 6 onlookers. The movement between black humour and serious message is uncomfortable, indeed Reynolds seems to be making a different Deadpool type movie.Liked the architecture a lot, but otherwise this is a facile, hollow exercise from a boy who likes playing with toys.

reviews.review_title: No plot, no morals, superficially enjoyable two hour advertisement
reviews.content: About twenty minutes in you realise this isn't the action packed intro; al la Bond. This IS the film. It's ok, it's fine, just leave your brain at the door as they say. To be more specific leave any kind of ability to appraise even the most basic human entertainment at the door. I love a dumb action film and, honestly, I'm not comparing this to Saving Private Ryan. Everyone is on good form including the director. It's just a bit vacuous, there. No one or their motivation to care about. There's a warning at the beginning about gratuitous product placement. It really didn't need it, at any pint I was expecting a meeting to take place involving a Dyson vacuum cleaner. Not terrible to look at but rather pointless.
You know what to expect. Lots of explosions and shooting. Myself and my missis enjoyed it.
Netflix are killing it! Top actors/actresses very funny and clever humour! Easy watching! Good story! All the haters need to chill out!
A lot better the second time watching it. Watched it twice in one week and the second time it makes a lot more sense. Action scenes are pretty dope to

6 Underground has a lot of problems, it's dumb, has weak CG, a terrible villiain and is all over the place, however it still manages to be a fun action movie that's stylish, funny and action packed. Ryan Reynolds gives an extremely charismatic and funny lead performance, Corey Hawkins is great and Ben Hardy, Adria Arjona, Mélanie Laurent and Manuel Garcia-Rulfo are all good. Michael Bay's direction is inconsistent but undoubtedly delivers some visceral and extremely enjoyable action sequences. The soundtrack is really good and the music by Lorne Balfe is good.

reviews.review_title: Awesome Dolby Atmos experience for home theaters
reviews.content:
Oh yeah Michael Bay delivers yet another eye candy galore for the action crowd!!!
This is smash mouth in your face R-rated action adrenaline popcorn flick and, I totally loved every second of this.
Not his best - but definitely in top 3, for me!
Don't expect Oscar worthy material except for the technical merits from the sound & visuals departments.
Afterwards we watched the new James Bond trailer... and the action just looks so lame compared to this MichaelBayhem extravaganza.So a big thank you Netflix for bringing Michael Bay to your platform. Had this movie come in theaters it would probably as usual been given a PG-13 rating, to make more $$$
And this movie deserves all the blood and gore blown up heads for any adult grown up teenager
Overall. Its great fun.
"I totally loved the THX logo fanfare used as a weapon "... yes it can literally blow things up in a Michael Bay movie!!!

This was the most depresive and sad hour and a half of my life... REALLY! I am sure even the 6 years old children were shocked from the stupidity and shallowness of this pathetic X.xAnd the humooor! The pathetic excuse for humor in the horrible summary of an neanderthal fun was more pathetic than your Pomerian dog's tiny excuse for reproduction....Seriously?!? What poor souls enjoy such HD diarrhea?!? WOW! Just play Call of Duty guys... it is more realistic!......

reviews.review_title: Bad boys and 13 hours on meth
reviews.content: This film restored a feeling mission complete. Bay knows how to assemble a team of heavy hitters male and female how can you not enjoy his content he's a master director for action.
I turned this off at 6 mins as I could not stand to watch any more.

reviews.review_title: The most stupid movie among all the most expensive ones. And the most expensive movie among the most stupid ones.
reviews.content:
Resume: the idea is good. But realization is childish.SPOILERS ahead.Pros:
Overall the underlying idea is great. Kill dictators with own resources, because international community sank in bureaucracy.Very beautiful shots: sunsets, helicopters, skyscrapers.Cons:
Realization of the idea is like the movie had been shot by 13 years old kid.All heroes have the same temper: they shout, they curse.Ridiculous scenes. CIA agent is awaiting the target in Rolls-Royse in the middle of the road. Yes, sure, all agents do that.Mistakes. In the beginning of the movie car crashed by its left side and lost left mirror. But in further shots we see that car has left mirror.Incomplete scenes. On the roof they moved by wire. Number 4 was behind them. And suddenly Number 4 said that bad guys cut the wire and he cannot follow. But we didn't see that bad guys cut the wire! Bad guys even didn't follow good guys.Stupid jokes. Joke about belt and stroking. What?! Yes, sure, this would work in real life.American narrow-minded thinking. They announce revolution under american song. Yes, sure, turgestanians will be motivated with this song.Stupid obstacles. On a yacht chip went our of a phone. What?! What the heck the phone is that chip can easily go out?!And there are a lot of similar mistakes and illogical stuff. E.g. CIA agent blinks while shooting. Really? What about special training?It would work if it had been a movie for teenagers like Transformers. But serious spy movie with R rating must be shot by more mature director.

Great cast, beautifully shot, some fantastic action sequences all marred by relentlessly sophomoric and often ridiculous dialogue masquerading as wit and a convoluted story arc that went from A to A. Could have been a gripping success with better pages. Epic wasted opportunity.
Better then Transformers. I'd say up there with the 1st Bad Boys and maybe The Rock.
Michael bay plus Ryan Reynolds from the writers of deadpool and zombieland. It's as simple as that. Over the top, farsical and all the better for it!
Bay will never understand that cool camera frames all the time, GTA violence and random chicks won't make a movie. I was absolutely bored, didn't care for single character.. just trash

Lots of action. Lots of blown up body parts. Cheesy quips. And nothing else. No purpose. No plausible relationships or motivation. No mystery in how it will end. Not my cup of tea. I give this film a 3 (bad) out of 10. {Mind-numbing Action}

The only issue I had was keeping up with the jumping back and forward. This wouldn't normally be a problem except i am loosing my hearing. So trying to concentrate on what was being said and the jumping around made it hard to concentrate. Once I grasped this though I thoroughly enjoyed it

First off...It's A Michael Bay Movie!!This is how you watch a Mike B movie:
1. Be in the mood for insane action.
2. Make popcorn
3. Settle into overstuffed movie-watching-chair
4. Don't overthink it
5. Enjoy the rideThis movie was everything I expected it to be and a little bit more (thank you Ryan). You've probably read the other reviews and have most likely have seen other MB movies, so the reviews shouldn't surprise you. They are all over the place, much like Micheal's edits and plot points.Adjust your criteria based on that, you have a solid 7. If you judge this movie based in the same criteria you would use to rate the cinematic milestones throughout movie history, it's not even a 1.I had a great time. Laughed my ass off and let loose with a few "holy s***s". Every thing I was in the mood for when I plopped my ass down on with a beer in one hand and the remote in the other. Yeah, I rewinded a few scenes. Where MB may miss critical plot details, he makes up for it in visuals. Take this movie for what it was meant to be and have a good time.

Considering at my writing this movie has roughly 6 stars on IMDB, I didn't expect too much from but was hoping it would be decent.Both my wife and I loved it! It definitely has Bay style (not always good, not always bad) and it was honestly very well done. I will watch this many times in the future and will likely buy it in 4K.The story is good. The acting is good. The effects are good. It's non-stop and keeps you going! It's on the gory side but not overly so. The humor is well placed and tastefully done.In all honesty, I haven't read any reviews but I don't understand why this isn't better rated. I think it was a hell of a good movie. The first 15 - 20 minutes sets the pace and really gives you a taste if what's to come. The action, including the first action sequence, are very well done and quite original, which isn't easy to do these days. They don't pull any punches in this movie.I could talk about it quite a bit. But this was just a hell of an action movie! I hope they make more!

Good grief...I thought at least it will be fun... oh dear.A scattered mess of terrible script, hammy acting, over the top SFX, mostly non-sesnse plot.It took way too long for any plot cohesion to take place. It was all over the place.Plus the Bay effect is oh so too apparent. It's like Bay dialled up to 11 but without anything good to balance it out.Finally, one of THE most annoying things was the utterly shameless in your face product placement throughout the film.Terrible, purely terrible.

The movie feels slightly disjointed with the cuts thrown in to explain back stories, but overall it was good. The cast played well together, it had some deep moments and some light hearted as well on top of the explosion fest Michael Bay is known for.If you're looking for anything deep or meaningful, remember this is directed by a man who can't go 1 minute without something exploding on camera and one of the biggest smartasses in the film industry.All in all it was a good film and allows you to get lost for a little bit

Have to say this was one of the best actions movies I have ever seen, in terms of action scenes, cinematography, visual effects! And the cast was in great harmony!!!!
Story wise it was good but not the best. A bit not connected. But I would love to see a sequel ..

It has some redeeming qualities. Ryan Reynolds doing his normal shtick (Deadpool, anyone?), and it has some entertaining action scenes, but the characters aren't properly developed, and the disjointed nature of the movie makes it tough to follow at times.I would call it disappointing, but not the worst thing you could watch on a Friday night. If I had paid $20 for it on Apple TV, I'd be pretty annoyed. As part of a Netflix subscription, it's okay.

So much fun to watch if you love action movies with bad a plot, bad acting and awesome action scenes. Great laughs and comic scenes because of the awesome Ryan Reynolds. Michael Bay literally broke Florence in the opening scene and it just kept going. I watched it twice in one weekend.
Can't wait for the sequel!

reviews.review_title: So bad, I made a point of opening an account on IMDB to review it
reviews.content: I've seen bad movies before just for the action. This is packed with action, but not worth it. Ryan Reynolds looks painfully uncomfortable in every scene, like he didn't want to be in any scene of this? The "plot line" (if you can call it that) is just a badly sewn up excuse to throw in crappy one liners and ridiculously nonsensical explosions out of nowhere.At least it was on Netflix and I did not have to pay a movie ticket for it.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful raw action for action lovers...
reviews.content: If you are an action lover and not much worried about logic, this is the one to watch..
Loved it this movie is up there actin car chases guns everything

reviews.review_title: who edited the opening car chase
reviews.content: Some of the worst editing i have ever seen on film. The green car scratched unscratched scratched unscratched, bullet holes, no bullet holes, bullet holes, no bullet holes, dents, no dents, dents, no dents. Spoilt what would have been an awesome opening sequence. On to the rest of the movie. Lets see what more terrible editing awaits .......

I enjoyed the action, comedy and dialogue. It is a movie that entertains and Michael Bay's massive action scenes don't disappoint. It was enjoyable to see Ryan Reynolds in a more serious role but he was still able to add in some comedy in to make you laugh without taking from the seriousness of the plot. The entire cast meshed well together and I look forward to a second film.

The first 20 minutes are incredible. Pay attention to the movie if you're not very bright you'll get lost. The cuts give you the backstory as to who the characters are the entire thing is just a Michael Bay action flick romp if you don't like that you won't like this. Reynolds is hilarious the rest of the cast is great And the entire thing leaves it self open to additional films

Going in, I wasn't aware that this is directed by Michael Bay (the director of the Transformers movies) but when the end credits rolled in, it made so much sense because if high speed car chases, exploding cars, military ops,fighter jets and guns don't scream Michael Bay, then I don't know what does.Michael Bay is known for making big budgeted,star studded action movies and this movie is not any different, except for maybe the quirky scenes of gore (holding an eyeball from it's optical nerve type), which was something new to be seen in his films. Despite all the bloody scenes and intense action, Ryan Reynolds' comedic timing keeps the movie light-hearted. I like to think of this movie as something not for the mind, but for the eyes. It's a visual treat but won't exercise your brain. In fact if you do choose to exercise it, you'd only find loopholes and unexplained logic. So, I'd avoid doing that.The plot of the movie is fairly simple, the good guys vs bad guys and honestly at this point I'd be sick of this scenario with the hero and his corny one liners and predictable endings, if not for the amazing visuals and fast paced action offered, which makes it entertaining to watch nonetheless.In all, it's an entertaining action flick brought to you by the master of explosions and with everyone's favorite Ryan Reynolds and though it may have disappointed critics, it's a fun movie to watch.P.S. If you could somehow drop the Autobots and Decepticons in this movie even out of context, I'd still believe it to be a Transformers movie because it literally has everything else in it!

reviews.review_title: A mess and an hour long commercial
reviews.content:
Michael bay's worst movie.
Litterally every scene is a blatant commercial.
Confusing.
Terible.
Don't waste ur time

Could have been a 5 or 6 without the terrible editing, storytelling and all around structure mistakes. Feels like an unfinished product. Story is meh, dialogues are bad, acting is ok but can't blame them really.Would not recommend

Transformers were bad, but enjoyable for what they were. I even hughely enjoyed The Island and Armageddon. Those movies had their flaws but also some consistency. 6 Underground however is a meager attempt to rip off all sorts of action genres in one movie. But it didn't capture a single effective element.What's left is a hash of incoherent dialogues, half finished fight scenes, incomprehensible car chases and a non existing plot carried by the least motivated actors I've seen in a while. The only enjoyable part is that the movie doesn't shy away from showing creative death scenes.But even for fans of action, Michael Bay and Ryan Reynolds, this movie will remain an incomprehensible mess.

The first 20 mins is so action packed you don't have time to blink! The action skills and the effects in this movie is on another level! Why has it gotten such a bad rap I don't know. This whole movie was a great release! It's been awhile since I've seen an actual good action movie.

reviews.review_title: this is hell of action The girls, the cars, the scenery, the action, and the girls were definitely a wonderful way from start to finish
reviews.content:
Wow it's about time to have Michael Bay to get his ass out of teenage mutant turtles films that he produced and to get his ass out of Transformers films take a break from it, time to bring new ideas and a new film that we never have seen and it's 6 Underground a Netflix film that could off been in theaters this felt like a movie that could of been in theaters. this is not just about story this is all about characters a lot more, and fun amazing stunt work a lot of creativethings you haven't never seen from first time with sick gore twist action SC-FI flick perfect writing i loved writing i loved characters, those type movies i loved is Expendables, The Losers, A-TEAM this is a next team it's morel like they are mixed of Expendables and A-TEAM is because they mercenary's, they go on mission is whatever they live or die and plus they are on team they are like ghost just like in A-TEAM they fake their death's and they are a ghost like they do exist but they fake their deaths. this is type of movie you see it for friday night or Saturday night or Sunday night type of flick that you watch when you feel like getting some whiskey pour a glass and put a movie on with your girlfriend and while watching this flick. don't expect a good story please don't because too many people want to many stories, the premise is almost original though Shallow, predictable it's a action film if youwant story then best for you to watch something else screw story we want more action then to story. it had great characters as well i loved characters, as well they were funny, they kicked a lot of ass in film, i liked their smart plans, their attitude as well. they have a mission to take down this ruthless in order to take down notorious criminals. the action was very well made very wellcinematography, it wasn't cheap at all it didn't feel cheap this is well made action flick nothing cheap crap, the action had a lot of dangerous stunts in it like with all another Michael Bay like The Rock, Island, Transformers but not with Robots and electrical and CGI, their is CGI but not a lot. Editing was sometimes jarring but most of the time keeps you on edge. (mostly) bland comedy that makes a few laughs in film and also given the R rating made this a lot better You can probably guess that it is by no means a realistic action movie, and you're right. That, and also, while the action is consistent, the hardcore impact. Lots of expensive cars getting blown up,a lot of hot actresses close ups with lens flare, high octane action and silly one lines from Ryan Reynolds acts like character just like Deadpool without the swords and tight costume, and doesn't have a messed up face like Freddy Kruger. The rest of characters please people don't take this seriously oh the characters are passable, that doesn't mean their acting is bad jeez it's not Oscar nommie movie awards. i reckon cast did their best in film i reckon that's the best they are been given what to do.story follows explaining One (Ryan Reynolds) motive to hunt notorious criminals and bad Presidents. Flashing back to when he recruits the others to his team on faking their deaths and becoming ghosts. It is kind of like Expendables, The A Team, Losers type of new Genre, i loved another characters like Two (Mélanie Laurent), Three Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, Four (Ben Hardy), Five (Adria Arjona), Six (Dave Franco) A dysfunctional team traveling around the globe with a mission on extraction, termination, or trying to set up a plan. But it always ends up in a bloody shoot out and being chased. you have Seven (Corey Hawkins) i am pretty surprised how they waste Dave Franco character he is in it for 5 minutes then Corey Hawkins takes over role, it feels like when James Franco was in Alien Convent for 30 seconds then he dies. but at least they had Dave Franco for like 5 minutes thats it.
I'm not necessarily a Michael Bay fan but at least i enjoyed The Rock (1996), Bad Boys 1&2, i know why he didn't do Bad Boys III is because he directed this flick, The Island, Transformers films were good, Pain and Gain, 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi that's his last film i enjoyed i wished that was a Netflix film and this could been in theaters rather then having this on Netflix this would of been a lot fun to see it in theater because action and all those crazy staff in it was right edge of my seat.i thought this was a lot of fun, gore was crazy as well i loved gore scenes and action was so creative, i don't know if you guys played call of duty black ops II the mission in cruise ship that was exactly like in this movie from game Call of duty black ops II. Ryan Reynolds and rest of actors looked like he had as much fun making this as I did watching as well just like me watching Expendables, Losers, A-TEAM this is one of my favorite movies of all time this is most enjoyable and more excited film then to Triple Fronter. i reckon this is my last
favorite movie in 2019 because nothing is on theaters in moment in December but this is one of my last films of 2019 and yes sometimes it's good to have the great movies to be last. sadly this film didn't get much ratings in Rotten Tomatoes like 34% still a lot higher but still come on what did they expect ?? nowadays i don't listen or read critics because they are completely wrong and don't know what it wants to be here is my easy of me saying it Pay attention tothe movie if you're not very bright you'll get lost. The cuts give you the backstory as to who the characters are the entire thing is just a Michael Bay action flick romp if you don't like that you won't like this at all people it's not a slow deep burn suspense type of movie it's full on action, gore, girls, cars, a lot of crazy car chases and a lot of dangerous work like Fast and Furious films
10.10 hands down everyone it's a Netflix Friday night film to enjoy when you have nothing else to do or no plans to go out, watch this movie. Action, funny, entertainment for Friday night! Just sit, watch It, and relax. and get off your phones, don't bother looking at ratings and listening to the haters, because they don't know what they want from this movie.

reviews.review_title: Ryan Reynolds, Carnage and Flying Bodies
reviews.content:
If you don't like
1. Ryan Reynolds
2. Carnage
3. Flying bodies
you'll probably not like this movie
Not sure what the plot was , I didn't really care
If you're the type of person that hoping that Michael Bay finally made a plot heavy movie. Keep holding your breath.
If you want to see explosions and count the number of times a body bounces ... well you're probably watching the right movie!
Enjoy the small things in life, like this movie!
If you want plot heavy go watch the Irishman.
I'll tell you one thing I watched this at 3 am and didn't fall asleep, I watched the Irishman on a Saturday after waking up at noon and fell asleep during the movie.

reviews.review_title: Fast and Furious, you've met your match!
reviews.content: I am a long time fan of the Fast and Furious franchise however I felt like they've been lacking something. (The last good one was Fast Five)I'd say 6 Underground is the perfect all around action movie. Beautiful cinematography, very strong, likable characters, awesome dialogue with comedy mixed in and the action, OH the action!! It's some of the most high octane BELIEVABLE action I've seen in a long time. And the story is actually interesting unlike the last couple Fast and Furious movies. The last thing they have over the Fast and Furious franchise is that while the characters are very likable, you also feel like they could die at any moment (aside from Ryan Reynolds). Oh how I hope they make a sequel to this!!!
2 hours of cliches and boring writing, with standard large action sequences.Do not recommend.Full of typical Hollywood one liners that you have heard before.

reviews.review_title: Had he not learnt anything from R.I.P.D.
reviews.content: 5 minutes was enough had to switch it off, ridiculous.

RECOMMENDED!
This movie was badass & has become another top favorite of mine. I really REALLY enjoy Ryan Reynold's work in nearly any movie he does. His humor & personality light up everyone's mood making the movie just that much better... The punch lines between them all were genuinely hilarious. Best parts of all in this movie were the injuries there were absolutely insane & the slowmo's that came with it! Who knew a flashbang would do that.
Id like to see Ryan do something with Keanu Reeves along with Jason Statham & Tom Cruise... Get a bit of a mixup between John Wick, Jack Reacher, & Transporter mix. I think this kind of mix up would outdo The Expendables..
Great action flick! Definitely hoping for a sequel!

reviews.review_title: I don't know if I've ever seen a movie this bad be this expensive
reviews.content: I think if it was a B-movie it would have been a lot better... maybe I wouldn't have expected so much like: a basic plot that was interesting, action sequences that made sense, no deadpool monologues, something to care about in the script, no camera spiking from Ryan Reynolds, use of Melanie Laurent. But what was I thinking.I turned it off after 20 minutes but that's because u just walked away and couldn't figure out where all the noise was coming from.I wish netflix just gave us 10 good movies instead of this.The extra star is because I like the colours.

I am a huge movie fan. I love Michael Bay, Ryan Reynolds and everything Netflix has done for our industry but this movie is a steaming piece of dog crap. The acting is terrible, the special effects, shooting and wrecks, are awful even worse the story line is garbage. I usually watch all movies until the end but this one was too bad. They could have done a MUCH better job than this! Hard Pass!

The first 15 minutes was a car chase that impacted no single damage to the vehicle even when we CLEARLY see that the side mirror was destroyed by the truck and yet they continue with the vehicle intact! That's one of a bloody goof! The humor was intensely annoying, terrible plot and a waste of time. I couldn't shut my brain off and couldn't continue watching.

reviews.review_title: Explosion is fun, girls are hot and all but the pacing is just way off.
reviews.content: I just can't in good spirit rate this anything higher than 6. First 20 minutes were basically straight action with no disposition or meaning, story picks up only after second half. Also humor falls flat big time. Pure action film with nothing else to offer.
Puerile garbage. If you want brain cells to die, watch this. If you value your mental health, stay clear. That is all.

The problem with the low rated reviews of this movie is that people are too critical and can't enjoy movies at face value. This movie is pure fun entertainment! Awesome action sequences, stunt driving, explosions, and humor sprinkled in. My husband and I enjoyed this movie to kick back after a long week of work and kids. Exactly what we needed to just enjoy a movie night. The problem with people nowadays is that people don't just enjoy the pure entertainment and escape of movies. Thank you Netflix, Michael Bay, Ryan Reynolds, the cast and crew. We really enjoy these great movies on Netflix because with our busy lives we don't get out to the movies often.

reviews.review_title: 6 underground.... I wish I was before I decided to watch.
reviews.content: Where is the character development? It takes us almost immediately on a high paced full action car chase full of not so funny jokes, lame action music and crappy titles. Immediately brought a very deadpoolish vibe.... was that a super hero joke?!? Speaking of deadpool, you can only guess what other movies the writers worked on. 22 minutes in I was glad "6" played by James Franco's brother: (because who cares who Dave Franco is), whose character we only know by number, title and "driver" DIES! YES! the chase scene is finally over... followed by a sad, oh so sad memorial... followed by careless jokes again. Then we go to a military scene, full of action and another character whom hasn't been developed. Well, this is far as I got because it's senseless and idiotic.
A 13 year old boy would do a better job of weaving this together. It's too disjointed & florescent.They should have made a romantic comedy from the off; especially with that cast.

Simple - you've seen it before storyline- that is just bulked up with product placement and over long action sequences (too many sparkly bullet shots in Italian opening sequence) . Really well shot but ultimately a boring film, that could have been a gem.

I honestly loved it, It shows that there's still room for some "Bayhem" in this world. Plus once you add Ryan to the mix it's the perfect ingredient. The entire cast is amazing, It honestly feels like they've worked together for years. I really hope this gets a sequel. Great job Netflix!!

They must assume the viewer has an IQ of 50. Too much pointless action, firecrackers going off, stupid oneliners, guy doing parkour for absolutely no reason, getaway car in bright green +100 other stupid things.

Obviously action with michael bay involved, but it's original with very likable characters and GREAT music perfectly tailored to the situation. No super complex plot that'll stump you or twists involved. It's hard to dislike any of the 6 main characters and their backstories. Critics nowadays are like high parliament sipping tea with their pinkies in the air. They only look down. F them. Good movie.

I haven't enjoyed a balls out unashamed action film as much as this in a long time, 2 hours never passed so quickly. So ignore the haters, get the popcorn ready and enjoy. Well played Netflix well played
If you like Micheal Bay as I do, you will like this movie. Reminds me heavily or Transformers with the filming locations. Good plot as well
Little confusing to begin with but all makes sense later on. So good and don't we all love a good act chase!!
Not sure why there are so many crap review...I really enjoyed this movie!
Don't waste your time Such a pile of crap. Full of over dramatic Hollywood stunts. Go for a walk instead. One of the worst movies ever stay away from it
The other reviewers have said it better than me. This movie is a pointless mess.

I really like Ryan Reynolds but I'm afraid we didn't get half way through this movie. The continuity errors were evident in the first ten minutes and the story line abscent. I so wish this had been a better movie

Be warned! I would have spent better 2 hours staring at an empty wall than watching this movie! (First 24 mins in Florence is the best you'll get.) I curse the producers and script writers for this 2 hour of an abomination.

If you like movies for non stop action, explosions, but with the perfect blend of comedy and entertainment, this is THE movie. It's meant to be one of those popcorn movies that are just ridiculously fun to watch. Of course it's going to be stupid, but it's stupid fun. Take Deadpool, Throw in Michael bay, and some fast and furious....this is what you get. For me, it was pure fun.
I guess this might be fun to watch if you can get past the 1st 15 minutes. I couldn't.
The best part of the movie was the first 10 minutes but then the rest of the movies just like the first 10 minutes

Fun little flick with a lot of action and a massive production, the negative: some lenghts in the second half and a feeling of boredom thru an overload of action after action scene, in the end everything is just a blur of crashes, gunshots and explosions. Anyway, put your brain on standby and enjoy the ride: give it a try if you like to watch The Fast and the Furious and The Transporter movies.

Some good action sequences but badly edited so you have to work hard to make out what's happening but the film's not good enough to justify the effort so you stay confused and then get bored. I fast forwarded through the last 40 mins.
Ryan Reynolds plays his usual role which we've now seen too many times. All the characters are pretty unpleasant and so don't really care what happens to any of them. The villains are over the top and the story's been told too many times.
Apart from all that....

I enjoyed every second of the movie, pumped with action, great cgi and acting.
Why does this movie get such a low score, that's the reason I don't go watch a movie based on IMBD scores, I did with the Joker and I turned the movie off halfway through.
Don't let the score keep you away from watching it, if you like action movies this is one of them.

reviews.review_title: Honestly thougth I'd watch Ryan Reynolds painting a white wall white. I was wrong.
reviews.content: This movie is so bad. My 4 stars are for Ryan Reynolds. And one star for the movie itself. I'm all about stupid-fun action. And if that was all this movie was, it'd be an enthusiastic 8 stars, because, unlike what the positive reviews are saying, most people know, and like, stupid-fun action movies.What lets this movie down is the editing, continuity, and flow. A stupid fun movie started out confusing, became tedious, and then became atrocious, and then became unwatchable. My husband and I turned it off an hour in.

reviews.review_title: Explosions. Mayhem. Beautiful people. No brain required.
reviews.content: This movie was just what I needed after a hard, long, brain crunching work week. The action is over the top, the plot is wildly unrealistic, and the characters are pretty one dimensional. But so what! There are some amazing action sequences; good laughs from Ryan Reynolds snark; and a joy ride of explosions, gunfire, and a dozen ways to die (for the bad guys of course). If you are looking for a film with consequences, character development, or concern about the piles of dead bodies, steer clear. But if you're in the mood for hi-def bloody mayhem and don't want to think, then this hits the spot.

This Netflix Original Michael Bay movie is the epitome of Bayhem on steroids! Balls to wall action. Forget about the plot this movie is all about high octane action & pithy one liners delivered by the charismatic Ryan Reynolds. It's the A Team meets the Avengers on meth. Just brainless fun for a Friday Night movie!
I've got it. Upon rewatching this movie if you view it from the lens as an over the top Big budget B Grade surreal Action Comedy parody it actually makes the movie more palatable. Technically it has gorgeous cinematography that has part commercial and music video feel, great action sequences ( the majority of which are done as practical effects as opposed to CGI) & a very good score. The cast led by the charismatic Ryan Reynolds is diverse & has a palpable chemistry. Just think of this movie as The Expendables with young and better looking people!

Wow, this film SCREAMS MICHAEL BAY! As you can tell by all the shaky action scenes, and thin plot line, Bay had his hand all over this. 6 Underground felt very unoriginal, and bland to say the least - I had at least five films in mind that reminded of this film. You would need to be a Michael Bay fan to truly appreciate this film.6 Underground as a whole felt real lose, uneven, and improvised. The screenplay by Rhett Reese & Paul Wernick, both who wrote Deadpool 1 & 2, and Zombieland, was super dumb, with very inconsistent humor. Reese & Wernick tried to write this EXACTLY like Deadpool, and it just doesn't work.Ryan Reynolds played himself as always, which could have either partially saved the film for you, or made no difference, like it did to me. He had some humorous lines, but he just dishes out a mass of bad comedy. The supportive cast wasn't so bad, but they couldn't help but being generic as hell, feeling like they were hardwood cut-outs.Overall, this film just reeked of unoriginality, even Ryan Reynolds couldn't save it. 6 Underground felt like it should've been made around the same time as Bad Boys 2 (2003). AVOID!

Yes it's a micheal bay movie who dosen't always direct the best of movies but this is seriously a good movie with almost non stop action and always at the edge of your seat. All this mixed with good acting and a good storyline this is a redemption movie for micheal bay

I wasn't expecting much when the movie started, but an almost 20 minute long car chase at the beginning just changed my mind. The action and story line never stopped for a moment.
If you like 007 movies or Mission Impossible, or even John Wick, then you will not be disappointed. Good plot, good CGI, great acting - just turn off your brain and enjoy a 2 hour fun ride.
Just blood, gore, noise of car chases and senseless violence. If there was a story or character development it is hidden by complete non stop mess. Why or why such a waste.

reviews.review_title: Violence Is So Much Fun! Part MMXIX
reviews.content: My thoughts on actions films in a nutshell:Instead of fifty car wrecks, 100 gory death scenes, a million bullets flying, and about a billion euros in property damage, just have one, well-choreographed event. I am so tired of the school of film-making that says, "if one car wreck is cool, let's have dozens of them." The problem is that there is no tension, and action without tension is boring. Violence without consequences is a cartoonJust the amount of money spent on the ridiculous opening sequences could have funded ten good films.And it keeps going, as I write this in real time. I suppose they think they can just completely overwhelm the mouth-breathers by never stopping-or even slowing down-to have any sort of story.I have a rule. If the trailer has more than one explosion, the movie is a huge dump fit only for disturbed adolescents. My rule is almost always true.

I have never reviewed a movie before, so here we go, hold on it might be a bumpy ride... From the super long car chase at the beginning that hearkens back to the Blues Brothers car chase silliness to the very end "I'm one but not done" leaving hope for more and more and more of these... I couldn't stop watching. It was a thrill ride to end all thrill rides. Great thing it wasn't in the theater - at my age I'd have to have had a restroom break, but there was simply no time. What little pauses in the action there were, are definitely places you need to pay attention to. The plot, as apparently some couldn't see, was actually more than one. The issues some have with not being able to follow it, I have but one suggestion - never watch Pulp Fiction, as your head would explode.
