Good picture, no story, a product placement in every 2 minutes. Hard to call a movie.
In the scenes they ought to be in Florence, there are some scenes filmed in Siena like the palio place. I know because is was there when they have filmed it...Bad movie. No straight story.

After reading some reviews saying it was choppy and hard to follow etc I was unsure about watching ... But I love Ryan Reynolds and Michael Bay... so I watched. It was excellent! I disagree with every negative review!! I don't think they watched the same movie i did - completely don't get the negative reviews at all!! It was so good I literally can't wait for the sequel! Great movie Netflix! This was so good it deserved the big screen !

Meaning that it has a lot of action and great scenes. But for the Bay's haters of course they are going to hate it. They hated great movies like Pearl harbor, transformers 1, etc... Sooo. What do you expect from this people..Its a pretty entertaining movie. And for being a netflix movie, its one of the best ones so far.

They attempted to edit the film in a such a unique manner in which they failed. The constant explosions led me to believe this was a Michael Bay film and I was right. This is a below average action film at best. The perfect 'Netflix and chill' movie if you will.

Ignore bad reviews. It's not like you paid a ticket for this movie. You pay your Netflix account anyway! So stop whining! Movie's a great treat if you don't expect an Oscar-worthy piece. I enjoyed every single second of it with the eye of a child, not dissecting every scene or dialogue. Yes, not an innovative script, but man, entertaining. So yeah, for the 12 EUR /month for my Netflix account i think the movie was really enjoyable. Stop being obnoxious little crybabies!

reviews.review_title: Be high when you watch this
reviews.content: Because otherwise your brain will hurt. I like fast paced, over the top style of actions movies, but this has none of the craft and all of the nonsense.Scenes come one after the other with the "this is characters X/Y/Z and this is their quirk." Characters never really get established, or given a chance to breathe and so they just kinda *do* things.Michael Bay's "on-crack" style of directing is on full force here, and if you like that then congrats this film is for you! I thankfully have better taste and will stay the heck away from this.If you're looking to watch a cool action movie, just watch the first Kingsman movie again
Goodness gracious was this movie a mess. Aside from a few half-decent action scenes, the movie was just horrible. The scripts were bad, the story bad, it was just random stuff put together.

Is there even a single reason why you shouldn't find Michael Bay movies horrible? Maybe one: Bay's aesthetics are closer to our ugly reality than we want to admit. This becomes clearer than ever in the Netflix production "6 Underground". In the film, Ryan Reynolds plays an arrogant billionaire who not only wants to make humanity happy with charity projects, but also wants to improve the world with private military interventions. In order to act unrecognized, he staged his own death. His six-member team supports this libertarian, completely undemocratic approach to the best of its ability - and of course Bay does not criticize it, but rather reinforces the message by aggressively promoting the products of large corporations. It's not nice, but it's enlightening.

To be honest I only watched the first few minutes.
They were so bad I hadn't the courage to go further.
I prefer not knowing the millions that were wasted on that movie.
This is a terrible, terrible movie. Like Ryan Reynolds a lot but this was bad bad bad. Senseless violence and action. No story. Wow I wish I had the time back.
Transformers had sex with Deadpool and this movie is the baby was born.

reviews.review_title: Nice cast, cool effects - but just so dumb
reviews.content:
This could have been such a great action movie, if it weren't for the lame execution.
The story is actually pretty interesting with a crew choosing to live a ghostly existence to make the world a better place. And the movie has it all - awesome car chases, women who can kick, good guys fighting while throwing out funny punchlines and the ultimate bad guy who doesn't care about killing children.But... Because there is definitely a but, for while it might seem like a great setup, it just doesn't work out. There is such great scenes in between unbelievable stupidity. The film makers must think us fools with the storyline and how unbelievable it all is?Just a shame with such potential...

reviews.review_title: If you liked transformer 17 and 18 this is for you
reviews.content: Even if you lower your expectations to michel bay's late style, you will still find this movie pretty poor. Although I believe bay didn't do only bad movies, lately he has been accumulating this type of craps. I still need to watch the end because I actually felt asleep on that "packed action" movie! It's boring, not funny and just doesn't make any sense. I respect the work and actors but overall it doesn't deserve more than the average grade.

reviews.review_title: Even if you have nothing else to do don't bother
reviews.content: Michael Bay once again in his endless struggle to show us that what he lacks in tallent tries to compensate in explosives. But I guess he realised that the way it is the script and edit cost more than if they where actually good. They cost our time.

The opening car chase has some of the worst continuity I have EVER seen in a movie, but it is still a pretty good car chase. The driver side mirror gets ripped off, along with the entire side of the car damaged, yet in the very next scene, and many afterwards, the mirror is back, and no damage. Then it's gone again, then back again, damage, no damage, etc, etc, etc. In fact, I am going to say it's the worst continuity I have ever seen in a flick. I mean, who missed this stuff? They should be ashamed. Then at one point the main character hangs his head out the window, yet in the next scene shot from outside the car, no head protruding from the window, then back out there again, then not, etc. Come on guys. It's just awful.But aside from this extremely poor directing/editing, it is a fun, entertaining movie. It is one I would watch a sequel of, but I hope they at least learned some lessons about continuity from this film if they do make a sequel.

reviews.review_title: This entire movie was 3-7 second clips.
reviews.content: So here's a film with Michael Bay action, which is so bland these days, means nothing. Other than that you get some funny quips from the expected actor (Ryan Reynolds) and pretty much nothing else exciting except the settings which are quite exceptional (oh and some gore if you think that's exciting and new).The film is comprised of just jumping from cut to cut so quickly it seriously hurt my ability to appreciate anything in the film. Even if you have Netflix currently I'd recommend watching something else.

reviews.review_title: LEAVE YOUR BRAIN AT HOME CLASSIC ACTION FILM
reviews.content: Before even seeing this movie i had seen so many bad reviews, maybe that helped me as i went in to this with zero expectations but straight from the off it was action packed , if you forget its Michael Bay and its 150 mil then its a perfectly good Friday night Action film, i actually really enjoyed this , it reminded me on the 80's style action films , minimum plot with extra cheese , the film doesn't take its self seriously so why should you. it;s 2 hours of fun with some brilliant stunt scenes , just leave your brain at home and enjoy.

This is a film aimed at 12 year old boys or perhaps those with the equivalent level of maturity. It is stupid way beyond the point of inanity.
I love watching Ryan Reynolds - he was simply magnificent as Deadpool. Sadly, this film is too dumb even for his wonderful brand of nonchalance to save.
I tried three times.It's so completely disjointed that I had to give up.

reviews.review_title: One of the best action films ever made.
reviews.content: From the screen effects to not tiring humour and back to some of the greatest action scenes ever in a film it hits the sweet spot. Just know what you are going to watch . An ACTION film. I rated 10/10 because the movie is extremely underrated. My normal rating would be a solid 7/10. Action films can't get past 8 btw...
I loved the movie, the story the action all fantastic
If there is 0/10 ,it 'd definitely go to that

What can I say.....I really wanted to enjoy this movie but right from the get go it was like watching a bad imitation of dead pool. Some of the action scenes are ok but if you pay attention to the opening scene with a green car, you pretty much know what you're getting into. The car jumps, bumps, scrapes, scratches, crashes and still comes out like new. Enough I think.......My verdict.......best left alone. It isn't very good......actually to be totally honest it's just plain awful.
This is the most boring and unfunny action movie I've ever seen and there's nothing else to say.

The film it self is passable only because of Ryan Reynolds and the rest of the cast who all do a pretty good job. The writing is fairly sharp and the over all story though predictable is entertaining.
The film was really marred by the incredible amount of in your face product placement. Every few minutes there is a label or badge (usually with Ryan Reynolds) center frame. It's very off-putting.
The movie id have given a solid 6 out of ten but 2 knocked off for product placement.
Seriously netflix if you can't afford to make the film yourself then don't even try.

reviews.review_title: Horrible except for the amazing stunt work.
reviews.content: This movie would be great if it was taken seriously. The stunt crew and second unit were amazing. The script is similar to a loudmouth at a party who talks too much and thinks he's funny. Why is the comedy so forced and unnatural? I love Ryan Reynolds but they Ryan Reynoldsed it up so that everyone has forced funny one-liners and stupid scenes that take away the flow from the action. It hurt to watch so I bailed at 16 minutes.

Was feeling really frustrated with the movie because I didn't understand the plot. Peices of the plot are all over the place. The action was cool but way over the top. There is not a good enough reason to watch this.
So stupid, poorly acted that even as a free movie inside the Netflix subscription I feel I overpaid. Stopped the movie 40 min in as I could feel my braincells die one by one. Dont waste your time.
For Action film fans this is good movie to watch, Action everything is good,
One more movie that Ryan Reynolds can and should apologize for in Deadpool.

This movie is garbage, even for a Michael Bay movie. Its editing is a huge mess. The action sequences are very badly shot we couldn't tell who from whom. The dialogues are extremely cheesy and stereotypical. Ryan Reynolds is so one-dimensional using his cheesy deadpool-style dialogue. Bad guys are all one-dimensional. Mindless action, cheesy dialogue, clichés. Seriously can't find any good thing about this movie. It's like a bad mix between Deadpool and Mission Impossible. Need to wash my eyes after this trash.

What an absolute joke of a movie, boring story line; erratic and unbelievable action. If you like unrealistic action scenes which simply are silly, this movie is for you. Hated it after 10 minutes and the scene trying to do surgery is a fast moving car with slow mo's is just dumb. Find something else to do with two hours. Wasted my data!!!! Ryan do better!
Why Hollywood always show that only westerns can solve all problems in the world.

Action thriller - but without thriller.A straight up, blunt action movie.Stupid, but enjoyable, if you don't look for meaning in it xD.I was really hoping for a twist of some kind, or a reveal or anything really. There was nothing. They could have made it a bit better with some better writing/story but you know...
Great action scenes but very weak story, which took me a bit of time to figure out what the hell the movie was about. But some of the best car chases and stunts I've ever seen.
Oh, it's not Scorsese or Mann. It's Michael Bay. Therefore you should realise that this film is going to be trash and just sit back and enjoy it. Nah. Trash is trash.

Oh, my sanity, my eyes... The first sequences were so all over the place that I would not recommend this movie to anyone with epilepsy. I sincerely could not follow what was happening, and on top of shaky camera action we also got some very 'clever' dialogue about spurting blood and what not that was presumedly supposed to make me laugh. I gave up before my nausea had the chance to turn into something worse.

reviews.review_title: If you know what it is going in, you'll probably like it
reviews.content: I dodged this for months while seeing it every day on Netflix. Finally after watching basically every other thing that even remotely interested me, I put this on.After like the first 30 minutes or so I was pretty surprised how much I was enjoying it and how high the production value was for a Netflix movie. Then I looked it up midway and saw it was Michael Bay, which if I knew that I would've watched it right when it came out.Don't get the wrong idea- I don't watch Michael Bay's movies for the reasons he would want me to. They are so over the top and stupid I almost always enjoy them, but that's coming from someone that actually goes out of their way to watch terrible movies. This one though wasn't even that stupid I genuinely liked it... but it was still stupid. I will say that if you expect a masterpiece when starting this don't even bother starting it.If you like really stupid movies that are fun with a dumb story, and in this case you like the cast as I did, you'll probably like this as much especially if you love sitting down and watching movies like The Core or 2012 every couple of years. If those entertain you... so will this.

reviews.review_title: No idea what this film is trying to be
reviews.content: Kind of cool action sequences, but film is a confused mess. Is it action, comedy, drama, what? Gratuitous f-bombs, ridiculous attempts at humor, completely unlikeable characters, and overall an unlikeable disaster. And I generally like Ryan Reynolds and mindless action movies.
It was well written but Michael bay absolutely ruined it just like everything else he touches.

I don't get the very negative reviews. Yes, it's choppy in places but it's because they are laying the groundwork for this one and more, which means backstory. Some of you act like you're evaluating this for an Oscar. That's not what this is and it certainly doesn't pretend to be. This is an entertaining action with comedy movie. Sit back, unplug, enjoy...period.

What to expect for an action movie?
Actions of course!

reviews.review_title: At least Green Lantern got a mask
reviews.content: I dont consider this or Green Lantern to be particularly great films but this is tragic. The movie is hard to watch even as background noise while reading the news. I didn't pay to watch the movie, but if turning myself in for watching it illegally would remove it from my memory I would gladly surrender myself.

On rare occasions I stop watching a movie after a 45 min of play. This is one of those.I do like action movies, but appart from the genere, every movie needs a good plot... you cannot replace plot for action scenes... or you can, if your target audience is stupid people.Don't come with the "it's a Michael Bay movie", please grow up.Cars exploding by every crash... what is this? the 80s?
Gore scenes don't make violence scene realistic... that kind of gore scenes make them just gross fake.
was Ryan Gosling doing a Wade Wilson like character on purpouse? or did he just got stuck on that?If you like Transformers saga, watch it, you'll be marveled... If you have a sense of quality for movies higher than a 5 years old child... move on.

reviews.review_title: Stick a fork in my eye please!
reviews.content: Okay, let me preface my short and sweet comment with this. I love love love Ryan Reynolds and I only watched the first 20 minutes of the movie. Why? Because I couldn't take it. I feel like I want to say that in my whiny voice. I couldn't take it. The first 15 minutes was nothing but a car chase. A car chase that went on way too long. I couldn't get into the dialogue because I was exhausted watching the car chase. Ugh! I gave it 3 stars because of Ryan. That's it. So sorry because I wanted to really love it!

I has a good action with some humor but overall the script is moronic and basically sends a wrong message. If it would be more sarcastic... but it looks like the writers were serious. Actors were great but they couldn't save to movie.
Totally cliche with no creativity. Had quite a few technical inadequacies.

Felt like it was all over the place. Also felt like a full on Deadpool movie: same jokes, same delivery and same deaths (sime cute some gruesome)
No background on his son: did he know about him? Another unanswered question: how and why did he become a "ghost"? He was tired of being a CEO?
Not sure and recommending it or not...

reviews.review_title: Action with a Michael Bay Twist
reviews.content: Enjoyed from start to finish... action / explosions / fights in the style only Michael Bay can give you. Hope you enjoy as much as I did.

reviews.review_title: one of the most worst movies
reviews.content: There's Nothing is in this movie, vey boring just wasting of time. A lot of action but there's no story. The last time I watch movie for this actor ...
Dialogue terrible....but typical Hollywood action/ second rate comedy something. The only ten seconds I liked was the guy crying crocodile tears at the funeral.

reviews.review_title: Some useless and boring backstory moments, but Michael bay is Michael Bay
reviews.content: I start by saying that in this speech I am and always will be biased, since I love Michael Bay's style. His movies, as far as I'm concerned, are some of the most fun and dynamic I've ever seen, and as an action movies lover I'll never thank him enough.The first 20 minutes are just the perfect representation of "Bayhem": a spectacular car chase with lots and lots of shootings, explosions and silly humor. I'm not ashamed to call this chase one of the best action scenes ever made. After that the rhythm slows down a bit, with some unnecessary and quite boring backstory segments, but when when the movie starts pressing the accelerator again, it never stops, becoming more and more adrenaline-pumping and fun. It isn't a perfect movie at all, but if you want to have fun with some good old Bayhem action, this is the movie for you.

It's been a while since i have seen a movie with this many plot holes. The story was all over the place, no character development, even the action was ordinary. There were few funny bits but not worth the time.

reviews.review_title: Maybe, just maybe, you can enjoy it if you are a 12 years old straight male.
reviews.content: A couple of jokes kind of land but mostly a mess. The plot has no sense at all. Bay being Bay. Looks fine, tho.
The movie is a really fun romp. However, I can't ignore the dodgy editing and abrupt changes in tone. So yea, it's worth a watch but it's pretty forgetable overall.

reviews.review_title: Nice action, bad bad bad film editing
reviews.content: The movie is like small clips and you have to make the connections between the chapters. You can't follow the storyline. It's sad. This is a huge production with different places and counties, tones of effects and action scenes. Bad editing can ruin everything.
On a par with Hotman any transporter films - satisfies a certain mood but is not worth the spectacle - 1st halves choppy story line was pretty pointless

reviews.review_title: I cannot believe this is Michael Bay movie?
reviews.content: Compared to what he did with the 90's movies like the rock and con air this is totally below the class of Michael Bay movies that I know.... This is a mess and too long.....
Summary: explosions and no story. Such a waste of time...

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous looking over the top action fun
reviews.content: This film is great fun, over the top, glorious action overload. Don't overthink it, just unplug the brain sit back with a big smile and enjoy.

I know Ryan Reynolds has this thing for a wild and crazy guy as Steve Martin used to say, but this was a decently-themed storyline with good talent that was surrounded by nothing more than gratuitous violence and special effects. The opening car chase was absurd, long, and violent. This is not entertainment. It is more someone's wet dream. Grow up Ryan.

Somewhere in this mess there is a fun movie waiting to be made. It's still waiting.In the first minutes you might think that the editing is going to be the worst thing about this film, you'd be wrong even though the editing is truly horrendous. The director did a far more horrible job. The movie feels like it was made by a first year film student only with less heart and less taste. The dialogue is uninspired and terrible, they must've used exposition to tell us the premise of the movie at least five or six times. "We had to die to become ghosts and fix the world." Ok thanks for telling me over and over again, I'm not sure I got that. Although to be fair the script is so awful there's no guarantee that would be understood if it was left up to the story. The whole movie is chock full of fadish techniques, extreme camera angles, moving cameras pointlessly in still scenes, egregious shakey cam, super close ups, irritating and fake lense flares, and perhaps worst of all not giving the audience enough time or screen space to enjoy some of the fabulous locations the had available.I don't know what the people making this were thinking but it just not worth it. Even the cast, which is amazing, couldn't raise the movie to anything worthwhile despite their obvious efforts to so. Not worth the time and indeed actively frustrating to watch because you can see what the movie should have been.

It's hard to believe that there are so many haters who dislike this film for its style and the way it is filmed. The film style is that of a rapid shot comic book. It is filmed this way so that the viewer can absorb a massive data stream both visually and sonically in a lesser amount of time, as opposed to a slower classic style of cinema film. The actors and their parts are in tune with today's movie viewers. They are not bad, they are just identified by a younger viewership.This movie is fun to watch from start to finish, and has many new ideas. It is well made and has big visual impact! The soundtrack is modern and the special effects are outstanding. The Deadpool jokes are a little campy and get old by the end of the show, but the movie overall is fun to watch.I would suggest that the older classic cinema watchers stop reviewing this type of movie because the industry has long past moved beyond your understanding, and the readers here long past the care of your words.If your between the ages of 18 and 60, and like Deadpool and modern James Bond, then this is for you.

Mindless fun and entertainment. In a good way. If you like to watch a good popcorn flix with lots of explosion and action then this is a film for you. If you want something artsy fartsy go somewhere else.
Watch this movie if you have no brain! Stylized violence, beautiful people, candy-coloured cars, but completely unappealing and downright silly.

Every good action thriller has a great car chase but when the opening car chase exceeds 20 minutes, then it's not a thriller but a cartoon.This movie's action is just in your face all the time. It's meaningless CGI. The cast is annoying. The humour is annoying. Just utter garbage all around.Innocent people are killed and it's just considered a joke. The CGI is over the top. I was half expecting the cars to take off and go into outer space.Avoid if you're after a movie with at least some substance. Or better still, just watch a bunch of cartoons.
Great film. Really enjoyed watching it, not sure why it has some bad reviews

Didnt even get past the first 10 min..unnecessary explosions, bad editing, complete chaos. You realize in the first 10 minutes that there is no story... I ended up with a headache and felt nauseous due to all the quick movements and light flashes... definitely dont recommend. Dont understand why Ryan Reynolds took this movie when he is doing soo well in other movies...

If you want mindless action, 6 Underground delivers the goods. Don't expect the film to be intellectually stimulating or dramatically satisfying. If you are, you have never seen a Michael Bay movie before.

reviews.review_title: I expected little... and was still disappointed.
reviews.content:
I watched this yesterday. "A Michael Bay movie", I thought, "perfect, mindless escapism with a lot of explosions and a happy ending".Boy, oh boy, where do I even begin?The plot doesn't make any sense whatsoever. Some rich, white tech-wiz decides to go after an evil dictator of some fictional Middle Eastern republic. He does this using his deep pockets, his know-how and a team of anonymous experts, stringing together some crash-bang-wallop jobs in different parts of the world. Oh, and he's apparently dead, which nevertheless doesn't stop him from obtaining the otherwise unobtainable weapons and equipment.
Throughout the film the timeline goes back and forth without much reason or explanation... which left me completely befuddled as to what is actually happening, when, where and why. This isn't helped at all by the way the movie was put together, what with quick cuts, short scenes and shaky camera. When the plot finally stabilises halfway through the movie, it moves quickly to an entirely predictable, and utterly naive, conclusion.There are car chases, where the good guys kill dozens of innocent bystanders, whilst driving a neon-green product-placement "getaway" vehicle. Actually, come to think of it, the "good guys" in 6U are at least as desensitized as the "bad guys". Don't quote me on that, but it seems they cause more deaths and suffering through their actions than the "bad guys" they're after.There is over the top gore. Human bodies ragdoll across the screen almost constantly, almost as if the director had an unhealthy fascination with people being ran over by cars on full speed, tossed around in explosions, dropped from tall buildings and impaled on forklifts. I am not squeamish and have no qualms over violence in movies, but 6U has a lot of gratuitous scenes where fake blood spatters the camera lenses. Really bad taste.The actors were definitely not overworked, as their characters had a perceived emotional depth and personalities of a 6x4 plank. Waste of talent really as the dialogue consists almost solely of cheesy one-liners, mostly quotes from other, non-Michael-Bay movies, interspersed with swear words, mostly of the m-f- and f-bomb type. Again, I don't mind foul language on the screen, but these were delivered flat, without emotion and felt almost out of place. When tense action called for a well placed "", none were given.In the end, the movie was just a long blur of explosions, blood, shooting, flying bodies, crashing cars and expensive surroundings being reduced to rubble, crowned with an after-action shot of our heroes departing into the setting sun.In conclusion... I believe there are three prerequisites to enjoy 6 Underground: 1 - you enjoyed Michael Bay movies before, 2 - you left your brain somewhere safe, and 3 - you have already decided that two hours of your life will go to waste one way or another.

reviews.review_title: two stars because if special effects
reviews.content:
Too much of nothing...
The #1 rule about a good movie is a good story.... and there is nothing original here, as expected.
Ok... If you don't have #1, try to have characters viewers will sympathize with.... Strike two here. You don't care about any of these guys...and that is usually Ryan Renolds strength to make you like his character. But not here...
So yes... I hit the fast forward a lot during this and ended up regretting watching it at all. And I am an easy audience for action movies.
The FILMING of the action sequences was great... I mean the technical aspects of it and the special effects... but when you don't care about the outcome...
So if you are debating between watching this vs another movie, pick the later. Chances are you'll be right.

How are people defending this with a straight face? "Hehe it's Michael Bay what did you expect? You're supposed to leave your brain at the door!"No. That's no reason to excuse terrible writing and directing. It wasn't good. It's one thing if you have a non-stop action movie that keeps you on the edge of your seat, but this one - I was bored. I was falling asleep the whole freaking time, which is sad because I tend to enjoy Michael Bay Films. Plus, so many things said by the characters were absolutely pointless, made no sense, or were just cringe worthy."They say no one can save the world. MEET NO ONE." Wtf? They weren't even saving the world, they were helping out some third world country.What the heck was Netflix thinking?
This bad. Although it was very entertaining.funny Eminem scene.5/10
I am shocked that some of these actors accepted this script. Worst movie of 2019.
A good, nice action movie with lot's of gunfire and blasts
Flashy. Quick camera shots. A lot of continuity errors. Bad acting.

reviews.review_title: For when you absolutely, irredeemably, have nothing better to do.
reviews.content: And even then I'd recommend sleeping pills if you're still conscious, over this lowest common denominator embarrassment for all concerned, and yes, that includes you Michael Bay. At least you can console yourself in the knowledge that you're now leading the race for the worst movie of 2019 with only 2 weeks to go. Mind you, there's still Cats to come.....
I was hesitant to watch because of the mixed reviews - OMG I am so glad I did. By far one of THE best movies I have ever seen!! It's a must see!

reviews.review_title: I dont like chase scenes but this was exhilarating
reviews.content:
If you gave it less than 5 watch it again and pay attention. It seems that those that gave this a low rating did not listen in the beginning, otherwise you would have understood the plot.
This is the type of movie where you have to stop being a continuity nazi and just be willing to suspend your disbelief and go with the flow.

reviews.review_title: Awesome movie and great Michael bay film
reviews.content: It was awesome with great action and funny moments with a great story and love ghost squad in the movie to help people without worrying about putting who they love in danger.

Zero meaning in conversations, zero camera crew effort, zero humor, zero logic in the plot, zero suspense, zero sympathy to the Ghosts.There are other numbers, too. 200 heart beats per minute of the editor of this film. Cause everything is jumping and shaking and sometime I can't even follow the story. Have I seen this guy already? You must try hard, but not too hard, cause if you remember what was told 5 minutes ago, you will hear the opposite thing. 20 minute car chase. For the first time I got bored from a car chase, unbelievable.Ryan Reynolds can't save this mess of a movie. The budget is huge, so let's suppose either cash washing or some rich guy decided he has what it takes to make a blockbuster.Surprisingly lame.

reviews.review_title: It's not a masterpiece but it's a hoot!
reviews.content: I don't know what the hell were you expecting. This is a Michael Bay movie with Ryan Reynolds as the lead.This is Deadpool + Die Hard + Bad Boys Franchise combined in one hell of a movie. I hate it when some movie snobs watch such a movie only to critise it afterwards.If you want action-packed, funny and awesome movie WATCH IT NOW.

reviews.review_title: Wow. Just wow. Stop directing michael bay and fire the editor.
reviews.content: This movie isn't a bad movie at all, quite the opposite. I was very Intrigued going in but what my attention is how horribly this was edited. We get the typical michael bay excessively long car chase with probably more streets visited than there actually is. Next it's cut - pan left - pan right shoot from the ground up pan left pan right. If that wasn't bad enough, we can't even get a clear picture of the store because once a character starts to talk about something - skips to the next character. Absolutely no time to build a story with too much of his over the top explosions and panning left and panning right. It's an okay move with the actors doing their best. I wouldn't say don't watch it - because it's decent , just prepare yourself for a movie that is just a mess.

I love this movie, and the only reason I gave it a 9 is I felt like it could've been 10-15 minutes shorter, but that's not even a big deal considering some of the new action stars we got to see and of course Ryan Reynolds in a crash course role, mixing both action and comedy at a high level. If you can't go watch a bunch of fun action with some excellent camera work and good acting, I don't know why you watched it in the first place, because the movie just exuded that from the preview alone. A Popcorn-fun, classic action film is what I saw. Michael Bay will always have his doubters and people who remember him for a particular movie, but he did not disappoint here. Enjoy~
Utter garbage, but visually stunning garbage. The effects and stunts are all spectacular (as long as you like it gorey) but in pretty much every other respect this an awful film.

Like many other reviews for this movie say, the editing is without a doubt its biggest flaw, truly terrible and erratic cuts. But the film also suffers from mind numbing continuity errors and a muddled story that doesn't quite know what direction it's heading in. It's hard to believe so many errors can be found in such a big budget movie, makes you wonder if it was done on purpose to get people talking...

reviews.review_title: A good but very forgettable action flick
reviews.content:
Nothing new under the sun, really... A few highly-trained underdogs are assembled in a team to make the world a better place... Acting is not bad (Ryan Reynolds is very likeable as always, even though some of his punchlines sound strangely like a toned-down-Deadpool-without- the-mask, which is a bit annoying), different exotic locations and a very large budget thrown around that will make you dizzy... such as the editing which, I suppose, was intended to be dynamic but just ends up being very confusing.
On another note, the very large budget is easily explained by the very unsubtle product placements here and there (the first two under 3 minutes... and you can guess that a certain watchmaker gave more cash than the other 3 donators, as its product appears twice).
Finally, considering that most of the action is hardly believable, I can't help but wondering why the need for so much collateral damage? (the body count among innocent by-standers is simply staggering!)
All this made the viewing very tiresome... Too bad...

Why do people still give Michael Bay money to make movies? Fool me once, shame on you; fool me twice, shame on me-right? I really don't get it.I didn't realize this was a Michael Bay farce when I started watching it. There were some dumb lines clearly thrown in to appeal to 12- and 13-year-old white males, as well as some gratuitous explosions early on, but I figured it would get better rather than worse and so I kept watching. Wow, was I ever wrong. Don't get me wrong: I like a good action movie with plenty of flash bangs, but what Michael Bay does is just insulting.Save yourself the hour and a half and skip this one.

Only watched the first 20 mins of the movie with the green Alfa Romeo car chases scene, one minute the car is all beat up and the side mirror blown off, next minute the car is in mint shape, this happened half a dozen times. How can this happen in a big budget film.

I set a reminder on Netflix for this movie. I've enjoyed Ryan Reynolds films before, love action, and was really looking forward to my ritual Sunday bowl of cookies and cream ice cream with extra smashed choc chip cookies on top while watching this movie. Sadly though, it is a real piece of crap. In fact I think I'd rather watch an actual piece of crap for 2 hours and 8 minutes than sit through this mess of a film again. I'm stunned at how bad this movie is. It is all over the shop in every way. It's a total mess. Equally stunning is the fact that some of you have rated it so highly... As high as 9/10. Climate change is a real issue facing our planet but equally terrifying is the fact that there are humans on our planet that enjoyed this trash film. Omg. Really??

This is loud and fast action entertainment, and it delivers! I thoroughly enjoyed the film and certainly would have paid to see this in theatres without regret. Some movies are meant for realism, some are meant for intricate plot developments/twists...movies like this are meant for over the top sequences. I am at a loss for some of the negative reviews. This movie has great cinematography and is on par if not exceeding expectations for its intent. I am looking forward to more content like this. Thank you, and keep it up Netflix!

Only reason I give it 8 is cause there does seem to be some irrelevant scenes and random cuts but other then that this movie is amazing. Ryan Reynolds is hilarious in this and all the action from start to finish is intense. Great movie, give it a chance.

I stopped watching after 25 min. Reason is first 18 minutes are wasted on car chasing. Those 18 min has thousand cuts which are enough for headache.Even after that chasing sequence, normal conversation scene between characters were shot with unnecessary close up shot, abrupt cut, shaky camera.God knows wtf director was smoking on editing table. Did he even bother to take look at final outcome ?

It's all out action made boring to watch. No attempt made to create a story, just a string of explosions and useless dialogue. It looks like it was all filmed with a drone. Three stars (for myself) because I managed to watch 75% of it. Don't waste your time, watch something else.
I love this movie and such nice Ryan Reynolds One Bomber Jacket

reviews.review_title: So bad it's sort of good.
reviews.content: My question is why is Dave Franco wearing a hat in the driving scene and then not and then is and then is not and so on and so on. So many bloopers I'm hoping they were on purpose.

Michael Bay strikes again ! Absolute mad amounts of action, explosions, sound effects! I was expecting this movie to be good but it surpassed my expectations by far. Amazing movie! Really hope they make more.

Plot: Initially interesting but falls completely flat.
Action: Overdone, meaningless, edited to hell.
Characters: Cliché, un-interesting, models acting like ordinary people.
Editing: The worst.
CGI: Boring and obvious.
Politics: Ridiculous American world view.Few beautiful scenes but ruined by fast editing.

reviews.review_title: Great Action / Convoluted Plot and Characters
reviews.content:
Action is all there - a lot of fun to be had.Plot and story is a mess - a lot of headaches to be had.If you can get around the incorherrant plot then there's a fun movie in there. The action is top notch and some good acting where permitted but action and fun alone don't make a good movie.Screenplay - very convoluted to begin with but made more sense at the end.
Cinematography - gritty and breathtaking.
Editing - paced well and action scenes are exciting but veey little breath room for performances to shine outside of their boxes.
Mise-en-scene - great set pieces despite lots of product placement.
Sound (diagetic and non-diagetic) - clear and creative audio. With so much going on you can imagine foley artists working overtime as well as a good musical score.
Performances - convincing and authentic, funny when needs to be but occassionally performances feels 'boxed' and constrained.
Production - good execution, with lots to be amazed at and admire. Just let down by the screenplay and direction relating to actors/editing.

reviews.review_title: It's Michael Bay by the Numbers
reviews.content: Someone should have the courage enough to tell M. Bay that not every material under the sun has incendiary or explosive properties because, well, physics. One feels like if left unchecked he'll have a tissue explode from being blown too hard. The amount of sparks and explosions created by just run of the mill activities like a car braking hard or a bullet hitting a concrete wall is ridiculous. Then there's the shoddy editing and scene cuts; I lost count of how many times the driver in the opening scene loses and regains his hat from one shot to another. Also a car has it's mirror ripped off in a scrape then has it back pristeen in the next shot. If half the slo' mo' scenes were run at real-time the movie may have been 30 minutes shorter (I didn't actually time it but hopefully the hyperbole gets the point across). It may seem like nit picking but one would expect more from an offering with these names and obvious budget attached to it.

reviews.review_title: Too overdone, only fake military dreamers would like this.
reviews.content: It is so fake, it's too stupid to finish watching it.

Was looking forward to see a ryan reynolds Film.
Watching this nearly gave me an epileptic shock.

reviews.review_title: I really hope 'the guy ' is better than this mess. This was the opposite of Deadpool.
reviews.content:
Instead of spending a month doing the neverending car chase scene they should have spent some more money on the script.
The one thing I can say is better than green lantern but not by much.

reviews.review_title: Ryan Reynolds plays Ryan Reynolds in a Michael Bay portfolio shoot.
reviews.content: I give it 3 stars for keeping me watching to the end. There were at least eight times that I asked myself why I was still watching this movie. These were typically during the large narrated segments of the film. This movie is a reel of stunts and action shots, strung together by character narrations that explain why this next scene of explosions and gunfights is about to happen. There really isn't any story here other than what you can read in the description, or see in the trailers. Ryan being snarky, writers being lazy, and Michael Bay being extreme. I kind of hated it, but I went into it having no idea what I was about to watch. I kept wondering... I couldn't shake the sneaking suspicion... When the credits finally rolled and I saw it in big bold letters... "Michael Bay", I nearly died laughing. I had been thinking it was one of his the entire time, and that validation was enjoyed at least enough to say, on the whole, watching this movie was ultimately a positive experience. Aside from that point, I have completely forgotten what the actual plot even was aside from, well... You can basically just go ahead and paste the studio's synopsis here. They could have just skipped the narration and the story completely, and added a couple more explosions and a downhill skiing scene with Reynolds being chased by an avalanche.

reviews.review_title: Very hard to follow action sceenes, the story predictable at times, a lot of unnecessary explosions
reviews.content: This movie started off and ended with a lackluster action sequence, which was very hard to follow. The smash cuts and editing in general is atrocious. They really messed up the music, as it starts a second too late or a second too soon to make any sense in the moment. The action scenes are edited very poorly and often don't even make sense. It really pushes the character as bad asses. They often just forget certain skills they had just shown a second ago to create some kind of tension. The humor is generally good, Ryan Reynolds helps this movie a lot.
This actually makes the Transformers sequels look like masterpieces.
Just so boring weak story weak acting just another transformers movie without the transformers action after more action but you have seen it 100 times before massive let down

reviews.review_title: Awful cuts underplaying some good shots
reviews.content:
The good point is that there are some thrilling good shot, but the amount of pop music used as bgm is rather absurd.
The cuts are awful, confusing, totally messed up the plot. It could have been a quite normal thriller telling the story of the modern-day Robin Hoods, but with constantly switched locations and missions, the story line remains unclear.
But what kept me through the movie is its fighting scenes as well as car racing. Quite typical Michael Bay one.
Even though it is not well made, it can offer you a good laugh if you are looking for something to laugh at.

The whole movie is a chaos, everything happens so fast. First15 mins of the movie is a mess. Unnecessary use of the background music. Actions scenes could have been better in many ways. Adding comedy to action is a complete fail. I'd rather watch transformers 10 times that this.
This movie has great soundtracks and actors i loved story and i waaaaaant 6 underground part II

Most if not all action movies defy logic and at times laws of physics. And this one is no different; it mostly defies logic and on a few occasions physics as well.
6 underground is packed with action with weak writing. Some of the dialogues were pretty annoying. For example there is a lot of emphasis on the fact that they (the main characters) are "dead" and quite a few dialogues are written to convey that message. It seemed as if the writer was trying too hard to come up with something brilliant but instead wrote some repetitive and annoying dialogues. There's a little bit of over-acting by a few characters, some cliched dialogues and somewhat predictable story. The few positives of the movie are its cinematography and sound effects.
So to sum it up, it's a one time watch and even if you don't watch it, no worries there's nothing here that you haven't seen before. Just keep your expectations low and you probably won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Rather rewatch a good movie than to spend two hours on this garbage
reviews.content: I am very happy for Michael Bay. I am so glad that he got the opportunity to make this film that he must have had the time of his life making. And to the crew. I hope you all had fun travelling to exotic locations and blowing things up. But what a load of trash this movie is. It's one fat commercial for so many brands and it takes human life and makes it worthless in the eyes of the viewer. This is desensitizying trash that no one should watch if they value what it is to be human.
Tried to watch because, Ryan Reynolds, but couldn't even get through 1hr of this piece of crap.
Interesting movie with a fun plot but it was completely ruined by that god awful "music" that just made it feel like some dumb youtube compilation video.

reviews.review_title: I was really looking forward to this movie and boy...i am glad i got to finally watch it
reviews.content: I have read some critics, that this movie is a trash and that it's the Michael Bay worst movie and that it's a bad writing and so on, so on... Like why you even say that? This movie is basically adrenalin rush, right away from the beginning. It's a great story, really great actors and actresses, really great camera and a lots of fights. Cars, guns, fights, big boats, skyscrapers, womans, blood, humor, drama... i mean...this movie has it all! And i mean from the beginning to the end! I was really pleased that it was such a great fun to watch, that i would definitely watch it again. I really recommend this movie and i hope...I HOPE! That those so called "critics" will not succede (politely said) and that there will be continuation for this movie...please NETFLIX!

reviews.review_title: Best action movie of the year
reviews.content: I went in with low expectations and genuinely enjoyed it for what it was. Cudos to Netflix, Michael Bay and Ryan Reynolds for making this. It's fun and creative action and violence. Michael Bay knows what he's doing and what his audience wants. Don't listen to the haters... I'm so tired of the over the top critics posting 1 star reviews on IMDB. This movie was fun and worth watching for what it is...

reviews.review_title: What's the hate for it's GREAT!
reviews.content: This movie is awesome! Great meaning behind it and the action sequences were amazing.

What we're expected to do here is to look at a shattered jigsaw puzzle and somehow miraculously see the complete picture. Editing so hap hazard a strobe light is calming by comparison. The team that put this movie together appeared to be running high on cocaine, caffeine and sleep deprivation.

Why?
All these other words are just because otherwise it won't be published being too short.

I dont know why the overall rating is so low! This movie freaking rocked my socks off! FULL of adrenaline, amazing actors, bad sound effects and some beautiful visuals! To top it off; they're ghosts saving the world by taking down the truly bad people that inhabit it! Great movie!

reviews.review_title: Godawful. No coherence, waifer thin "storyline". 20 minute car chase to open.
reviews.content: What an absolute pile of tosh. The opening "scene" is a 20 minute car chase. I endured 12 minutes of it, and had to fast forward.Poor attempts at pop-culture humour rather than anything hard like a "script". Padded out film with flashbacks that add 0 to the plot, or character motivations.Lasted just over an hour (fnarr fnarr).
Thank you for making this movie! Very entertaining! Soundtrack, action, plot... Loved it! Can not believe all the bad reviews. People are crazy lol Watch it!!

reviews.review_title: First 30 minutes was like watching a very long trailer.
reviews.content: I think this is my first IMDb review. I felt that strongly about it.I had to give up after 30 minutes and watched the rest the next day. I've never not finished a movie and I came close with this one.You've been warned.
How much violence, action, that modern humor and familiar scenes can you put in a movie? A lot! Not feeling connection or tension, it's just so over the top. It's not bad, just a lot.
No judgement on the people that like this film but I thought it was hot garbage. A true mess of a film in almost every respect. If you're a Michael Bay fan you will probably love it.
The way its directed is terrible, the story is terrible and its terrible

This movie answers the age of question "what if white saviour complex was a confusingly edited action movie full of plot holes", or "what if Iron Man started implementing American international politics with his own 'Mission accomplished' banner".The only saving crace is the opening car chase scene which, when the editing works, is a great example of how lower budget action movies can use confidened spaces to create character dynamics and build tension without constant explosions.

It's not a masterpiece or a great movie. It's a good movie with fun, action, interesting story and absolutely stunning effects. I cannot recall in my mind another action movie that has so real looking effects especially in casualties. Trully fun, totally deserve to watch it.

Genuinely enjoyed it. Tons of plot holes and general absurdities but it makes it all the more fun. This genre typically isn't my cup of tea but Michael Bay, in my personal experience, doesn't disappoint within his purview. It's clearly an action movie. So watch it expecting an action movie; (certainly) nothing more, nothing less. Great time with friends or even by yourself. Only wish it could be seen in a theater.

It isn't meant to be high art. It had characters who were interesting, nice locations, humor, well choreographed action, spectacle, a morality, and style. I'd certainly look forward to a sequel. It wasn't original, but originality is very, very rare. It was fun. I cared about the characters and the outcome.Ryan Reynolds played pretty much the same character he always plays, but it is a fun formula that has built great success for him.

So, I'll share the good stuff first...Ok, so now the bad stuff. No story, terrible editing, confusing, horrible character development, absolutely no cohesive storytelling, and no resolution. This film was terrible, capital T.

reviews.review_title: a lot of disappointments but a lot of action (half good half bad)
reviews.content: Well first of all the amount of product placement in this movie is more than I've ever seen there is a BMW, mercedes, alpha romeo(and a few more cars but i dont think they were put for advertisements but bmw and romeo for sure) Lavazza coffee, etc.another thing that kind of ''tilted me'' is using Abudhabi for most of the movie and stating its another country(that doesn't even exist)it's good for people who like just random action but not people who care about the details like me. so it totally goes back to preference of-course.the product placement really killed the movie, its was too much.
Worst of Michael Bay and Ryan Reynolds. Pointless film. Expected something like the awesome Bad Boys 2 or Deadpool 2.
A fun escapist movie. A Ryan Reynolds fun action thriller much like dead pool without the masks. With a special cameo from aviation gin

This movie is so rife with MKUltra garbage that it was very hard to watch. Formulaic as hell and cliche-filled to the brim. Brave military types. Check. Amazing women to the rescue. Check. Car crashes. Check. Explosives. Check. Squirting blood. Check. Evil terrorists. Check. Etc., etc..I just had this feeling that I've come to the end with this sort of nonsense. It's just not entertaining any longer.The best part of the movie was the beautiful Alfa Romeo Giulia.

reviews.review_title: A female firearms expert who flinches with every shot
reviews.content: My headline pretty much sums up this movie. It has the usual problems - an autistic love of gore as a comedic device; Michael Bay style shooting and editing; politically correct female characters who can't wield firearms properly, despite being trained killers.Looks like a movie conceived by a team from the Marketing Department, rather than something created by film makers interested in plot, drama and action.The people who made this movie aimed low, but hit even lower.
Pushed myself to finish the movie, couldn't pass 50mins mark. Big fail in a non-linear storytelling attempt. Waste of money and good talent.

reviews.review_title: Blockbuster for the small screen thank you Netflix
reviews.content: May not be for all but it was defiantly for me and worthy of a second movie or tv series. At that's what I'm hoping for.
I ABSOLUTELY LOVED EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS MOVIE AND I AM WAITING FOR A SEQUEL

reviews.review_title: First 15 mins and the magicaly morphing car
reviews.content:
Omg.
All that money and you cant even get a bit of realism right.
The car chase in the magicly morthing Alfa Romeo....
This just p##### me off..
Why cant you just get the basics right...
Lots of action and some great bits but when i see this i just cant get into the film.
The script idea was a perfect opertunity missed......
Sad

reviews.review_title: Watch it for the the Dolby Atmos effects.
reviews.content: The film is mediocre at best, nothing outstanding and normally I would have rated such a movie 5/10. However, the Dolby Atmos effects are amazing and grips you especially in the first 30 minutes. Obviously you need Atmos supporting hardware and good quality speakers.

reviews.review_title: It's Michael Bay, quit overthinking it.
reviews.content: 6 Underground is pure fun, action and comedy. If you're looking for more, scroll to the next film. If you're looking for fun action and entertainment, click play. 6 Underground delivers on all Bay standards. I have always been a fan of Bay's. Bad Boys 1 and 2, the Rock, Armageddon, The Island etc... He makes popcorn style movies. So do not expect a mind boggling film like Christopher Nolan, expect a more flashy and big explosive style film. It's great and entertaining. So sit back and enjoy a fun ride for a change.

reviews.review_title: Great movie if you just want entertainment - which I did.
reviews.content: First off, Ryan Reynolds is very Deadpool-ish in this movie, just with a bigger bank account.The props are stylish, the colours bright as hell, the explosions are too many to count (it's Michael Bay, you know what you're getting at this point) - but the sassy oneliners and quips between the cast members of the team adds to a reluctant team spirit that I found charming and really funny.This is not a profound movie. It wont offer you long journeys of self discovery with poetic dialogue, but it's not actually trying to anyway. I had an idea of what this movie was going to be when I put it on and I got pretty much what I expected. I laughed a lot through it and thought the characters were cool, especially the French assassin and Ryan Reynolds' "One". This is the kind of movie I'll be watching again.Great entertainment and the soundtrack is pretty cool too.

reviews.review_title: The most fun i have had in a long time!
reviews.content: Let me be clear. Usually i really dont like big pointless action movies and would never review such films.......But this was a amazing and highly entertaining action COMEDY with extremely satisfying politically incorrect humor, Michael Bay'ed to the absolute max.... It is on such a high level, that the bar will not be reached by others for a very long time.The whole mix makes for a very entertaining movie presented with a unique visual style, sound design and tempo. I find it very original, and would buy it on UHD disc any day.I dont understand the low rating at all. It is not deserved in my book.

First of all I like the quality of filming, the actors and important thing is the story, and I can say that the idea of ghosts is fantastic I hope to shoot a second film
6 Underground 2

Great cast and performances, especially Ryan Reynolds - he continues to pull of dark/silly humour perfectly.Production was amazing - true Michael Bay stuff indeed.Distracting amount of product placements / adverts for crap like coffee and stuff (although seeing an Alfa Romeo Quadrifoglio front and centre for a bit was refreshing instead of the usual suspects)I hope there are more of these - the cast work really well together and it's a good action flick to while an hour or two away on.

Did they let one of the stunt coordinators write this movie? It must have been purposefully written so that at no time in the movie is there a "present". It goes back, goes forward, goes sideway...what was the storyboard like?What's with everyone talking so fast, and the poor mix where you can't make out any of what they're saying? Just a poorly put together waste of money.

Seems most of the people here are giving this negative reviews because they just didn't get it. They packed a 4 hour movie into 2 hours by the way this was cut. Tiny flickers of scenes are used to tell the story instead of drawing it out. If you stop paying attention for any amount of time, you will get lost. If you follow it and understand what's going on, this is actually a great movie. I personally loved the mix of action, blood and jokes. The soundtrack to go with it was awesome and added to the intense nature of many scenes.

Well, if you want to watch an action movie and not interested in story line or anything, that's the movie you wanna watch.
It's pure 2 hours of action. There are explosions, killings, fights, drive scenes and all that stuffs.
And basically, that's all it has. There is no good story, there is stupid character development(everybody changes in a second), bad dialogues.
Action movies are fun when there is some logic, realism and good story. This has none of them.

This movie is not that bad. The story sucks and its all over the place, but it's meant to be entertaining and funny, not serious. Ryan Reynolds does a good job of making this a comedy. Its overly violent and even too much in some scenes, but it's still enjoyable nonetheless.
Personally, I couldn't finish it. Pretentious and over the top. Let's get real Mr. Bay.

reviews.review_title: Someone said if the 1st 20 mins don't impress you nothing will...
reviews.content: Well that's exactly the point where I stopped watching. If you want a nonstop action scene I suggest a 4K nature movie. Lots of action but it's just mind numbing. I like action movies, I really do but there needs to be some kind of reason to care about the characters involved in the action. After a few minutes I was rooting for the "bad guys" just to put a stop to things. Some people will probably like this but if you are looking for a movie that requires more than one brain cell find something else.
Okay, maybe not the best movie ever but I didn't expect it to be. A lot of fun over the top crazy action, so yeah, I enjoyed it more than I expected.

reviews.review_title: Fast action, great editing, awesome shots but IT'S NOT FOR EVERYONE
reviews.content: First of all: Sorry for my Englando.The part where I say "it's not for everyone" actually says it all.You have to be a fan of these kind of movies to enjoy, If you come and watch this as: "Oh, 150M$ budget, it must be good" you will be disappointed for sure. What this movie offer is not much different than John Wick. If you like fast fast action movies, this one is for you. If you like to think every specific action in a movie, you shouldn't go and watch 6 Underground, because there's nothing logical in this movie.It's a show business, and this movie offers you all the action you can't have in the real world in a great fashion.My initial rating is 8/10, I voted 10/10 IMDb because a lot of people doesn't understand what this movie is all about.

reviews.review_title: Extremely troubled messages for an action-thriller
reviews.content: This movie might be considered as a usual action thriller and actually the car chasing scenes of the opening are really breathtaking. However the outcome of the movie is extremely troubled from a moral perspective for a fiction.Yes, the main characters are encountering a cruel fiction dictator (most probably a combination of a former Soviet Union republic in Central Asia with a Syrian regime elements). However they go through and sort of promote an extremely troubled approach as to set a coup and organizing to replace the president with an extremely weak and incapable young brother and even finalizing the film with deliberate lynch against the thrown president. What do the producers want the audience to feel and take away from this film? I found this extremely troubled and morally questionable.

reviews.review_title: Big commercial or showreel Michael Bay's for kids
reviews.content:
Action for no reasons, dumb, slowmotions, close-up.
We need 6th guy..for what? Ryan R. can kill everyone alone :))Parkour guy in 2020 movie? Seriously? Jumping everywhere, shooting on skateboarding haha))
Watched a half hour if the film and did not know what was going on. Probably the worst opening to a movie I've seen. If you enjoy random action crap then you might enjoy this movie

Looks like theythink we are dumb lol. Yeah, the chopping and cutting feels like deadpool but some part of the story sinks into its own stupidity... some scenes are totally crap and it looks director force us to see this story full of mistakes while making.
As a sensible guys, it doesnt appeals to me.

reviews.review_title: Oh my gosh! What a bunch of fuddy-duddies!
reviews.content: If you don't like this movie then you just don't like action movies. Go watch something on PBS. Pure entertainment!!

reviews.review_title: Some impressive action scenes but not much else
reviews.content: Starts well, action is good. Problem is the comedy detracts from the story, both just don't work. Not to mention it's poorly put together.. MB gets the action right but not much else

reviews.review_title: Worse than green lantern, worst movie of Ryan Reynolds
reviews.content:
Worse than green lantern, IMO the worst movie of Ryan Reynolds.
This is the typical movie that focuses more on special effects, unnecessary bloodshed and difficult to follow.
This movie actually sounds the same as a Transformer movie.
I had to stop watching after one hour. It's like watching the sequels of Matrix, really bad movie

I'm going to be honest I only managed about 30 minutes before I had to turn it off so it may have picked up but scrolling through here doesn't sound like it. It's odd you get a very cinematic Michael Bay shot that abruptly cuts to something that looks like it was shot on a phone. The lack of care for continuity in the opening car chase is appalling with the driver hat disappearing and reappearing from one shot to the next. The editing and camera work made me feel sick. I can't believe Green Lantern is as bad as this.

reviews.review_title: Wish I could watch the pitch to this movie instead
reviews.content: Don't usually write reviews. This movie is like a bunch of adolescents were given a combination of Picasso level strength Absinthe and the purest Peruvian cocaine and then locked into a video editing room with the remit to make an extended MTV video for a frat party. Looks like they let the coke head edit and the Absinthe guy write the plot.Still it's Bay not Shakespeare and this is as Bay as it gets. If you like Bay with the free reign of the Netflix platform then this film's for you.

reviews.review_title: Worst movie ever. first time slept in the theater.
reviews.content: Don't spend your money or time in this movie. no story line. poor CGI. everything looks fake.
Justice League without superpower.

reviews.review_title: Come om people, it's non brainer action movie
reviews.content: If you want non brainer action movie, then this is it. I liked it, lot of action, special effects and sound effects. Watch it for fun, only fun.

reviews.review_title: Pure escapism fun with added Ryan Reynolds... a must watch
reviews.content: The film does jump around in an attempt to explain back characters of the hero's, but taken for what it is - a fun ride through a revenge action film, it does not disappoint.Action, explosions, humour, and just a bloody good ride. I enjoyed every min and took it for what it was. Fast cars, crazy chase scenes, guns, great locations and great looking men and women putting right to wrongs in the world. I hope they make more. Well done Netflix another great production to go with your other great back catalogue action films.

reviews.review_title: If the A-team was made of crap
reviews.content: This movie is like the A-team if the A-team was made of crap. 6 "good guys" kill hundreds of innocent bystandards in pursuit of killing one "bad guy." Gruesomely unfunny deaths galore. More car chases than plot with minimal attempt at character development and backstory. Attempts at humor are just not funny. Parkor... Just because.

I wonder who gave money for making this movie, dont even bother watching it. I already regret that I'll never get my 2 hours back that i wasted on this crap show. Just a series of action sequences with badly written wannabe witty lines ,no story. So disappointed that i had write this to save other people from this travesty.

reviews.review_title: Ryan Reynolds and amazing action. What's not to like?
reviews.content: The action is next level. The stunts are amazing. Reminds me of the James Bond movies of the 90s that raised the bar everytime they were released. The acting is good. The story is ok. The editing was atrocious. Didn't realize this was Michael Bay until the credits rolled. Am glad, because I was asked to judge this movie without any preconceived notions. You must have a great sound system to really enjoy this.

I had a couple of hour this t before the family gets up. Just saw the gray man which I enjoyed so I have this a go. How bad could it be with a big budget, good actors and a receptive audience. I'm not generally the picky type but I stopped watching this after 40 minutes. The scenes are high quality and full of action. But nothing makes any sense. Massive plot holes and discontinuities everywhere. Not sure who is responsible for this mess (script, editing, director) but that person should realize that they have no talent whatsoever. And apparently no understanding of how anything works. Ludicrous. Whoever invested in this movie should seriously reconsider ever working with this crew again. What a useless waste.

reviews.review_title: A movie to watch in lockdown on Friday night.
reviews.content: Everytime a car explodes I thought it gonna transform into a Autobot from transformers.

reviews.review_title: Awesome high action, great actor, overall great movie!
reviews.content: By far the Best car chase scene I've ever seen! Afterwords, it gets a bit slow for a while, hence my rating. Hard to maintain that velocity, and would probably turn out ridiculous. Overall, very pleased with this film. Could've used some more humor, but where? This is the kind of film you want to watch more than once. 😉 I really hate that 6 dies though. Liked him better than 7. Then again, I've seen him act before, so it could be that. Why don't they ever get a new driver?? That should be deemed a necessity for that team.
The CGI was good but the entire plot, acting, and "humor" was absolutely horrible. The plot made no sense, and there were several mistakes in the first 20 mins in regards to editing.

Normally, I would have fun watching movies, but a long time ago I realized that most of them are not in movies but in propaganda. In this video, the dictator in the Muslim country alone has added to the Turkish country.
I lasted 6 minutes before turning it off. Annoyingly inane and pointless, but if thats what you're into, enjoy.
A fun, action packed thrill ride that is also an incoherent mess. The car chase was more fast and furious than, fast and furious. And the stuntmen in 6 Underground are something else.
I'm glad I stuck with this movie because the 2nd hour is definitely worth it

Ever seen someone and said "Boy, your trying way to hard to look cool"? That is what this is.How cheesy is this movie. The action would have been great if they didn't exaggerate with everything. Just thoughtless action. I kept saying, that would have been cool but it was done to cheesy.

Enjoyed this so much... Great action, funny jokes and puns, lots of beautiful women. a Typical Ryan Reynolds / Micheal Bay movie. It was great ! Hope there will be sequels from this film. Everyone rating this film poorly should really get a life and a imaginenantion, its a bloody film !

It's like countless Music video join together.
Because it's have no structure and so shattered.
Just tons of close shot on the people's face.

If you're looking for a thousand explosions and a million bad guys getting shot then look no further. All the people whining about lack of plot or acting ability - ignore them. It's an action film plain and simple!
Michel, are you crazy? Ukraine Kyiv - Gasprom? WTF???!
I like it, it's political, good action scenes, nice jokes, neat dialogue and the way they ejected everything was clever.

reviews.review_title: So funny movie and action too
reviews.content: This movie is amazing and ryan acts in this movie was so good if you haven't seen it yet what are you waiting for !!

reviews.review_title: Wasted Opportunity - Boom Boom over Plot
reviews.content: This movie had a lot of potential that was totally wasted. The concept was very good and intriguing, but was almost totally ignored in lieu of numerous action scenes. The plot was also contrived and in many cases unrealistic.It was a waste of two hours and six minutes.

reviews.review_title: Okay for Netflix, but not worth your money.
reviews.content:
Fast and the furious style car chases, Deadpool-ish narration mixed with some over the top Michael Bay action.
These may sound like the ingredients for an enjoyable action movie. However the complete lack off story and emotional depth put this movie more along the lines of those unnecessary sequels.
Ryan Reynolds is occasionally funny, but not funny enough to keep me from feeling very bored trough the second half of this movie.I guess it's okay if you have low expectations and a Netflix account, but it was a lot worse then I expected.

reviews.review_title: I have rewatched this movies 4it's already!!!! LOL
reviews.content: I LOVE this movie and can't get enough of it!!! Watch it 4 urself and make up ur own mind...but you'll love it too :0>

reviews.review_title: C.I.A. Propaganda Disguised as a Michael Bay Film
reviews.content: I know it seems like just another innocuous, brain-numbing, action movie, but there have been very purposeful attempts lately to have movies/shows skirt aling real-life, global conflicts. Most of these conflicts started by us here in the good ol' U.S.A.. We love to meddle around the world and take other people's stuff. Only, we cant just take their stuff outright. That would look bad. So we need to make it look like we're in other countries because we care about the people there and we're saving them from a brutal dictator. In reality we're just there to take their resources and allow a small few to profit grossly from it, but again, we cant say that. This movie and the last season of Jack Ryan? Propaganda crap. But at least Ryan Reynolds was funny .Two stars.

Fun movie with plenty of set pieces but nothing more. It entertains just as much as it annoys. The editing, my god, the editing, by the middle of the movie I was wanting to gouge out my eyes. What a disjointed mess of a story. It distracts so much from the action and takes you out of the mood.
Ryan Reynolds was just... Ryan Reynolds and his script was nothing else.
Mediocre, even for Michael Bay.

reviews.review_title: I've watched it 3 times within the last week!
reviews.content: Highly rate it! Action packed you can't take your eyes off the screen! This movie shows parts of the action that other movies always fail to show.

Haven't seen such a rubbish movie for a long time.
I thought it might get better as it went on, but it got worse.
I know it's a fictional movie, but they could have at least made Some scenes a bit more believable, or even used better actors.

reviews.review_title: Good Action and almost as funny as Deadpool.
reviews.content: How come movies like this are not on the big screen ? There might be reasons ($$$). Anyway even at home you can enjoy the action an of course ryan raynolds aka Deadpool bigmouth :-) It could be better to be honest but you should not miss this. Action entertainment for 2 hours.

Watched it with my wife on a sunday evening and havent had that much fun watching an action movie in a long long time. Fun, great acting, filled with special effects, expensive cars and locations. Costume and music choice was on point too, couldn't ask for more. Fantastic movie choice for anyone who just wants to chill out and switch off your mind and watch some good action packed movie.

So underrated Bay Movie. I really don't get it - it has everything. Action, story, character development, retaliation, sex, smartness, lines, good acting, amazing visual fx etc etc. And, it is really different. In a good way. And really deserves a sequel - despite what som pretentious jerks are saying. 6 underground is way to good to not get a sequel! The characters in the first movie deserves another ride! They are to good to be wasted on only one movie.And yeah - the whole cast is wonderful. And it is also pretty funny full of witty lines and top class CGI and action. I am pretty sure this movie will grow and become more appreciated over the coming years. But then it is too late for a sequel. So it has to be done soon. I am pretty sure the IMDb rating will rise when people rewatch it years later or a new younger audience discover it. 6.1/10 is really a joke!

Serious? Such a dumb movie. Had to fast forward to be able to watch it till the end. Action at the beginning was good, but the end at the ship was ridiculous. Couldn't belive that this was a Michael Bay flic. Waste of time.

9/10 because no movie is perfect but....we really enjoyed this! Car chases, blazing gunfire, explosions, daredevil stunting, unexpected funny moments, and a dude's head blows up ....what's not to love? And sincerely, I hope there's more to come.
(Of course the Debbie Downers of the techies and the Nellie Naysayers of "cinematography" will have bad things to say.)
But if you like action movies and Ryan Reynolds do as we didI this Christmas Eve - kick back, chill before the fam arrives, and enjoy a good flick. Merry Christmas ya filthy animals!
