Highly recommended for action movie lover!
Awsome movie fast paced action packed love it great job everyone!!

reviews.review_title: Boy this really looks like it comes from the School of Michael Bay...oh wait....
reviews.content: Insane opening action sequences and boy it looks good with a lot of slick editing. Another popcorn action flick nothing more than that. Ryan being Ryan with peppered one-liners and some forced cringy dialogue. No sense in breakdown the rest of film...Good guys 1 Bad guys 0.

When everything is too much. Too much action, too much gag, too much flashback. It would be quite a good movie, If all these reduced by 30%. The story and the idea would be great, but the implementation... eeh...
And the last shock: it is a Michael Bay movie. I love the early movies of him (The Rock, Bad Boys, The Island) . But what happened? I'm really sorry, but this movie was boring.
An ok action movie with its highpoints, that really wants to be much cooler than it is. Could have benefitted from stealing a few pages from the book of John Wick.

reviews.review_title: It's Like Finally Seeing A Matthew Reilly Book on Screen
reviews.content: Fast, reactive, and fun. There were alot of innocent people getting killed along the way in car chase scenes--that was a little overboard and wrong and made you question being on the side of this team. But once you got past that, the fun and energy kept you on their side. It was a great diversion movie.

If you want to see a lot of fireworks when car is hiting tables and chairs than this movie is for you! :) ahh and those dying dummys.....after watching trailer i was like - omg this movie will be awsome action but... for eyes its kind of beautiful movie, acting is not bad. Dialogs and storyline is 100% bad. Disappointment.....

reviews.review_title: Most Entertaining Movie You'll Ever Watch!
reviews.content: This movie is the ultimate definition of entertainment. Everything you have ever thought of wanting to happen on screen happens in such a meticulous way that you forget about the other filmmaking criteria that traditionally make a movie great. This is definitely unforgettable and 101% recommended!

The first 20 mins is a non stop adrenaline rush.
Strap yourself in for more action and hilarious Ryan Reynolds one liners.
Don't miss this movie!!!

This has the most Michael Bay scenes ever. This is a fun action film made all the better by Ryan Reynolds and a fun supporting cast. I am hoping that they fo a follow up to go a bit deeper into these characters. It has more car chases than Ronin.

The first 40 minutes was loud, fast, violent and many times, confusing. But the final 90 minutes was a fantastic thrill ride. I give the first 40 minutes a 6 and the final 90 minutes a 9. Overall, the movie is quite fun and entertaining. I look forward to the next installment of the movie series when the 40 minute intro won't be needed and we can enjoy a great movie start to finish. A fun 8, you won't be disappointed if you watch the entire film.

It's overly produced, overly complicated, to many flashbacks, mixed up all over the place. I meet it's not a bad film it's just not a good film.
Yes the action is fairly good and it has its funny moments but it's just a bit disjointed and doesn't feel like it's been put together very well.
You never really get a handle on what's going on, one minute it's now then it's 6 months ago but you dont find that out till you see some text saying "present day" it's odd. I'm not saying it's bad but it's not great.
If you like Mr.Bay's films then you will probably think it's great, if you like film with proper structure and plot lines and a story you can actually follow and make sense of then probably not.

reviews.review_title: Headache inducing mess of an action movie
reviews.content: I thought Bay's Transformers sequels were bad enough but this goes to another level. The disorientation you get trying to follow this story with near on constant flash backs, flash forwards and location changes is a migraine of epic proportions . Add the pointless back stories for the main characters who waffle on and mumble equally pointless dialogue make you want to lie down in a dark room. I assume most of the banter should be making the audience laugh or at least chuckle. It doesn't. Even Ryan Reynolds schtick barely registers.On the action front it is jaw dropping and absolutely barmy. At times the flying, disintegrating and exploding cars are fun to watch but as much as it's polished it becomes tiresome and oddly un-exciting pretty quickly. The visual gloss is blinding at times and the overly used glam slow mo tedious. The locations are for the most part the stunning Abu Dhabi even though we are told they are Las Vegas, Hong Kong or some fake Middle Eastern country and the various gun fights and battles in exotic looking buildings and on boats make Bond and Bourne look tatty in comparison but it doesn't help the muddled story and jarring experience. On the plus side the CGI is some of the most polished you will see on the screen at the moment. But this isn't enough to make this film a likeable and entertaining action movie. And some may find the gratuitous bloody violence and gun play - not to mention the amount of innocent bystanders that seem to get maimed because of the groups antics too much for their liking.
If you like action films, ignore the negative comments and watch this movie. Not for kids or people who expect action films to be realistic. Just enjoy the ride!

This movie is fantastic. Great acting skills (obviously, being that it stars Ryan Reynolds), super intense action scenes, plot was easy to follow and made sense, awesome visual effects, and the ending was ... wow. Loved it!There were only 2 issues with this movie:
There's is no connection with the characters. The beginning of the movie stars Dave Franco as 6 aka The Driver. Very good actor and is killed off super quick. However, the other characters want to portray this as "sad" however, we just met the character. I like the actor, but I don't really identify with a character I just met 5 minutes ago. Then throughout the whole movie, Ryan Reynolds character (One) is battling an internal conflict revolving around being a rich stuck up, leaving the love of his life, trying to keep everything and everyone at a distance and not too close, etc. However, at no point in the movie do I feel for him or really identify with him. I see what the movie was going for as a character, but it was too rushed and didn't hit the mark.Second issue, is this movie is what I would title: A Man's Movie. Like the movie 300 or any transformers movie, its just a lot of action, explosions, sexy women, some comedy, etc. This is great for entertainment and I still recommend it. But don't expect anything in depth, emotional, or something requiring brain cells to enjoy. Just 2 hours of entertainment, and then move on.Still, I give it 9/10 and do highly recommend this if you want something visually pleasing, and very entertaining.

reviews.review_title: Giving this ten stars because it was by far the best movie of Covid era
reviews.content: Can't believe all of the negative Nancy's on here. This movie was great. Mission Impossible type movie. And it was well needed in 2020. This was the beat movie I've seen in this cluster F%*k of a year. I hope there is a sequel! Ryan Reynolds was awesome as well

Really good action film . Best action film I have seen in a while . I am not going to go in to detail . I am not into that hidden meaning rubbish and I didn't go to film school or like to think I did . Best of all they didn't ruin it like a lot of films by trying to make it a 12A .I loved it .

reviews.review_title: Silly show with no excitement at all

reviews.review_title: Bare-bones plot supporting slick, hi-octane good times
reviews.content:
Not sure what the deal is with the low review scores, but this is one of those movies that you watch on the big-screen, volume up, bass pounding...and just enjoy the ride.
The editing has been criticized, but for me, the editing was one of the things that made this movie so fun...it adds so much style to the production, makes it that much more slick. This is a fun movie, no question about it. The plot is there to serve up the action and that's about it...which is fine but makes this one of those movies you'll actually want to watch, rather than peek out over your cell phone once in awhile. Most of the fun to be had is in the sleekly edited, overly bombastic action scenes, and if you're missing those, you're missing the point of the movie...its what its all about.It seems as if people have reviewed this movie as if the movie didn't know what it was...who it was meant for. It wears its intent on its sleeve...it seems odd to press play on a movie like this and then review it poorly later...it knows what it is, you knew what it was, what are you doing here if this wasn't your thing?Nope, won't win any academy awards, but its obvious that a lot of attention and elbow grease went into this production...its a very well made mindless action movie that, if you don't mind that, you'll end up seeing more than once, in all likelihood.

It's interesting action movie, characters act well in accordance. The story itself is about an american billionaire and philanthropist had a group of 1, to 6 and letter 7 person help chase a criminal that authority can't touch. But trouble contact movie it unset revealed as car runace which may mind swerve the reader. It letter have it directorate.

Good fun movie same type of action you would expect from these actors. But and I mean But. The continuity director should have been shot. The opening scene with the car chase, almost turned me off. One minute there is blood not the doctor next minute it's gone then its there again... driving in parts that seem to change in a millisecond and change back, traffic busy the gone, people everywhere then no one.. for some reason focusing on a woman on a vesper and nothing. Damage disappears on the car...etc, etc, etc. Really ruins the chase scene and that's the tip of the iceberg.... if you don't care, then watch it. It was just a three star and that's just.

reviews.review_title: I thought dumb popcorn movies was at least supposed to be fun
reviews.content:
Was this movie supposed to be anything other than a dumb action movie. No, obvoiusly not. Its michael bay. So why is it so extremely boring.
Aside from the dialogue being awful the story not making any sense, it is just a simply a boring movie. The action scenes are just random cuts to peoples faces and the car in wherever part of the city its coked up editor wants it to be. There is no coherence. The music was selected by a 12 year old watching youtube videos all day. The humor was cringy, and the fact that it is over the top on purpose doesnt make it less annoying. It is obvious that michael bay went in with the intention to make the most michael bay movie ever, and the result is a bad movie. It being purposefully bad, makes it nonetheless bad. I see people saying it is fine to watch on a friday night after work with your brain turned off, but honestly i would rather put a bullet trough my brain than watch this movie again

reviews.review_title: Who the heck does a heist with a neon green car???

LIME GREEN... no, not believable. Try red, white, realistically, if I was doing a heist I'd use matte black. The film got better after the opening sequence, but that really killed the film for me. Please don't buy a new Alfa. It's garbage. Lease it so you don't have to deal with maintenance.

The movie is around 2 hours

reviews.review_title: Too all over the place and too hard to follow

Tiring, not funny, completely absurd, repetitive, banale.
A film with no story nor sense at all. Don't waste your time.
The story line is good, but the side mirrors on green car at the start kept coming back after been broken by truck.
I really will put together a film. Full of a lot of heart. Lotta action. Some classes sex. And all-around great message The EVIL bastard gets it at the end.
Expect nothing and enjoy it. It has some fun action scenes that are refreshingly cool. Not a "smart" movie so just chill and blow off steam.

reviews.review_title: Michael Bay makes a parody of Michael Bay films
reviews.content: A reviewer here described this as "the most Micheal Bay movie Micheal Bay ever Micheal Bayed" and I couldn't agree more. I hope the haphazard nature of my review will reflect well with how haphazard the film is itself. No real story, senselessly arranged cuts that have no semblance of order, corny lines, random (albeit beautiful) international locations, mix-matched music choices, destructive car chases and explosions everywhere. I mean, EVERYWERE! Car hits a wall? Explosion. Rebar falls onto ground? Explosion. Van parks in a field? Explosion. Man falls down? EXPLOSION!I mean look, I love Bay's action flicks and explosions but this is just too much. It gets tedious just a few minutes in. I never though I would say this but there IS such a thing as too much action in a single film. The potentially thrilling car chase for example, became inane with abnormally vast quantities of carnage and blood. The film could have done without the over-the-top parkour and corny humor that makes little sense. The score makes it hard to figure out who they were really trying to appeal to. One scene they make fun of millennial and the next, they choose music from internet memes. They try to balance this with humor that relies on repetition.There is almost zero character building or a hint of originality. In fact, Ryan Reynolds is an almost exact duplicate of his role in Deadpool, just a little more politically correct. The rest are as characterless as they come.The pace, is too fast. Quite like those 'XYZ in 10 minutes' YouTube videos, the flick feels like a shortened summary version of what could have been a 12 episode TV mini-series.The only way I can explain away this spawn of a film is that either Michael Bay has lost it and gone senile way too early or this was some kind of a parody. Watch it if you have nothing else to watch and just want to see some Acton with friends and popcorn. Otherwise move on and watch something else.

reviews.review_title: What earth is the storyline here?!!
reviews.content: Great action. But this was the most scattered film I have ever watched!!! Every scene was all over the place! Really disappointed.
First 15 min full of mistakes. Car damaged, car not damaged, wairs a cap, not a cap... so on and so on... not a good beginning for the movie.

reviews.review_title: Ineterestin at fist but turned into propaganda
reviews.content: I was intrigued for the first moments because this looked liked a spy movie. Then it turned into something else and ended up being a rescue movie in the Middle East, of some sorts, I guess.
The movie is a high budget no brains and no story piece of sh#t!!! Its a actor carrier destroyer...shame on you Ryan Renolds...

I find '6 Underground' to be supremely entertaining. The car chases and action scenes are top notch. The comedy is perfectly timed. And I love how nothing goes as planned, increasing the awkward humor or intensity at times.

30 minutes of messing about trying to be Deadpool, before it settles down and gets on with the story.
Product placement is annoying and intrusive and interrupts the flow of the film.
The story is predictable but the concept is fun. The action is big and loud and lacks excitement while the cast are good and do as well as they can with what they've got. It was entertaining as a popcorn flick. I think it could be more and, strangely, want to see a second film. It could become an action equivalent to Fast and Furious.

I love action movies. This is not an action movie...it's a headache. It looks pretty good, and if you surrender all your faculties, you should be able to make it through to the end. That said, what Michael Bay has done here is take all the action cliches, product placement and cheesy (read: unfunny) one liners he was never allowed to use elsewhere, and put them in a blender. What comes out of the blender is a supercharged high protein mush with Ryan Reynold's face stuck on top. If all you want is to switch off and enjoy some car chases, then be my guest...but not for me.

reviews.review_title: Same character as in Deadpool, without the costume, plot or decent humor
reviews.content: Sigh, hopefully Ryan avoids this typecast in the future. Ultimately this was unwatchable and I quit halfway (I can count on one hand the films I didn't finish - I even got to the end of Ishtar).

reviews.review_title: 2 stars for the actors and the crew
reviews.content:
All of the cinema business are based on one essential thing "storytelling". And every story build their structure on the basement of the story. So you need a good footing.
There was none in this movie. No basement, no footing. So it was a very bad storytelling. Result is very bad movie.
I did try to watch it for fun. Even If I ignore the cause and effect connection it was no fun. So if you got home after a tiring workday and wanna watch this and fill your brain with bull crap, you must be working in a very very very bad job. You should quit. I respect the crew of this movie and salute them. They did a good job on make-up.

reviews.review_title: This is a very well done bad movie
reviews.content: All the action you'd expect from a Michael Bay Movie. It might have been enjoyable with a script that wasn't totally lame. The actors did a good job with what they had to work with. But, even Ryan Reynolds couldn't save this movie, filmed in Turdistan. My browser thinks I spelled that wrong. I disagree. When I first looked at the reviews on the morning of the 13th of December, it was rated 8.9 by a total of 57 people. As I write this, at 2:30 am, on the 14th, it's been rated by 6,400 people and stands at 6.5. I expect it will keep dropping. I have no axe to grind. Not a hater. Just really expected a much better movie.

reviews.review_title: A bit too long for a youtube video
reviews.content: There's approximately 120 minutes too much of it. What is left, would make an average "people are awesome" youtube video. What I liked most is the color of the car.
I couldn't even follow what was happening the first half of the movie. So many cuts I'm dizzy. The second half was at least coherent.

I went to watch this movie because I love Ryan Reynolds and his 1 liners. Usually his movies are 4th wall breaking or have some type of hidden depth to mix in with the action and comedy. There were more plot holes in this movie than I could have ever imagined. The direction was horrible. The acting was horrible (almost no witty Ryan Reynolds lines and nothing positive to mention in any of the other performances). The production clearly showed a budget and nothing else. But, the worst factor about this movie was by far the script. The most hollow, un-relatable and non convincing characters possible. From wardrobe changes mid scene, to backstories that dont add up, to foreshadowing that never amounts to anything, to random switches in character traits with no prompting this was a shameful finished product. I don't know what they paid to cast Reynolds, but it's the only reason I even finished watching this.
Compared to Fast n Furious this was epic. Hopefully the next one comes soon
Ryan Reynolds can do no wrong here in this loud, convoluted, explosion filled mess. But on the flip side, it's an enjoyably loud, explosion filled mess

You would think that directors would know better than to start a movie with a long, CGI car chase. But I guess standards are lower for Netflix originals.I'm only 6 minutes in, we're still in the car chase, and I already feel comfortable delivering a 2 star rating. It comes off as an attempt to emulate the quirky kineticism of Guy Ritchie, but it's... Michael Bay. It's obvious pandering done with a sloppy hand that made me angry and indignant in no time flat. I'll revisit this review if I can bring myself to finish watching it, and if finishing it actually reveals anything other than what it's already beaten me over the skull with.**Update**I finished it. For some reason. It was personally insulting start to finish. People in designer clothes wearing sunglasses in exotic locales, walking away from explosions in slow motion. Totally trite and derivative. Not even good background noise or schlock entertainment. Avoid.

reviews.review_title: What's with all the bad ratings. Really enjoyed it

Pure Michael Bay Insanity.ADHD plot-that is impossible to follow.Ryan Reynolds, always on point and master entertainer.Melanie Laurent..The BestQuite Possibly The Worst Soundtrack ever ...EVER!Movie could actually improve without such a terrible soundtrack.The songs in this movie dont work.Please dont allow the guy or team to ever choose songs for movies ever again.OMG THE SOUNDTRACK WAS AWFUL!Great action packed film.

reviews.review_title: Too ridiculous for an action movie
reviews.content: I love action movies. Put your brain in a box. Unbelievable car chases, bullets flying but nobody gets shot, thin plot lines. That's exactly how 6 Underground starts, with a little bit of back story and character introduction. Cars explode and flip over around them. One of the characters bleeds profusely yet doesn't lose consciousness, while another tries to stem it during the wild chase. At one point we have an amusingly done typical scene of avoiding running over a mother with baby, and two dogs. After 30 minutes of car chase, with cars, Vespas and people flying, I got fed up and stopped the film.

I'm grew up as a huge movie buff but these last few years I just get so board with most movies. Then finally I watched this one. I enjoyed it so much and looking forward to #2 or them turning it into a tv show, that I just created this IMDB account just to give it a 10.
It doesn't surprise me that we either really love the movie or don't care for it. Reading the comments from the people who don't care for it, seem to be people that just can't follow a lot of moving parts? I feel like someone like my parents in their 70s might get confused watching this. Or maybe the viewers who didn't like it were on their phone and watching the movie at the same time so they couldn't follow along? I loved the little touch of the slow motion scenes and one-liners because they make the movie more tangible for me.

reviews.review_title: Ryan Reynolds: good; Michael Bay: very bad
reviews.content:
I like Ryan Reynolds, that's why I gave 5 stars.
The first 20 minutes (action, cars chasing and explosions) are BORING. Michael Bay's editing is horrible. Every 10 seconds of movie you can count 7 different shots.
Cinema and action sequences are something (very) different.

reviews.review_title: No story, needless violence and scene cuts
reviews.content: This movie is a stereotypical Michael Bay classic. There is no flow to this movie at all.The story is mind numbingly jumpy and the plot holes are wider than a dinner plate, the dialogue is constant cheesy one-liners and is useless in developing context to what is actually happening on screen.My friends and I timed each camera angle and the duration it was shown on screen; the average time was 3 seconds before it switched to a different angle. This made it incredibly difficult to follow and just annoyed me.This movie is basically a mix of the terminator, fast and furious and any over the top action movie you can think of, only dumber. This movie makes the expendables look like a nature documentary.To Michael Bays credit, this movie is so bad that it is good. That is the only draw card.

Reynolds does a good job and I hope he is really well payed for this.
But Michael Bay vomited all over the movie. The beginning literally gave me vomit inducing moments. The camera is like 5mm from everyones face while just loud noises and gore happen.
It's worse than what you expect of Michael Bay.
It's like Michael Bay but in bad .... I dont get why this guy is still allowed to do movies.I think this wouldve been a better movie if it was filmed by Ryan Reynolds holding an iPhone.Even the movies "message". The end.. their finale.. is something very immoral.. a dangerous message... lynching someone is wrong and in this movie its being portrait as something right.

Aight so it was some crazy mindless action and sure Innocents got caught in the cross fire, but for me I think that is actually more realistic than some fast and furious, superhero movie made for the big screen in which they carry on their activities, such as car chases, or go full force to get the bad guy and not get rewarded with real Innocents as collateral damage. Realistically bad people surround themselves with good people. It just how it is. Plus, I enjoy me some crazy action, are there any other kinds worth watching? Bring on the sequel!!!

reviews.review_title: Trying to be a shiny John Wick
reviews.content: Watching this crap made me want to watch all three John Wick films. This is a try hard version shiny bad film. Netflix wasted $150m on this?
After having such huge sucess with Deadpool, Ryan Reynolds can afford to be picky about the roles. Maybe The Green lantern wasn't an unfortunate accident after all.

reviews.review_title: Fast-paced plot, silly action, good fun in general
reviews.content: Yes the action is over the top but honestly that's kind of the point! I thoroughly enjoyed this movie, lots of laughs and the plot was great tbh - who doesn't like a good-guys-kicking-bad-guys-asses storyline?? If you want something fun with great action and fast-paced storyline, just watch it. Great craic

reviews.review_title: Enjoy the action ride, leave the Sundance comments to yourselves!
reviews.content: Amazing cinematography! Full action pack and fun, full of humor! I dont understand the low points, what do u people expect man, its a action movie with loads of sarcasm, go watch bloody festival movies if u are so obsessed about storylines!! God, seriously i cant take these artistic review wannabes!
One among the worst movies I've ever seen. A big mess, from start untill the end. Did they want to be funny? They didn't. Fortunatelly I didn't pay to look at it.

reviews.review_title: Disjointed, action without story, waste of talent and money
reviews.content: I don't even know where to start on this review.And that's my review.But...flash back. I started watching this movie and had high hopes based on the cast and Micheal Bay's involvement. My hopes were dashed not more than 2 minutes into the film.Flash forward to about 50 minutes in, and it still made no sense. Non-stop action without a story.After about 25 minutes, I sort of understood what was going on, but then after another 2 minutes, I will get lost again.90 minutes into the film I will be good.After about 40 minutes, the action really made no sense. Still.But to get back to where I was...Where was I?That pretty much sums up how bad this movie was/is.
In-comprehensive mess which I couldn't bring myself to watch all the way through. Way too boring, confusing and hard to follow. I think people only watch it because of Ryan Reynolds. Not recommended.

reviews.review_title: If you have reached the bottom of Netflix this is your movie!
reviews.content: If you find yourself in a bind and have seen any decent movie on Netflix and there is nothing left, I then recommend this movie. I powered thru this with the handy use of a the fast forward button. I found myself how Netflix had so much talent with this movie on why is it sooo horrible!! How do you fail with Ryan Reynolds!!!!
This was a Transformers movie - without the Transformers. Great action - dreadful editing.

Well,what triggered me to wonder was what they spent on the budget, because they Jacked up Italy pretty good.
Lots of action,but it seemed like the movie line was written by a 12 year old..
Not an Oscar winner but it was fun to watch. My family laughed and enjoyed it a lot. Lots of action and cool special effects. Just kick back and enjoy and don't be judgy.
Good movie to watch in wallmart while choosing Your TV

reviews.review_title: Locations are awesome, video quality is amazing, but what was that?
reviews.content:
I'm not going to review beautiful Italian scenes or the sharp picture of this movie. Was that a movie at all? It looked as some beautiful youtube footage where some bloggers tried to filmed a movie. They knew how to shoot nice images, they had all the gimbals, but it was their first video in non youtube format. They did their best and failed miserably.
Ryan Reynolds, was that you or your clone? If that was the real you, how have you happened in that piece of art?
I am an avid watcher of action movies, but this is the worst one I've ever seen. So disappointing too because I usually love Micheal Bay

Silly, from start to finish. Chock full of cliches, unexplainably combustible vehicles and second-rate wannabe Ritchie/Tarantino cinematography. Honestly I couldn't get past everything else awful about it to gather an honest opinion about the storyline. Also, everything jumped around and moved so fast in the beginning that it was hard to get a good look at anything. I only caught glimpses of the action at any one time, exacerbated by the intermittent involuntary rolling of my eyes. How many times must this movie be made?

I was completely engrossed in the film. Ryan Reynolds character was sarcastic, comical, and all around badass! I was laughing out loud one minute and gasping at the bloodshed the next. This movie had everything to keep me wondering what was happening next. I may not be a professional movie critic but I do know what it takes to keep me wanting more, and this film had all of that and more. I am hoping they make this into a sequel and keep going. Thanks Michael Bay and cast for an entertaining couple of hours.

reviews.review_title: Relax people - IT'S an ACTION MOVIE!
reviews.content: Lots of fun and our family enjoyed the flashbacks that gave insight into how they all got together ... as opposed to the Marvel movies that go around in groups picking up each person (cue a fat drunk THOR - didn't need to see that in this lifetime) ... the characters have personalities, the slapstick sarcasm is believable and there is no talking raccoon. To those who got upset that so many innocent people were killed, can we refer back to all the Transformer movies, the Avengers, or maybe even a Ghostbusters movie. The visual effects were better than I've seen in any action movie lately and it was definitely more of a nail biter than Ocean's 11 or even a Fast and Furious. The eyeball, the falls, the flashbang in the guy's mouth, the magnet trick with the phone, and on and on ... it was awesome. I would definitely have paid for it in the theater - worth it! Better than what Disney has done to Star Wars - big money to watch the main characters all roll over dead and then in the Avengers, we had a cameo parade of characters at the end. 6 Underground has my vote all day - bring on the sequels! I'll watch.
Despite some glaring flaws I enjoyed it. I think though that had Ryan Reynolds not been along for the ride it would have fallen over.
Only lasted 30min with this garbage and it felt like 2hours. Do not bother with this movie. I give it to because of Ryan Reynolds but he cant save this abomination.

This Netflix movie is just fine for the year. Not as good as Old guard and Extraction but entertaining none the less.For a year when no good movie could be released in theatres this is a good enough movie from the comfort of your couch.The opening car chase scene was awesome. Big action and bad editing as you would expect from Michael Bay.Ryan Reynolds' acting was good but except him everyone else gave a very forgettable performance and I don't even remember the names or the numbers of the other main characters.This movie is just OK

Great Movie, Good Cast, Good Music.If you enjoy any of the newer Mission Impossible and the newer Fast & Furious then I definitely recommend this movie.Good Story which does build up characters individual stories of most of the team but with plenty of action and building the plot the movie is just actioned packed especially the boat magnet scene.Hope there is a 6 Underground 2

reviews.review_title: I can enjoy dumb action... but not this.
reviews.content:
Welcome to Michael Bay's wet dream.Unlimited explosions, bizarre transformer like noises when things explode, pointless characters, worse storyline...
Now as my title said I am able to enjoy even the dumbest action movies... fast & furious franchise 1 through 8, John wick etc... but not this.Insufferable choppy storyline with cut scenes seemingly for no reason. Characters you don't care about. It's garbage.It's like mission impossible meets the losers.And all to kill 1 bad guy. Unless you have 2 hours of your life you simply must waste... then don't watch this.

reviews.review_title: It's fun and action packed...Romantics change the channel
reviews.content: Not able to understand the negative review....It's fun and action packed...if you are for slow romantic drama...change the channel.

All over the place. Starts with a crazy long action scene before you're invested in the movie whatsoever, not that you'll ever get invested. Non-linear and nonsensical with horrible writing and just a weird vibe in general, and random sex scenes that add nothing.

I loved it and I'm not even a big fan of this type of film. I liked the mindless implausibility and humor. Bay is the undisputed master at automobile mayhem and the stunt work, both auto and human was just awesome here. Ryan Reynolds was perfect for this film because of its comic book sensibility and he excels at that type of serio-comic banter. The picture quality was phenomenal - supposedly HD but it looked more like 4K on my screen. There are tons of really great movies out right now but sometimes you need one like this that just allows you to be a willing participant in the suspension of disbelief; to sit back and enjoy the ride.
A tasteless cring fest with some cgi. Deadpool would be offended.
Can't waste anything else on it. But can't submit the review without adding more. There have been "nothing new" movies, but this isn't those. I hope I don't have to write more.
I saw it was produced by Michael Bay, Immediately thought to myself "He doesn't make bad movies" Well.............I was wrong! This movie was absolutely horrible!

reviews.review_title: Great action, but everything else is meh.
reviews.content: I think to many people tuned into this expecting a deep story and serious movie.It's just stupid fun, over the top action, good effects and set pieces.There is a few bits that could just be completely cut from the movie, these sections just want to give you a story as to why the main characters are doing what they are doing and they drag on little. There are other bits that do carry the film in more serious light sometimes which are quite unexpected due to its goofy nature.For the action, effects, laughs and few serious scenes I give it a 7.
Storyline is poor it jumps from scene to scene without much relevance. 90% of the film is them getting chased in a car that seems to be invincible.
But very stupid. Not for rewatch. Really funny movie, but really not so interesting.
Some good action scenes, but the story line is all over the shop floor, failed attempt at clever script writing. Wouldnt recommend it to anyone to be fair.
Unexpectedly and thoroughly enjoyable! What a thrill ride!

reviews.review_title: OK movie ruined by terrible editing.
reviews.content: This movie would probably have been OK if they had spent more time on story, less on actionscenes and hired someone without ADD to edit it.

Masses of great action and really funny lines. Was not expecting this at all. Watching it again tonight with my wife this time. The cover kind of throws it off, making it look like a bit of a B movie. Not at all. Buckle up.

reviews.review_title: Political advertisements of aggressor country is present
reviews.content: Why on Ukraine - Kiev scene used poor soviet Union unknown location with internal rusian brand gasprom? Are who made this scene don't know that rusia making aggression against Ukraine and this is not comparable at all or why else political advertisments is present in 6 Underground movie?

reviews.review_title: Acquitance talking about his cousin in tenth rows mother in laws girlfriends friends husband
reviews.content: That is how the storyline goes. Mixed pieces that it hurts to make a storline in your head, bad cuts which dont go wirh the budget that the movie had, action too fast, communication like in a videogame. I dont expect an action movie to be a masterpiece, but this is practically unwatchable. So many flaws and eye capturing mistakes. If you appreciate decent movies with actual story telling i'd wonder if you can sit through this waste of money...
This movie makes me want to overthrow the government :)

reviews.review_title: Incredible!! Fast and the furious meets Deadpool humour!
reviews.content: Such a good movie! A rollercoaster ride from start to finish, This was one of those action movies that kept me sucked in right from the off. Great storyline to follow effects and humor all the way through, what's not to like!! The film was shot in amazing locations and the cast nailed it... Definitely watching again!!

reviews.review_title: This is basically the TikTok of action movies
reviews.content: Chaotic scenes, vapid plot... This movie will work against your instincts but somehow feel successful nevertheless. On the bright side some of the action scenes are the most visceral I've seen. Impressive work, but not a great movie. And Ryan Reynolds proves that he's really, really great - at playing Ryan Reynolds.

Entertaining yet typical Michael Bay movie. Good action that reminds me of a Deadpool without costume film. Predictable with a few bloopers just in the beginning alone. I like some of the angles Bay took in filming this. A bit over the top on some stunts but plausible on most scenes. All said, entertaining.
The movie is boring, confusing and no obvious catch. And it's not funny, tries to, but fails.

reviews.review_title: Why not film in actual locations
reviews.content: Action scenes were great. While the movie didnt make much sense in the first place, it was really bizarre how half of the movie was showing various places in Abu Dhabi, trying to deptict various locations like Las Vegas or Hong Kong.If you spend that much money on a movie you should at least film in the proper locations.
I see 150mil dollars on nothing, cut scenes with no sens, editing very weak, and story irellevant
What an stupid movie, why a ghost need to die again? Netflix is crazy or something? Need to stop this kind movie production
Action packed and funny. The concept of doing what is right by finding a way to accomplish what the law cannot or will not do is exciting, and the cast is beyond entertaining. I want another one!

I hated this movie the first time round, I didn't know it was a Bay film so was expecting more tag I ought to have. I'm a story girl so the razor thinnes and nonsensical nature of the story was ripe for peppering with snarky comments and snorts of disbelief. All of the characters that aren't Ryan Reynolds are kind of meh and even he seems a little off in this. As a person with a permanent tan I fully resented the whole rich white saviour bs.Second time around the movie is way more fun. I knew not to question anything and came prepared to roll with it. I really enjoy the action scenes and happily watch it with my partner.. The only thing that would make it better would be for all of the story to be stripped so we can watch an action reel.
Already lost interest after the first 25 min.... typical Bay blowing up stuff sjizzel

It amazes me that movies like this are still being made. I watched it in two sittings because it was to bad to do in one.
The story, cliches and jokes are something that could be expected coming from the mind of a 7-year old kid. I don't think there was one single scene where I didn't cringe and face palmed in front if the TV and kept repeating "what?", "why?".
I'm giving it an extra star or two because of the nice looking cgi, and some unexpected action sequences.
But in the end, this is just horrible.I predict Deadpool will have to visit Ryan Reynolds in another time travel scene soon.
Great street senes BUT Over acting and cheesy lines. Very bad ending of mob rules and revenge.
This movie is full of profanity, unbearable and unnecessary.
Enjoy it's funny and awesome I I'm very glad that i watched it i thought it's boring but no very nice

I noted those after watching first 10 mnts only.The Mirror returned after it was crached by a truck at 05:47 .So it is amazing new technologies.08:00 blood bleeding covers the doc's face then after 2 seconds disappears .She said it was red blood not transperent .

reviews.review_title: Really Good, login and give it a Try for sure!
reviews.content: Yes ok this is indeed very much a Michael Bay movie with his personal take on action, however in saying this there is indeed some good story and of course action here. Long story short I thoroughly enjoyed the movie, it's not a 10/10 but it is nowhere near the low scores it is getting. 8/10 hope they indeed make another!

The film is really bad, full of mistakes and editing and scene cuts that doesn't make sense at all, it was HARD to watch. I do get it that this Bay's work, but its not fun anymore, all these explosions and car chase and heavy sense of humor.

reviews.review_title: Entertaining and adrenalinic, very nice choice
reviews.content: As always, don't listen to the critics and take a look for yourself. This movie is funny, adrenalinic, great views and action scenes. All the characters are fun and relatable. The product placement scenes are a bit cheesy but what the hell, who cares. Hope they do a sequel to see some more from the past lives of the 6.

reviews.review_title: Yes to a sequel! Duh... I really loved it!
reviews.content: Come on.... stop picking apart this movie! It's an action film. Entertaining as Hell! Love all the characters and all their specialities. I dont care who you are, everyone loves some kind of action. Who doesn't love to watch Parkour! In general, why wouldn't you want SOMEONE saving the world! It is a new kind of Batman, rich behind the scenes with great tech! I want a sequel! See where this plot can take the characters!!! It can become better and better. Everyone stop treating this as a literary masterpiece and instead an action movie on steroids and go from there!!! Ridiculous I missed this movie in 2019. So glad I watched it tonight 2022!!!!

reviews.review_title: A phi slama jama movie, fast-paced with lots of car crashes, smoking killing scenes, and larger-than-life action
reviews.content: If you are looking to lose yourself in a movie and be watching action scenes exploding like the 4th of July, then this is your movie. It's not particularly good or bad. It's a high-octane, in-your-face bad-ass bad boy and girl movie. People get shot; people get their heads blown off, with lots of car chases that end spectacularly with some spilt milk here and there. That's the formula. Sit back and roller-coaster with it. At times the action steamrollers you. It is that fast-paced. A group of killers, hi-tech folks, hot chicks, and all of them enigmatic, all got together through an invitation-only process. They do "charitable" work, making the world a better place by taking out hard-to-reach, hard-to hit undesirable human beings who would make everyone happy by being killed. So what's wrong with the movie? Nothing really. Take it or leave it, on the TV, and that's really all there is to it. I liked it. My wife did not and hid under the blanket so much she fell asleep. This is definitely a guy's movie. See it and decide for yourselves.

reviews.review_title: A perfect movie for those who don't care about movies
reviews.content: Another Michael Bay mess made for an audience that just dosn't care about what they watch.

Crazy editing that went the way of the dodo, stylish Miami-vice look, over the top parkour and pulsating music, quick quips and the shallowest characters ever.Enjoy the action. No allegorical interpretations here.

Amazing action scenes, I loved cinematography.
Very realistic scenes, unexpected twists and full swag movie,.BGM and sound drops are awesome

I love Ryan Reynolds in nearly all of his movies. I can enjoy a Bay movie on a no-brainer night. This however.. This is rediculous. This is not a movie. It's an extensive piece of (cgi) commercial for every Big Brand willing to sponsor. Bay seems to have totally lost it too. Lame conversations, lame oneliners and an unseen ammount of next level product placement (just full focus on logos really) make this one of the most disappointing movies of 2019.

Loved it - watched it 3x already. Why? Because it's all about the larger than life action and the underdogs that make it happen. It's all about distraction from the real crap in life - yes, it's an opiate and why we watch action films. Can't wait for the next one. Ryan delivers dialogue as fast paced as the film.
Action packed , great sarcasm , explosive fast n furious style driving total destruction through the streets and more , with a smile !!

I would have choice, I would rate it -10/10
The movie it's over. If you guys noticed the mirror of the green car at the beginning got crash and then in the other scenes it was right there on the car. I don't like those kind of movies that they think the audience are stupid. You gotta be professional next time 6 underground.
Ok at first I'll admit there was a bunch of random nonsense going on, but once it picked up it picked up good and I thoroughly enjoyed the rest of it.

reviews.review_title: A ton of action and explosions.
reviews.content: So many people on here hating this movie giving it one star. Probably the same type of folks who sat there and watched the Irishman and thought it was good. This is a movie that distracts you from the everyday bull. If you want some over-the-top action and just unwind after a long day I highly recommend it. If you are super uptight with a stick far up your rear you're coughing spliters then go with something that is all about how it's "well written" 😆
Turn it up, all action man film❤ easy to watch with fantastic action scenes, absolutely loved it.

If you like to see people falling off tall buildings, this movie is for you. An endless opening chase scene accompanied with loud & annoying music. Watched the whole thing because I had beer. Can't believe Ryan Reynolds did this. Melanie Laurent is hot though.

Must be the most brainless action movie I've seen in years. It feels like this is made up out of preset story lines. The stunts are incredible and repulsive at the same time with to many limbs of innocent pedestrians flying around. Just another pre chewed action movie.

It's my first review of any movie on imdb because I wanted to make people aware just how bad this movie was.... I rely solely on imdb ratings, so I was obliged to aware my fellow cinephiles to not see this movie, because it's a waste your time.

Cool music - Ridiculous dialogue
Great cast - Huge waste of talent
Impressive special effects - Plotholes as big as the movie budget
Slick editing - No plot to speak of
Cool stunts - Two lost hoursThis review is about twice as long as the movie script!

Fun action thriller just enjoy it
Ryan & Michel Bay did a good job here so much funny talks along with high action scenes.. and a good climax.. loved it

reviews.review_title: Reading Goofs section here in IMDB is all the review you'll need
reviews.content: I was keen for a couple of hours of escape when I set myself up in bed to watch this movie. The kids were asleep. I had no work desperate for my attention for the first time in months. I just wanted to relax and enjoy a good movie.Instead, I quickly forgot I was watching one of my favourite actors and became initially frustrated and then amused by the number of errors in this movie. From hanging out a window in a close up shot yelling, "baby baby baby" while in the long shot Ryan is in the car. To blood squirting onto a face and then not being there. Bad edit after bad edit quickly overshadowed everything.Then there's the fact we were halfway through the movie and it still felt like they were introducing the characters and premise of the movie.Then there's the character flaws, the plot inconsistencies, the odd decisions like a death leading to the lead saying now he needed to recruit a new member but then replacing the loss of that skill set with a completely different skillset: seemingly just to keep the number in the group at six? I could write so much more but it would take me longer than it took to watch the movie and I'd probably need to rewatch it to get some of the details right and that ain't happening. Suffice to say the problems really do go on and on.But worst of all - and I mean this is THE thing which is most worrying about the whole movie - it looks like they've left things open for a sequel. Please, no. Do another Bad Boys or something.

We saw an average movie , An interesting series about entertainment for viewers , It has good action scenes , Superstar actors such as Ryan Reynolds and Peyman Maadi play the role , Throughout the film, it transmits positive energy to the viewer

reviews.review_title: The editing is jumpy and confusing
reviews.content: I know it's a Michael Bay movie but the editing style, which similar to the recent Transformer movies, was giving me a headache. Random cuts make no sense whatsoever, and mess with the storytelling so there's nothing memorable about this movie at the end.

What a waste of time and money.
Bad direction, bad script and a very bad cutting.
The movie has a few good scenes, but the dialoques are really stupid, even the complete story.
I don't know, when Michael Bay made his last good movie (it is a long time ago) but now he is on the buttom of his career.
3 points because of the good scenes, especially at the high tower.
A full package of thrilling comedy and action and entertainment..the best part is the driver when it took a turn to museum,comparing the height of the statues part

Everything the 1/10 reviews say here is absolutely correct - the premise is ridiculous, it is style over substance, there are a ton of product placements, etc. But: this movie is just plain fun, the action sequences legitimately set a new bar, I couldn't believe how good they are. Up to you to decide if the latter outweighs the former.

reviews.review_title: The best movie i have ever seen if it was a 15 minutes movie
reviews.content: The first 15 minutes was like the best thing in the world like 100/10 , good action and a lot of jokes but after that something terrible happend and from there the rest of the movie was just okay so overall its a 6/10 but now i cant stop watching the first 15 minutes of it each days

This is 2 hours of loud loud loud, explosions and no development of character of any value.
And there's soooooo much product placement you could turn it into a drinking game!
I wanted to like this but it is , in a word , Souless.
The cinematic equivalent of a hyper animated corpse. Shame.
Literally just a couple of hours of explosions around a poor storyline.A wanna be dead pool type movie that just isn't up to much !

reviews.review_title: why watch this when you could watch something else
reviews.content: Wow Ryan!! Where do I start. What a movie - all 6 mins 54 that I got through. Would not recommend.
I hope this was the last of the -90's MTV cut movies ever.

Dear Ryan...We love you very much but there is a limit to the "Deadpool" act we can take... you have started going down Green Lantern lane and monotonous acting with this gem of a bad movie. It was extremely excruciating to watch.

reviews.review_title: Perfect movie full of horrible mistakes
reviews.content:
Dear director, havent you noticed that after a lorry crashes a car and hit its mirror and then the mirror broken, the mirror should be broken!
Yes actually you kept the car clean and neat after several crashes. I want to watch a movie not an advertisement to how amazing this car is : even if crashed she return to its normal state within a second.

I like Ryan Reynolds, I wanted to like this movie. If Michael Bay didn't spew his stank all over this thing it may have worked. It gave me a headache within the first 10 minutes from the nonstop action seizure going on. The blatant disregard for consistency is boggling. 1 sec a car is had its whole side scraped off the next second it looks like it just drove off the lot. And it could not be more obvious. Maybe if bay had a clue what he was doing maybe he could actual film something in sequence or at least admit time and space do exist. Ugh, Hurt to watch.

reviews.review_title: Everything you could want in a Bay-directed action flick
reviews.content: I mean what else do you need to know? Great action, complicated plot, Reynolds classic wit and comedy, & Oscar-worthy editing and sound mixing. A great time.

reviews.review_title: Fun action movie with a meh story
reviews.content: Most Michael Bay movies look good, and this is no exception. The camera work is reminiscent of Cloverfield at times which is jarring, and it does have a lot of fast cuts, but the action sequences are well done. Theres a fun group of characters, a nice backdrop of a story which is pretty standard action film fare. Never will this win any type of award, but it's a movie where you can turn off your mind for 2 hours and laugh. If you are looking for something that makes you think, this isnt for you. But for those looking for a popcorn action movie, this is worth a watch.
The action scene take so much time. The plot is so confusing and it one of the worst films I have ever seen.
Like a superlong shaky epileptic music video with too many slow motion shots. With all the resources and Ryan Reynolds could have been enjoyable. Michael Bay should retire permanently.

I've never taken the time to write a review, but I felt compelled to log on and submit one for this load of crap. This was seriously a bad movie. The violence was absolutely over the top, and seemingly nonstop. I've only failed to finish a movie I started a handful of times in my life, but I couldn't finish this one. Waste of time doesn't begin to describe the hour and a half I actually sat through hoping that it would get better. It never did...

Car chases, loud music, some clothed soft core romance, guns, emotionless killings and bad guys with skills of a nerd teenager, what else can be there in an action movie from hollywood, Oh extravagant middle eastern locations and yes CGI. Combine all that with some comic punchlines and we have a high earning action movie.

A must watch for action movie lovers. Some very high octane car chase scene in the beginning sets the tempo of the movie. Great direction, editing and action. All actors played there part well. Somehow, this movie not got the kind of positive reviews it should. Infact should have been a great watch on big screen. Seems very expensive movie, don't know how Netflix earns back on such kind of movies and supposed to be released on big screen only. Michael Bay, you are a fantastic director.
Great action packed film, cast dialogue & locations are brilliant - best film in a long time, I've read some crazy negative reviews - ignore & enjoy!

I tried watching this movie twice, mainly because of Ryan Reynolds. First time I got about 20 minutes in, and the second time I gave up after 30. I like big, dumb action movies, and I don't mind watching action sequences from a variety of angles (John Woo...), but here it was done to the extreme with crazy fast editing and just a couple of seconds from each camera angle. It was really annoying. The terrible attempt at snappy dialogue didn't help. 30 minutes in with no real hint of a story, and I couldn't care less about any of the characters. What a waste.
Just wasted 2 hours of my life. Michael Bay.... typical movie of him. A lot of firecrackers, bad slow motions and bad story

reviews.review_title: Yall know this aint Denis Villeneuve so stop complaining.
reviews.content:
I loved this movie as I watched it with my dad with a few beers and a kickass sound system. The first scene with the car chase was more graphic than I would have expected and it was very satisfying.
Otherwise the script is basically a remake of the Just Cause videogame franchise. Its portayed very well too. Action, action, action, bad-assness and great fast pasted editing. After maybe 1h45 I though it was getting a bit long but the ending was worth the wait.We all knew what this was before pressing play. Expecting something else will just disapoint you.

Too violent for me, so expected to dislike this film from quite early in the action....BUT....as only Michael Bay seems able, the direction crafted these well cast professionals quickly into characters one cares about, and, eventually, a team that connects...both with one another and with the viewer. The violence somehow seems to pale in comparison to the raw look at the ugliest side of human nature against which these warriors are committed to stand, and the purpose behind the seemingly endless bloodshed. I truly hope they make a franchise of this and give us a few more.
This is simply one of the best action movies I have ever seen! It's very witty, fast but also gruesome... Great fun! Don't miss it!

Epic - Michael Bay & Ryan Reynolds, great combo 👍
A must watch for any action movie fans
Typical Michael Bay film with lots and LOTS of actions scenes. Good casting, silly but entertaining plot. I actually quite enjoy it!
Can't believe the bad reviews. Stylish, original and great action. Some of the action sequences the best I've seen for a while. And on Netflix too. Bargain!!
I just felt like the movie is a big trailer because of the confusing editing.

Action , firepower , neat climax. Good one for 1st Micheal bay + Netflix ,
Wish another one sequel
This is the movie suicide squad should have been. But damn Michael bay put his fingerprint all over it, from the unnecessary explosions to the firework rockets. But Ryan Reynolds did his thing

reviews.review_title: Rrally awesome i love it perfect work guys
reviews.content: I love it so much really desurve 10 star well directed amazing scenario, thumbs-up 👍
Pointless events, amateur dialogues and boring. 3 stars just for ryan reynolds

I didn't know what to expect from this but decided to watch it after finding myself laughing through the entire opening action sequence. I've become bored with Hollywood and am sick to death of the propaganda that the military industrial complex pushes through the multi billion dollar film industry. However the comic book over the top action and comedic delivery from all actors had me in stitches through most of the film. Not much of a story though. The location filming was impressive and something I would expect from a blockbuster movie rather than something out of Netflix so kudos there.

reviews.review_title: good to see movies too and the pictures were awesome too and I hope that it will work for you too if
reviews.content: Good to see movie this morning when you get back from the beach with the kids on games and then we will have to

reviews.review_title: A fairy tale where good guys kill the bad ones
reviews.content: It been sometime i had so much fun in a film. If you grow up with Bay films you know what to expect. Hilarious over the top action. I burst in to laughs on the first half hour. It is obvious that Bay had all control and enjoyed himself. He had fun. There are some not necessary close ups that do not add up to the story, but i did not care. well orchestrated first, second and third act. 5/5 because is fun. It is a fairy tale. It is what films used to be. A fairy tale where good kill the bad. Pure badass good guys kicking bad guys asses..
We all need just well made movies, this one is really enjoyable, effects, acting, jokes, jist great!

reviews.review_title: This should make Reynolds fell better about Green Lantern
reviews.content: The editing was all over the place, they threw in sex scenes for the sake of it and the story didn't flow.

reviews.review_title: The first piece of original Bayhem I didn't enjoy
reviews.content: A weak Mission:Impossible. The cast do okay, the sequences are impressive as usual, but despite far to much preamble, nothing makes sense. That's kind of important in a movie.
Just the typical action movie, I couldn't get till the end

reviews.review_title: It's an action movie. Bit of a ronseal moment really!
reviews.content: Just sit back and watch the action, laugh at the jokes and enjoy. Not every movie has to be Oscar worthy to be good. Don't listen to the pretentious reviews.

Weak and confusing plot.
Noisy and chaotic.
Ryan Reynolds and the Director of Photography, the only two who contributed positively...

reviews.review_title: Just the right amount of everything in a movie
reviews.content: This movie have a good storyline and it have a lot of great meanings i think it's one of the good done movies this year . You will see action, comedy, romance, violence, moment of pride and moments of shame all in one movie on a right amount not less not more and great soundtracks which will make you feel the movie and every minte of the fight will be entertaining.. i think i worth watching i recommend it all the way
Classic Michael Bay. Lots of action, explosions, cars flying everywhere. Editing is a little messi, and sometimes confuses the narrative. But the characters and the story pay off.
Take your brain out and enjoy it 😀😀. Great car chases, amazing set pieces and a lot of fun.
An action movie designed by a diversity committee which tries everything but never seems to know what it wants to be. Watch the opening car chase then watch something else.

Movie is really entertaining...but scene jumps are not properly done ....editing and screenplay are not good...and i honestly think that's only reason this movie didn't do well in the box office......Ryan asusual goofy and funny

reviews.review_title: Grab your friends and leave your brains at the door!
reviews.content:
Take Michael Bay give him a kilo of Cocaine, Ryan Reynolds as a lead, $150,000,000 and turn him loose behind a camera lens.
End result = ' 6 Underground '
This isn't ' The Irishman, Henry V, The Shape of water, The Green Book' or any other thought provoking Academy Award nominated movie. What it is, it's a SOLID GOOD TIME from start to finish.
People bang on Bay for not doing thought provoking statement making movies, overusing Dutch cuts, and recycling leftover film footage from past movies. I say ' SO WHAT ' and he says so himself. " I'm not in the business to make those movies. I make adrenaline fueled action movies that are fun to watch! "
When I watch movies sometimes I want to think, but other times I want to check my brain at the door, suspend all disbelief, and allow myself to be hyper intoxicated by big budget action porn. Bay rarely disappoints. This movie he fills the car with jet fuel and cuts the brake line at Daytona.
I pray Netflicks stays the course they have this past year and treats us to more movies and shows of this caliber. This is a movie they could turn into a homegrown franchise like ' Fast and Furious ' without the semi niche of a audience of car enthusiasts.
I would have easily paid to see in the theater without question, and would not have left feeling disappointed after doing so.
What a movie...totally entertaining... Salute to All member...love this movie... Thanks for this Awesome movie
This is a FUN MOVIE. so what if it's absolutely ridiculous, bananas, bonkers with the action and the scenes and the characters. it's hilarious and it's mesmerizing. just have fun with it.

I was expecting more from a Ryan Reynolds movie... yea it was entertaining to a certain degree but the storytelling wasn't there and the humor missed the mark. I laughed out loud twice..
1. Ron Funches (always hilarious)
2. Ryan's Scottish accent
I also loved number 5 channeling Louise Belcher with her green dress and pink mask
I know it was a big blockbuster movie and not a comedy, but there's still an expectation of snappy dialogue. All we got were some unfunny one liners and lots of pop culture references. It felt like they were thrown in because they couldn't think of anything else to say.
I'm assuming there will be more of these movies, which I'm sure I'll watch lol
I was confused watching this movie and quite bored even if they were a "thousands" actions scene.Another Michael Bay movie with sexy women and American flags with no good story.
Ryan Reynolds at his snarkey best without the red suit. You can get up, grab a drink and know you haven't missed anything important but still have fun. Fast and Furious with a larger body count.

reviews.review_title: Okay film. But the product placement is shameless
reviews.content: The entire film feels like an advert. Like there's no attempt to be subtle with the product placement it's annoying af.Other than that; certainly worth a watch. Not life changing but okay
Very likable characters. Very weak script. Even the jokes feel half-baked. Also, because of flashbacks and how movie was shot there is little flow and great pace.

Simply a roller-coaster ride for a Sunday night movie. Don't take it too seriously and strangle your inner thoughts and you will enjoy this film
Grab the popcorn and a beer and sit back and have fun.
Ignore the naysayers....
I honestly didn't think it would be possible to get a headache from rolling my eyes! Absolute crap.

I loved it. Ryan Reynolds is awesome with his comedic take and it all comes together. I mean......it's Micheal Bay. Not going to win an academy award but damn it was a fun 2hrs. Hopefully there will be some sequels.

The story is just mediocre but the visual is stunning. I like how the camera angels, the pacing, the action sequences all put together. Emphacised by slow motion and music background. It has some gruesome scenes for the shock value.I'm a visual person so I do enjoyed this movie. For people who is looking for serious story with some drama this is not for you. But if you are looking for good action with great cinematography than this is definitely for you.

reviews.review_title: Don't listen to the geeks that only care about camera work
reviews.content: This was one of my favorite movies, I don't care that everyone hates it. It was original, it was exciting, and the plot was incredible. All these people that say they couldn't understand the plot were just too busy getting their glasses fogged you over too many camera cuts. Get over it and watch the movie. 10/10 would recommend if you actually want to watch a movie and not criticize how it was made.

This is the first time I have ever had to stop a movie. We made it 20 min. in and that was it.Everything is moving.
Who are these characters?
Why should we care?
How long is this car chase going to last?
20 min. in already and we still have no idea what's going on. The only character introduction we get is a number and a description.I'm impressed by how bad this movie is.
One of my all time best movies ! It was full of action scenes and a satisfying end

reviews.review_title: Scene consistency an issue but deserves a sequel.
reviews.content: This is just a good, fun action film... Its a shame they confirmed no sequel. I was rather disappointed... There has been worse films that have managed to achieve one.

This is a solid action flick. It seems like the more visibility a movie has the worse it is not picked. This movie is easily above other movies rated at 6/10.Ryan Reynolds is his usual funny self. The action scenes are cool but there is a surprising amount of gore. The plot is pretty simple. There are a few cringy jokes and cliches but otherwise this is a very entertaining action movie

reviews.review_title: So much action and yet so boring...
reviews.content: I love a car chase. This movie starts with a car chase, so I figured that I'd be on to a winner. What seemed like hours later (which was actually about 20 minutes), the car chase was still happening and I was bored.The action is punctuated with a near constant stream of flash-backs and needless exposition which is I think, the reason why it was just so boring. The constant back-and-forth is required to fill in the gaps that are created by the incoherent storyline and an near absolute lack of a plot.Normally I'm happy to let an action movie just wash over me and to enjoy the action, but with this it was impossible.

If you're looking for good action movie - this is a definite yes! Visual effects are stunning and everything is very nice to look at. Script is not perfect, but not bad either and the actors are doing a preety good job. Basically if you want to have a nice evening, not think too much, and enjoy the VFX - it's perfect.

This movie is a reminiscent of what Michael Bay is all about. Exploding cars, loud explosions, fast camera movement, jokes in between extremely stressful situations. If you are looking for a story-line, then don't bother to watch this movie.Coming to the cast, Ryan Reynolds as 'One' is pleasant to watch. But every time he tells the audience about how death made him a ghost is just plain and simple boring. Melanie Laurent, Dave Franco (albeit for the first 10 minutes only) and others were just as good as the films story line.The action sequences are choreographed with finesse. I was able to differentiate the CGI in just one scene, so overall pretty great work by the VFX team.I would like to point out some problems with the script of the movie. Whoever wrote the dialogues was probably drunk out of his mind, In the second half of the movie, there is a conversation about the 'snatch'. I couldn't help but wonder. "Why?". I am trying not to think hard about it, and i cant keep thinking.Overall, if you are a Transformers and Michael Bay fanboy or fangirl, do watch this movie in all its glory.

reviews.review_title: A lot of fun. And it's an "edge-of-your-seat," roller coaster
reviews.content:
It was fun, crazy and intense all at once. I totally enjoy Ryan Reynold's brilliant wit, so that is the biggest reason. But I enjoyed everyone in his team. They all contributed in their own unique way. All together they created a perfect set; each adding a different kind of crazy personality. It was fun.
I really enjoyed it. I definately recommend it.

reviews.review_title: respect to the actions and graphic work, but horrible story!
reviews.content: Not cool Ryan, this seemed like a desperate act, we need quality work, keep Canadians Proud son!

This flick.. (as it does not deserve the categorisation of film).. was quite dissapointing. The story line itself was bland and really the lighting was probably the highlight of the film (pun intended). I would suggest watching Rick and Morty's heist episode.. because it was more enjoyable and just like this film is all about the team assembly with none of the payout. That being said.. the Skywalker was the best character in the bunch.. if I ever endure this again I would just watch the cut screens of him as he was the most depth the film had to offer.

Warning: do not watch this movie if you know /anything/ about proper emergency procedures. It'll annoy you. The action is good, the banter is good, the characters are pretty stock, but for stock characters they're pretty good. You'll enjoy it. But suspension of disbelief is the key to enjoying any of this kind of movie, and the physics violations made that difficult... and the procedures (basic, basic, BASIC) procedures violations made that difficult. And, well, I got about 1/3 of the way through and realized they were making suspension of disbelief difficult UNNECESSARILY. No, they didn't have to do "that". It didn't contribute in any way to the movie. But there it is. And again...Sigh.It's decent. It isn't good. I wish it was good.
I just love it! it has everything! and ryan killed it!
That's what you get. Action packed movie. Really fun and good acting. Plot makes no sense, so enjoy it for what it is. Awesome product placement by the way.

I enjoyed the acting and humor, the plot was pretty shallow but I did not have high expectations.What did annoy me was the almost constant cam shake. I understand using this technique for the action scenes, but when you also use it for the dialogues it just get's annoying. It's like they forgot the pack a steadicam. Also the cut's where all over the place. I had the feeling it was filmed by 25 different camera's and they absolutely HAD to use footage from all of them. If you're not a person who's bothered by this like I am, give it a go for sure.5/5 for acting, humor and action scenes.
0/5 for the general cinematography.

reviews.review_title: Ignore the editing if you want any hope of enjoying
reviews.content: Leave your brain at the door action, with the worst editing. A drinking game on stuff ups would get you smashed in 1st 30 minutes. If you can get past these issues it's a good tune off from reality.
Love this movie...Funny non stop action what more do you need...Ignore the other armchair know it alls low rating this movie... like they can make a better movie dreamers.

Typical Michael Bay stuff.Non-stop over the top action, drawn out and confusing scenes, sexualized women, slow motion takes every time someone is about to get shot or possibly hit by something life-threatening.If you like that kind of thing, enjoy. If you don't...well, don't be like me: thinking that you should have expected anything else but the same ol' crap from Michael Bay. Not really sure why Netflix wasted their time on this one...I guess they hoped that the mere presence of Ryan Reynolds would mean something.

reviews.review_title: Ryan Reynolds and a underdog story enough said
reviews.content: Its Ryan Reynolds doing what he does best staring it a underdog story about how people can make a difference, is what they did possible i am sure with enough money and skill, but thats not the point, the point is its stupid fun had me smiling the whole time. its Ryan Reynolds after all

I hated the story, the editing is an afterthought, the acting is terrible.To begin with everything in this movie has fireworks embedded: cars, light posts, bricks and cheese stands explode with sparkles. The scenes are edited to show bullet holes appearing and vanishing each second. If you gonna chose locations and pretend that your somewhere else, don't go for iconic buildings that will tell you out the errors.
The music reminds me of the discarded tracks for a spinning class. Not even the actors could save this movie. One of the worse movies i've seen the last 10 years (I haven't seen Cats yet).

Oh please say there will be another one! Fast paced, quippy, slow motion cameras, funny as hell. But wait! There's more! It has Ryan Reynolds without a Deadpool suit along with a perfectly casted back up crew. Incredible action scenes, beautiful scenery, blood and guts everywhere, and it tugs at the heartstrings just enough to keep you invested. Fun action comedy movie that's entertaining. Not recommended for younger audiences but definitely recommend for a good time!

Not every movie made should dissected to see if it's a great movie with a story. This is an action movie and it's not chasing an oscar. The action sequence is amazing better then most action movies I watched. People who are uptight about their reviews about this movie shouldn't even have attempted to watch this. Action movies aren't for you, end of story. 6 underground is the action movie you see without having to take a trip to the movies. Must watch!

This is a kind of Pop-corn movie.
Story is poor. But the Visual is good.Yup. That all. The plots are mess, but visual, action are good.It's a cut above Trasnformer 5.
(I gave 3 points at Transformer 5 )

reviews.review_title: Silly, orieantalist, fascist and beyond stereotype
reviews.content: With the silliest "magnet" scene, wear "stone island" if you are rich commercial, huge ignorance of from middle east (Dubai etc.) to middle asia turcic and arab motives, much much ado... Why, if it is fictitious, don't you make up new places, flags, countries instead of using the ones exist, which makes you very the "fascist" at this point???
Amazing that group of people all sat around and said "yea this is fine. Release the movie."

This film was visually stunning on 4K and full of action.
But the plot was weak. Lots of long winded action for no real reason with no real plot twists or anything. Could of been good had they cut it down by approx 40mins

reviews.review_title: Shoot, shoot, shoot. Mayday, mayday, mayday. Vrrrrr......
reviews.content: Who in the H'ood spends such an obscene flow of cash to film a test drive of an Alfa Romeo painted in a way that would offend even the poorest pimp? You can't get more undercover. The first 10 minutes in this latest fixture of this director more fond of engine revving than film directing, take place in a city that saw their share of real directors in the past, and serve to introduce to us the glamorous team that will take on cruel tyrants: a billionaire always showing his mug through the aforementioned car's window, a doctor performing medical procedures while on speed, a driver that does both the driving and the drooling over local mates and both the hitting of pedestrians (crashing weddings too) and the sparing of botched puppies. It has become apparent I wasn't going to spend the remaining 2 hours in their company knowing very well that the dictator and his generals don't stand a chance against this director and his (s)crew(s). It was rigged right from the start and up until the very end. The rest was just engine revs as a poet once said.I opted for no spoilers for this review as you can't possibly spoil this. It's like cinematic pasta. You can boil it way past the purchase date and even reheat it. The IQ level permeating from the script is concisely captured in a single line from the Parkourist: "there are so many f* vias in Italy" Right? I wonder what streets are. I was thrilled to see empowered women in this. Doing the exact same sh* men did. At this point movies seem like schemes of money laundering. A solid 1 star from me for the performances and the direction(?) and 10 for the scheme, I mean the script. Mindless doesn't even begin to describe what's on camera. The filmmaker and his crew flashes you incessantly with the most hideous car crashes and accident deaths. This is a textbook for psychiatry and both target audience and film crew are due for a check. I would not be surprised to find out that IS filmmakers were co-opted as experts for this or at least that their work was painstakingly studied.

reviews.review_title: If you want a good story line, forget it.
reviews.content: Flashy, if you are into the visual effect like in a video game, you will get it. If you want to know how they get to where they are and how they exactly plan it, execute it and finish it, lack of details. I quit watching after the first 30 minutes. So maybe it gets so much better from where I leave. LOL.

reviews.review_title: You know who directed this movie, right?
