reviews.content: If you don't know Michael Bay and watched this movie, I'm so sorry. :)Otherwise, if you have heard of this series of movies called Transformers and got the chance to watch any one of these movies in the past, you pretty much know what you're getting into. It's 97% action, 2% character, 1% plot, give or take.Note that I am rating this in the "Michael Bay scale" that exist for mindless action flicks. The car chase was exciting and refreshing, the shots are beautifully composed, and the location exotic.I typically hate the Transformers movies because they're supposed to be about Transformers but instead we get Michael Bay. In this movie it promises Michael Bay and delivered Michael Bay. This is maximum Bay and I had fun with it.

reviews.review_title: Just try not to get a headache
reviews.content: Not only does this movie rely on extremely tight close-ups and lots of shaky cam, which is a tactic photography directors use to make flaccid action and fight scenes seem exciting, but it also uses lots of obnoxious strobe lights. I'm not sure what the purpose of the strobes are but the effect is that you will get a headache. It's basically unwatchable.

When you want to make a story that is unrealistic usually humor is one good way to get away with. Unfortunately even with raymond it felt more serious than funny. I can write pages on how naive the story is, but i already wasted 2 hours. Just wanna say the ending reminded me of qazzafi of libya and how he died, and no his country is not better, its a failed state with slave trade and civil wars (thank you hilary). I did not want to remember that in my evening.

reviews.review_title: What you need to enjoy this movie....
reviews.content:
The action tries to be spectacular but it's just an overflow of crappy cuts and senseless gibberish phrases from the actors. The asynchronous storytelling does not add any value to the movie and is badly implemented.
The only moments when the film slows down its ridiculous pace is when product placement is done.
Still 2 stars. I had several laughs about the bad film making.

reviews.review_title: Just fun and a treat to watch
reviews.content: Anyone who is a fan of Ryan Reynolds will love this movie. He possesses a natural humility, and this shows throughout the movie. He also shows (yet again) a gift of finding humour in any situation. One must remember this movie was directed by Michael Bay, so of course it's full of action, car crashes and incredible stunts. However I found those falling into the background, mostly due to an incredible chemistry between the actors, and Reynold's gift for understated humour really makes this show work. Yes, you do want to suspend your beliefs about human nature, physics, etc. but just do that and enjoy the show. Brilliantly acted by everyone, in classic story of the underdogs taking on a corrupt system.

The first car chase scene is pure cringe. Just fast forward that bit.
Ryan Reynolds is completely the wrong actor for this role. Makes the whole thing seem like a non funny comedy. It lacks depth and creativity.
Apart from that it's ok, if your male and between 13 and 16 years old I guess.

reviews.review_title: Did Michael Bay, get kidnapped and held at gunpoint to be more Michael Bay?
reviews.content: Quite simply, it was extended music video of a poorly thought out song, but it butchered so many good songs! So disjointed. Great eye candy, some great on set practical effects, and some shocking stock standard visual effects, Deadpool acting as Ryan Reynolds acting as deadpool, sigh.... an assault on the eyes and fentanyl to the brain. Meatheads will love it!! As a film, in 2020.... VHS is worth more blank, than this film is on tape.

Absolute waste of time. Such a shame to put out such a loud, incoherent, horribly scripted movie in this day and age. What started with a seemingly exciting action flick, quickly became a snoozefest and eventually an early pullout for me.

reviews.review_title: Someone please explain where this was going
reviews.content: This movie is exhausting oh my god; the first 20 minutes could have been completely cut out, they serve nothing besides a fifteen minute long car chase. Which sure was cool to introduce the characters but it went on for so long, they destroyed half of whatever city they were in and Dave Franco dies at the end of it. Whatever.Afterwards I thought, damn, the movie is finally starting with an actual plot but no, we get more character backstory, and scenes with that dictator sprinkled in, by the one hour mark I still have no idea where this movie is actually planning to go with its plot. I've rarely been so lost watching a movie.Did not finish.

reviews.review_title: Characters say the f-word a lot-not a good sign
reviews.content: Only got through a third of this pre-adolescent wreck. Writing is in unclever, unfunny and unbearable. Characters strain to look and sound cool, but only come across as developmentally delayed and superficial to the max. A waste of Ryan Reynolds. He probably got a big paycheck, but this is not something you want on your resume.
As Ryan Reynolds and cast mates go.. thank you for another GREAT movie!! Wonderful stars all of them!!
Very well crafted scenes one after another, great fun to watch if you don't care why they are doing what they are doing, or whether there is a storyline

I'm not saying this wasn't a good movie. I love Michael Bay films, but am I the only one who is annoyed by the fact that everybody speak English instead of their own language, even inside family discussions? This takes 2-3 stars away from the rating.

Critics are garbage.... those that can't do critique... this was just a fun fast action move with a story that makes you care about the characters. If you like fast and furious you'll like this with a great cast.

reviews.review_title: I really had hoped this movie was good.
reviews.content: It really pains me to say this, because i'm a big fan om Renolds and Bay, but gosh this movie was bad, so bad that after 20 minutes I could not stand it any longer and turned it off. Such a bad dialog, cheesy lines, and the action scenes were just TOO much. Painfull to watch.
Omg, I just started watching this movie, and it had me Glued, the action at the start is seriously INTENSE 😯😮😮😮😮😮😮😮😮😮😮😮😮😮

reviews.review_title: Hot mess -- THIN story line. Not good at all
reviews.content: Some of the movie is clearly shot in Abu Dhabi, but they try to pass it off as somewhere in Turkishistan?? Or some other country where the "evil" dictator lives. Cut shots are poorly arranged and honestly would have asked for my money back had I seen it in the theater.

Reynolds was right when he stated it was the " Bay..est " movie Michael Bay has done yet . A to of action but so much so ,that the story , characters , and plot are rushed with little effort . If there would have been more outline of each character in each sub scene to explain their various outlooks and attitudes , it would hav made it better . But that would have made for a 6 he movie . I think In The end if they drew the characters out more and made it into a 6 so series minimum , it would have landed for me perfectly , rather than , the crash landing it felt like .

reviews.review_title: Great movie! Fast and Furious style
reviews.content: In a time where the world and governments are changing this is a kick in the teeth. Great storyline and above all great enjoyment.
Too ridiculous, unrealistic car scenes, poor man's action film and I'm guessing the Americans will save the day even though they cause most of the world's problems

reviews.review_title: I am going under the ground and never coming out again
reviews.content: Point less action. Why was this even made. I think I am never going to watch a Netflix movie again.

Too much jumping around between scenes and part of the story. It's not a relaxing watch. The story is thin and it feels that it's mostly about the nice views, bright colors and explosions. I had to turn it off mid-way since I just didn't enjoy it. Normally I enjoy action movies a lot.

I enjoyed this movie, It was good to sit back, enjoy some action and have a laugh.
There are some terrible reviews online saying this is the worst movie of 2019 etc... I just laugh at this because I know its Disney swinging their big D*** at Netflix lol.
They film most of the movie at Abu Dhabi, and says its at vegas or other cities! Try to be more creative on that.

Honestly one of the best action, pursuits and history movies I have seen. Once again Michael did it, trailers didn't lie. From start to end this movie had you enrolled. Hopped I had the chance to see it in big screen.
One of the worst movies I've ever seen, lack of logic, bad editing.

If it was a parody of action movies I would have given a solid 10. But it is not! CGI action for actions sake. Zero depth characters, way too many stereotypes, simply bad acting, incoherent all over the place story and more.If they could add some jokes and some classic action movie lines it would be a great movie. A parody that is. Something like Jean Claude van Johnson. That would be so much more entertaining. Now it is just boring. I mean it is so boring that I paused and wrote a five hundred word review. Which I almost never do. Looks like Hollywood ran out of ideas. CGI, action, shooting, flying cars and that's it.
Waste of time... horrible movie with no real plot.

First of all, just because you knew what you were getting into with a Michael Bay film shouldn't make the rating of a film higher. It's crap and deserves to be rated as crap.
Because you had low expectations the movie may seem fine. But that's just because you weren't expecting anything and it's crap.
We should stop awarding these types of movies which thinks they can get away with a being a complete waste of time by saying "I'm an action movie". It's crap. Waste of money. Waste of time.
O honestly don't know what Reynolds was thinking signing up to this pointless movie.
Summary is don't waste your time with this, there are better action movies with better editing.

reviews.review_title: Confusing explosions make a weak story, even weaker
reviews.content: Decided watch this movie because Ryan Reynolds and Dave France, like most other people. Was pretty skeptical when I found out Michael Bay was the director and my suspicions were definitely confirmed. The movie basically has no story and will confuse you while throwing random explosions and action scenes everywhere.
I'm not sure what the bad ratings are about. The movie was better than plenty I've seen. You have to keep up with past & present scenes. I liked it.

Amaizing movie!! Super thrilled action pace. I see here people giving 1 and 3 stars...what ? You thought you were going to watch Leon Tolstoi speaking or a Palm D'Or prize winner??? Please shut up, start smiling, take some drugs cause you are taking this too much serious and get a life please. This is a great movie to relax, laugh and see great stunts and some gore when needed. This is a future franchise like Fast & Furious or Jack Reacher. Great action movie actors revealed here not Oscar winning of course . Get a big popcorn bucket and many beers!! The starting shots are so crazy and fast paced not like Job in Italy! Which was indeed.

It's action packed, funny, and definitely entertaining! Too bad for the low ratings other reviewers gave this movie but hey to each his own and I have only praises for the director and its great actors. Would def recommend!

reviews.review_title: A lot of effects, but bad screenwirting
reviews.content: A lot of effects, but bad writing and screenwrite planning.

reviews.review_title: Fun, explosions and a lot of product placement.
reviews.content: It's a good caper film, leave your brain at the door. It's got explosions, stunning locations and Reynolds being himself. All good.They say the budget was $150 million. All the products advertised as subtle as a sledgehammer must've paid $10 each. They're everywhere.But get past those and the confusing editing, and you've got a great little popcorn movie.

reviews.review_title: Great action.... Eeeeemm.... *something*, I can barely call it a movie.
reviews.content: Awesome action parts, decent actors,It's like you're watching random clips on monster energy channel + a few jokes from Reynolds. It could have been a great action movie but this plot ruined everything.
Nonsense story, bunch of explosions, slow motion, and a lot of collateral damage. What you expected from Bay but less funny than you imagined one Reynolds movie should be

reviews.review_title: Hey this is pretty goo... wait no never mind, wth was That?
reviews.content: The premise of this movie was interesting and sounded like a fun action movie with Rey Rey. I enjoyed a good deal of the movie and it had good shots. But then the insanely stupid and confusing cuts happen and you see him (spoilers), him as in Ryan reyrey, shows us a wall with 19 different missions or so. And says okay this is mission 1. And omg the acting of bad guy and his brother xD hahaha (cartman voice laugh), those two actors but especially the pro democracy brother, the ymca enthousiast lets say. It's too bad and too funny, it completely takes you out of the movie. The final rey rey shots and a rando kid are just the cherry on the top of a huge pill of... confusing story and shots and story, oh did I say that again... THAT'S how the movie goed, All the whole way through!

Loved it! Zoned out, tuned in, and I enjoyed every bit of it! I'm not an action person but this was great! Loved all the special effects, CGI, one liners, stunts, chaos, everything! Hope to see the next mission! The opening scene was insane! ✅✅

I see lots of people moaning but hey ya already knew what ya was getting cos its Bay lol. I really enjoyed sitting back, volume up high and watching getting blown up, shot, stabbed, splattered etc for an hour, oh and really loved the magnetised scenes haha.

reviews.review_title: A really bad excuse for a high death count
reviews.content:
Graphic violence: check. High death count: check. Crazy stunts: check. Slowmotion: check. Lots of action: check. Really bad dialogue: check.
Story: not even close.
I have no idea what Ryan Reynolds is doing in this movie. It's way below his level!
The stunts are well performed, but that's it.
Really good action enjoyable movie Ryan Reynolds at his best if you like your movies fast funny then this is for you

This is the type of film when you first watch the first time around you think, this is.......However once you understand the concept of the and realise just how unbelievable Michael Bay shoots the cinematography, you'll quickly change your mind and appreciate how really great this film is.The man has an eye to capture the full glamour of an 'action' movie.

This movie is an absolute masterpiece of garbage.
If you want to learn how to make a movie that lowers your IQ and wastes two hours of your life, then my friend, you have come to the right place.No purpose, no logic. This movie has everything that you expect from a bollywood movie.Also that parkour guy had no purpose in the whole movie except for jump and get caught all the time.
It starts with the car chase and it took 20 minutes for that scene to end.It got pretty boring just watching them shoot and drive.It also contains lame jokes.
I love action movies! And this is one of them!! It awesome! just relax and let your mind go on wild ride!

This is action movie making at its best! Entertaining to the max. Michael Bay delivers again! I was hooked right from the beginning chase scene. Constantly on the edge of my seat in awe and anticipation. Fast Cars with skilled driving, plenty of explosions and gun battles...just like a true car chase should have in a great action flick. Don't look for Oscar nominated screenplay writing and poignant Golden Globe acting skills. It delivers exactly what it's supposed to...ENTERTAINMENT!!!

reviews.review_title: Why can't people just like a movie cause it's fun?
reviews.content: The movie can be just a little bit confusing in the very beginning, as well as not quite seem 100 percent realistic... but I haven't seen a movie with so much action in it in my life. It features a lot of shots I've never seen before, and really utilizes color and sound to make the scenes pop even more. Yeah, it's not a perfect movie, but it's fun, and I feel like people forget that a movie isn't real in the first place! It's a fun movie, and I think it deserves a watch

So many mistake in a film.. poorly edited.. Its a Bay movie, so wont talk about story or character development.. just watch the kaboom and 2 and a half of love making for 128 min... 4 star for explosion..

reviews.review_title: Random Violence Rarely Troubled with a Plot
reviews.content: I like the actors in this well enough to watch it. It lost my attention faster than a politician. I suppose this was going somewhere, but it appears to have gotten lost looking for the front entrance.

Not sure why this film is getting poor reviews 🙄. First of all its Ryan Reynolds, and second of all its non stop action! Thought it was brilliant myself but everyone is entitled to their own opinions. I couldn't find any part of the film to fault.

So disjointed I found it unwatchable.
Similar filming gimmicks used in Deadpool, but without the coherence of story line.

I live in Abu Dhabi where a lot of the movie was shot, and in today's day and age where people know the Louvre Abu Dhabi, it was a really glaring mistake to show Turgistan as Abu Dhabi. A lot of money, great action sequences, but insulting the intelligence of today's moviegoer in a lot of scenes. Also, the cast did well, disappointed by Ryan Reynolds (literally looked like half hearted acting from him). Overall an enjoyable watch - although it could have been a blockbuster If only edited crisp and smart.
Very fast paced action film. Loved the stunts. If you are looking to watch a movie that keeps you going wow!!! Then this is it.

Movie is cheap propaganda with bad copy elements of James Bond, Triple X, Mission imposible and Fast and Furious. Story about good american vigiliant cres Against bad (NO democratics regime) is totaly ridicolus

Great movie, great action and no not that complicated of a story like some people are writing about. Pay attention and you will be able to follow the story. If you like the classic action movies of the 80s than this is your movie to watch. Hope they continue on to taking out #2.

Ryan Reynolds makes most every role of his great with his snarky brand of humor. It had pretty good action scenes. Interesting over all plot. Good couple of car races, things going boom, and fight scenes. Few twists and turns that kept me well engaged. It was a tad long, but not in a way that bothered me. Just had to pause for dinner & such. Also Ben Hardy is a gem. And I think I'm in love....
This movie had potencial, but i dont know why they just over do everything, Is so overwelming with the explotions...really a bad movie
Action, car scenes, violence, comedy, family, team work, drama, relationships, sentimentality....this movie has it all! Love it!
I was excited to see this movie and was not disappointed. Ryan Reynolds is a top quality actor. The most action pact movie and humorous. I could watch this movie 100× over. Awsome..
I think this movie is as bad as Paul Walker' s Brick Mansions movie but with a little bit of humor in it.
Why is M. Bay allowed to make movies? The sniper guy could have popped the bad guy without all this nonsense. I cannot recommend this.

Billionaire "making the world a better place" by organizing a dead squad
car chase through narrow crowded streets
bad dictator somewhere far in a brown people country
replacing it with his good brother - brown folks rejoice!
glorified mob justice
chicks with guns,
the ad nausea gadgets parade
pseudo-deep thoughts about purpose, love and fearThe actors look silly talk silly - blame them not too much - they are left in the hands of one of the all times worst directors Michael Bay.The result is complete garbage with lots of special effects.
2 hour 8 minutes of product placements. crappy story line.That's it really.

Good action with some funny moments. All in all I enjoyed it and wouldn't mind watching again. A personal pet peeve is when movies jump back and forth with the time line so that's really the only thing I didn't like about it. Watch it and enjoy if you like action movies and dont mind some gore.
The only thing that got me through the movie was Ryan Reynolds.

reviews.review_title: This is bad, even for a Michael Bay movie
reviews.content:
I was hoping for what I would call, a "guilty pleasure" movie such as Transformers (2007) was, but...... No. Just no.
This was so stupid, that it actually hurt to watch through to the end. The car chase in the beginning was kinda' fun, but nothing after that. That is where the movie should have ended.I mean, every single scene one after another was thoroughly and utterly, mind meltingly, terrifyingly stupid, that I had to take brakes between cuts.

reviews.review_title: Wow, what a waste of time!
reviews.content:
My first review ever, and I'm doing it to save your time. Don't watch this, no plot, no sense. It really is a stupid movie. If you're gonna waist your time, don't watch this, stare at the wall.
Oh and the slow-motion, never thought that that it could be possible to abuse it on so many ways.
The rating must be waaay over 7, but if you see the movie you'll get what I mean
Hail Micheal bay. Awesome movie. Ryan Reynolds dope acting. Screenplay next level
Pointless action without story, often confusing sequences.

reviews.review_title: Wow. I dare you to follow this ...
reviews.content: I watch a lot of movies and am pretty good at following a timeline, even with jump cuts and flashbacks, but this was really hard.At one point they even said, 'now you are all caught up', but later did more flashbacks...Love Ryan Reynolds and he was his normal funny self but the editing/jumping around, made it hard to follow. Without all the back and forth it would have been more 'fun'. It is Michael Bay, after all. It shows like a Michael Bay film that was somehow caught up with the WestWorld crew.

reviews.review_title: More Transformers Movie sound effects in another Bay film...annoying!
reviews.content:
Storror from YouTube did the parkour stunts for this! I love there channel and I saw this on Netflix but didn't give it a second glance until I saw them doing the stunts for it and then showing small clips of the scenes they were doing. I love a good action movie but with a comedic act. And Reynolds nails it like always. The rest of the cast is terrific! They are all so different but Bay did an amazing job at making them all fit together perfectly. Of course Michael Bay is a big big name director. And it's obvious why. Now the sounds effects he used for transformers was perfect. Like weird metal flexing sounds and random low and high toned horns. Nailed the sound effects for the Transformers Trilogy.
This is where Bay starts to loose me with 6Underground. Look I get he loves a descriptive action scene, take the magnetic boat for example! Wow! There was so much going on with the guys bouncing from wall to wall and having knives from the kitchens stab through them and all sorts of crazy things happening and taking out the bad guys. But the sound effect...why Michael!!?? Wwhhhhhhyyyyy!!!!!? Everytime I hear that slow motion sound effect all I can think about is bumble bee slow motion flying through the air over Mark Wahlbergs head and transforming from a car to a transformer. That sound doesn't incorporate into this movie lol. And the low tone horn sounds for the magnet when Reynolds turns it on? God Bay! You have to leave those sounds with specific movies. I'm not sure if he just loves those sounds so much that hes going to use them in every single movie he makes? But it's annoying. I'm sure I'm part of a small number of people who think this but there could have been better sound effects made for this movie instead of the ones that were bing used. Like I said, eveytime I heard them all I could think about was transformers! But I'm not watching Transformers! I'm watching a better movie with amazing firearms and great action scenes, I want to be pulled into these crazy action scenes and sucked into the movie, but I can't cause everytime some crazy scene happens and that 95% of the movie I hear another recycled sound effect he's used in all his other movies lol. And it kills me! I'm always going to link these sounds with Transformers because these sounds fit transformares soooooo well. But not this movie!
Please come up with new sound effects for every new film you release!! Stop recycling the sounds. It's getting so annoying. I gave this a 7 only because the sound effects just drive me Nuts. But this movie deserves a 10.

Firstly let's say, you have to bring the attitude to not take it seriously. It's a typical Michael Bay film, high budget and low quality. Ryan Reynolds was the only reason I let it play. The plot is flimsy at best, a sodden flea bitten decrepit show at worst. The editing is... never mind. The DP has some good shots but really I wouldn't waste the time watching this when you can enjoy more of Ryan Reynolds in a good film like Deadpool.

Ignore the -ve comments. If you are a true Michael Bay fan and if you like the way he creates his movies then this is a must watch. There are lot of jaw dropping moments in this movie. Love the way how he creates these kinda shots. Hotness craziness funny stylish and last but not the least ActionPacked. I did not find Ryan Reynolds suiting to the character...could have been better. Story line aint so worthy but the way how they created was simply awesome. If u watch it just for timepass then im sure ull love it

They tried really really hard to make it as over the top as possible... very far fetched jokes all over and everything just felt forced. I maybe chuckled once or twice but that's it.. I just couldn't believe this movie cost over 150 million!
If you are a fan of dramatic movies don't this but else it is a perfect action comedy movie that you will enjoy the story.and a message to the world for who understand plus laugh and enjoy the movie.
It's the best movie I ever seen in my entire life I wish Iranian actors can join in other movies thanks to director he's the best 😇

This movie is making me think they were forced to make it! Short sequences in a rapid pace with to much going on. In all off that actors who seem to be uninterested and out of touch. I usually like Ryan Reynolds but this is not his proudest moment. If you are really bored or just can't leave your home this could be a way to waste time. And that's all it is, a waste of time.

Movie time 5.47, they brock green Alfa Romeo car's side glass
but 5.56 There it is again

reviews.review_title: One Massive Advertisment - Product placement ruins this movie
reviews.content: Basically not a bad film but every few minutes brands are being forced upon you in this movie ad platform. The volume of product placement is not subtle and takes away from the enjoyment of the movie... quite unbelievable to be honest.

Really really bad movie. Through out the movie they were trying to make it look "cool" with modern cars, weapons, luxury apartments. The movie is pointless. The direction is ad. The cast is mostly okay. I watched it because i heard they were doing a collaboration with Money Heist. I could sit through out. It was really boring.
Really didn't enjoy that much, but I think if you love the fast and furious type movies you will like this

If you're looking for an action movie that portrays realism, tugs at your heart strings, or brings you closer to a loved one then this movie is NOT for you. It's full of adrenaline, funny one liners, unbelievable action sequences, and will change your opinion of magnets forever.All these negative reviews criticizing it for being "action overload" and "without substance" are absolutely right. That is the point of it. It was made simply for us to have fun watching. So kick back and have fun!
This moves is good and he probably good choies for anyone who afined to the point of injoy

It starts bad and only became worse!!
A 10 minute bad cut car chase is the way to start a movie, B-movie with third class actors!

I know it's beating a dead horse to attack, but....first of all it cuts every 2 seconds and the camera shakes to the point where you don't really know what's going on and you're basically just watching a seizure. I liked the idea of the plot but they tried way too hard on making it look cool instead of actually giving a crap about the story. Watch if you want it's a Netflix "Nothing to on a Tuesday night" movie.

reviews.review_title: Why the bad review? It'a actually a badass movie!
reviews.content: I like the story, it's fabulous. The movie is packed with action, comedy, and some romance. Well done! Looking forward to the sequel.

I went into this expecting a typical Michael Bay, explosions and gunfights, type of movie. While I did get plenty of that, I also got a plot that makes no sense with some of the worst acting I've ever seen. Acting and writing this bad has to have been on purpose because there's no way that a movie with this kind of budget can be this bad.

Like any other Michael Bay film, 6 Underground is packed full of massive explosions, thrilling car chases and of course, fighting. But one thing that the film does differently is the amazing camera work and color choices such as the use of lime green and the always changing camera angles. Unfortunately the film has trouble with its tones as many emotional parts of the film are brushed off with a poorly written joke. One other thing I did enjoy about the movie was how each character has their own purpose to the group. Such as One (Ryan Reynolds) being the leader and having a free runner (Ben Hardy). But even though Ryan Reynolds is the biggest name in the cast, it fells like he's playing the same character as in Deadpool, just richer and less violent. The plot is also quite choppy with scenes jumping from year to year and place to place every couple minutes. But something that helps to redeem the movie is how it has a really bad bad guy. So if your into explosions, guns, gore and a bad story I'd check it out.

Classic Bay. This is a thoroughly enjoyable action film. Accented by comedic performances and a decent pace, it may be a little long but I thought it was great throughout. I hope this turns into a franchise.
This is how I'd sum up "6 Underground":Intresting but confusing start - then 100 clichés in one movie - suprisingly decent ending

reviews.review_title: Have you looked at the green car in the beginning ?
reviews.content: The whole first scene with the car chase is a big mess. In one shot the green car is damaged, in the next shot its not, in the next shot it's damaged again. The whole movie is like that, a big big mess.

reviews.review_title: Please stop, Michael Bay. Thank you.
reviews.content: The acting of the cast was appreciated with what they were given. I never had any expectations that this was more than a mindless action film, but despite the fun action and funny moments, the directorial style was unnecessarily choppy and the editing was sub par. This should been easy, nice job Michael Bay.

reviews.review_title: Good action movie for a weekend
reviews.content: It was much better than last Fast and Furious chapters... Reynolds made it. It was fun and entertaining, and what is really important, it was atmosphere. Lots of explosions, blood, black humor and beautiful women. What else do you want to see?! Watch and enjoy...

reviews.review_title: Ryan reynolds are too good for this movie
reviews.content:
Like everyone else, i decided to watch this only because of Ryan Reynolds.
Honestly i only watched it for 13minutes, its more than enough to know the quality of this movie.Overused slowmotion, sound effect and the "damn, i love italy" were to painful to watch.

reviews.review_title: Bad, bad, bad... one more time - BAD.
reviews.content:
6 Underground is Michael Bay's worst film yet.
It's not clever or original to slate Michael Bay's films, but the crushingly bad 6 Underground leaves no other choice.

reviews.review_title: Superficial Glamour and yet..Zero Intelligence with the almost "Underground" level of storytelling.
reviews.content: It's Big, Vivid n Loud, with Nothing inside it.Superficial Glamour and yet..Zero Intelligence with the almost "Underground" level of storytelling..What can I say.., After all, it's the "Michael Bay" movie.

This was the best movie. Just amazing. The special effects was wow. And the story line was very real to me. You have to be awaken to a certain degree to understand and appreciate this movie. How did it only get 6.1 out of 10 is beyond me. John wick 3 you can see the fighting screens were off que. The block was there before the punch was even thrown.150 million to make. I would invest that money again and again in this movie.
Meh... too much vulgarity... more Hollywood trash shoved out...Next!
They really had to kill Dave Franco 20 minutes in and now I lost interest
Love all the components here: the actors, the story of coup, the comedy, the character development, the act, all of it. Just it feels like nothing surprising, 7 is right.

At the begining of the movie, more precisely at the minute 05:45 the car loses the right side mirror and in the next sequence the car has the mirror intact.
07:59 - blood pupmps out and hits Adria Arjona in the forehead and on the face, the next seconds she has no blood on her face.
"Very professional" guys!!
I had a few laughs, but that is it.
And what's with all the commercial on coffee . cars , watches, energy drink and many more???
This whole movie it is like a Big Super Bowl Commercial Break!

Frenetic action and goofy dialog and a plot about killing a dictator, what is not to like? More dictators in real life should be killed - they sure deserve it more than any other criminal stealing a whole country, and while it is not happening, you can dream with this movie and be entertained too. And the very long and super destructive car chase in the beginning of the movie is over the top. Hope they make an Underground 7.
One of the best movie i have watched after long time I'll give this 10/10

reviews.review_title: Awesome action packed movie with new ideas, skill sets that bring geopolitical issues to the spotlight
reviews.content: Ryan Reynalds and the 6 crew brought diversity and synergy to the action arena with a mix of complementing 'out of the box' team skills brought together with consistent witty humor (the 'Ryan' way), all driven by a cause. This action/adventure brought to the forefront, less thought of, geopolitical issues that people today are faced with while bringing to life the idea of the realistic 'hero'. Lovable!

reviews.review_title: People reviewing movies on IMDB are unbelievable!
reviews.content: People really really get carried away with these reviews... editing, plot, character depth, how was the CGI, was the lightning OK, did music complement the drama in his eye when he looked at her... OMG!!!! On a scale 1 to 10 just rate how much fun you had and cut the c%#p. It's an action movie for Christ sake - how much more action could you wish for?!?!

reviews.review_title: Action pap with bells and whistles
reviews.content: I thought this was an advertisement for. Coffee, Alfa Romeo, red bull and stone island. It's watchable if you want to kill an hour but it's not very good

Ok, so some of the action stuff borders on absurd and a car that was scraped up a second ago was suddenly unscathed...but it's an adrenaline junkies dream. Billy the Skywalker is an exhilarating addition to the storyline with snipers and stunt drivers. RYAN Reynolds displays his typical wit and charm, maybe a little too reminiscent of Deadpool but hey, the formula works. Can't wait for the sequel. Can I order 7 more movies? Maybe then I'll get bored of the storyline.

Finally a good action movie,I always liked Michael Bay's movies this one become one of my favourite the action is awesome great location and really funny. I would love to see it at the movies though, I really hope they will make part 2. I can only recommend

reviews.review_title: Feels like a movie from the 90s
reviews.content: A mess of a movie. Bad editing and just a bunch of explosions. Michael Bay was good in the 90s but it is time to reinvent himself. It really feels like a 20-year old movie.bring something new to the table.

This movie is just stupid.There is absolutly no story. The only thing that happens is that something explodes.Don't watch this movie. Staring at a white wall for two hours is more entertaning than that movie.

reviews.review_title: Nice looks, witty banter, cars, bikes and bullets; it's a mess!
reviews.content: I don't know what to make of this, but I think this may be a spoof on the genre 'action movie'. It has all the right ingredients except for two things; character development and story. So in the end I didn't know what this was about and I didn't care what would happen to the characters. Some scenes were nice and Ryan Reynolds does his 'Ryan Reynolds'-thing, which made me add a third star to this review....
At min 5:30 the truck breaks off the green cars mirror and after 20 sec the mirror is there :)))

Great parkour and action scenes. Lots of dumb humor. But the editing is just god-awful. The longest film cut is 3 seconds long. Most action scenes are just 1 second or less cut-aways. Even the dialogue is chopped up into bite-size prices of single, simple sentences.
If you have a big TV, the constant cuts will make you motion sick. If you were a big fan of the editing in "Quantum of Solace," this movie is right up your alley. Otherwise it's a fun movie to have playing in the background of a party, but it's very difficult to sit through in a single session.

Typical good guy vs bad guy story line, and you get not only one lone wolf doing the deeds, but a whopping six! I like all the actors/actresses enough to try to watch this film. At first I thought, not a bad start, and the car chase scenes made it fun. But boy, the tempo is so bad. I don't mind flash back, or choppy editing...but this is taking a piss. In some places it worked, but when you do flash back and choppy bits every 10-15 mins, it makes you lost the concentration of the on-going "current" storyline they are trying to tell.Some characters have a nice built up, but feel the parkour guy and the doctor lady seemed to be a bit of a waste of their character built up...maybe I was looking for more. It'd be nice to see each character has their own "heroic" moment that makes you feel, "Yeah man!!! Go Go Go!!!" Kung Fu Hustle was very good at that, and since then, rarely see the same amazing built up for a film that consists of multi-lead characters. Marvel's End Game did it, but not without the help of some individual standalone movies with the key characters. Anyway...There are some really nice scenes in this film, the fight scenes are good, punch lines are not bad (some are funnier than others)... just perhaps a bit less choppy editing, more of a coherent story telling, and less plot device (made something happen in order to feed another character's cause of action etc.)This type of film I can only watch it once based on curiosity. I would not be dying to see it again anytime soon.
You need to see this movie. Great story, action and acting. Hilarious too.

I didn't turn it off but it was pretty bad. If Blockbuster still existed it'd have been next to a Steven Segal flick in the straight to video section. The beginning car chase was pretty rad. The rest was a crazy, super bright mess with bizarre editing and lame jokes. I stuck around with the hope of more action akin to that first scene. Blah.
Entertaining, fast paced and made you feel good about crap in our world. If only it were true

What else could we expect from a Michael Bay Netflix film? 6 Underground plays out like a Michael Bay show reel, jam packed with every single anxiety inducing angle, and destructive sequence you've seen in Bay's past. This movie is the result of Netflix giving Bay near complete control of a movie. The first 20 minutes alone is devoid of any solid plot and instead plants the viewer right in the middle of an off the walls sequence of destruction against the beautiful backdrop of Italy. Nothing more than an excuse to crash cars against a beautiful backdrop. 5 stars because is it a Michael Bay movie after all.
While backstory is a little difficult to understand initially, a second viewing fixes that. Extremely entertaining!

reviews.review_title: I'm not sure this film knows what it's about
reviews.content: Shame really it had potential. But for me there was not enough premise or fleshing out of characters to make it compelling. Pockets of humour were good though and Ryan Reynolds rocks as usual.

reviews.review_title: From Florence to Siena for 15 seconds by foot
reviews.content:
If you love when somebody doing an idiot from you then you will love this movie.
It 21th century. Common! Everyone know that you shouldn't take out a bullet from wounds - you could bring infection in. No any additional harm if the bullet will stay in the body. Stop to feed up people with stamps like this!
Italy is the most visited country in the world. It's impossible to reach Piazza del Campo for 15 second from Florence Cathedral because it's in 2 different city 60 km away! If you don't care and just want a beautiful picture for your stupid movie, then reach also Coliseum in 10 sec after.
I don't even talk about its impossible to make a chase in the most of italian city's center because it's prohibited and almost impossible to drive car there!
I couldn't see it more than 15 minutes from beginning. The camera is constantly shakes and the plot is so stupid that I couldn't decide from which part I am feeling sick.
Question - What if Michael Bay didn't have a studio to turn his disjointed series of explosions, car chases and, bad music into a story?Answer - You get Underground 6.

Ugly really ugly!!!
Ugly really ugly!!!
Ugly really ugly!!!

reviews.review_title: Genuinely one fo the worst movies I've ever seen
reviews.content: Took me 3 attempts to finish this movie. The dialogue!!!! Oh my god, was the script written by a 12 year old? The continuity errors, the plot or lack there of - the cringey jokes. It was just sooooo bad!! It was a chore in the end to finish the bloody thing. I usually quite like a daft, switch off your brain type action movie. But this was just painful. 2 stars only for the effects and stunts. The rest, forget it. Avoid.

Movie took waaay to long to set up, first scene went on too long, is felt Ryan kept telling the same story in his narrative over and over again. I just didn't believe anything, and I really wanted to like it.

reviews.review_title: Don't believe the bad reviews, they're way out in left field
reviews.content: This was by far the best film I have ever seen when it comes to action!!! Packed full of cinematography unlike anything I've ever witnessed. Micheal Bay has done an OUTSTANDING job on this film!!! I've never seen anything like it in all my years. Thank you for the best evening I've ever had in a very long time. Renewed my faith in movie production. Changed my religion!!!

reviews.review_title: Forced, confused, and too much camera shake
reviews.content: I was quite excited to watch this after reading the plot synopsis. It does sound like a good idea but it was poorly executed.The amount of camera shake in this movie will give you a headache. camera shake doesn't mean good action choreography; it rather seems more like a cover up for a bad one.The whole magnet magic thing is unexplained and over the top.Short intro into each character makes sense but gives no insight into why would they want to be ghosts at all? I mean 4 didn't even get a choice in this. Why did 2 leave CIA and became a ghost? Why did the hitman join? Was the hitman not informed that they are not supposed to contact their families?It feels like a blatant A-Team rip-off at times given each ghost is supposed to have a special ability and a unique character, and then the plan of action is narrated / explained as it is being executed.Within the first half an hour you can tell that the movie producers are already hoping to make a sequel / franchise out of this.Finally, I was disappointed by Ryan Reynolds' use in this movie. It seemed either he wasn't totally into his role or it wasn't written properly. It just seems they wasted his potential with a poorly written character.I'm giving it few stars just because of the crazy stunts they would had to do, otherwise it's a waste of time.

reviews.review_title: If you have half a brain, this movie isn't for you
reviews.content: No substance. Super corny jokes. Worse dialogue. Loud noises and bright colors/explosions to make up for the lack of substance. Terrible acting. Half decent cgi. You're probably too smart to watch this. Go get yourself some Tarantino or Scorsese, instead..
Guys This movie is all about action dnt miss it everyone gonna love it at the end .Trust me

reviews.review_title: Worst editing in a movie ever.
reviews.content: If you want something on in the background and not pay too much attention, this is the film for you.

reviews.review_title: Pretty People, Action, Cars and Explosions
reviews.content: You know you're not here for the Oscar worthy acting prowess of the cast or the cinematography, the storyline (what storyline).This is supposed to be a fun, action movie with one liners and beautiful people doing insanely cools stunts with explosions and cool cars.The plot and the storyline are very one dimensional, there are so many plot holes, and issues with the whole movie. The one-liners aren't brilliant, and sometimes quite forced, the action is visual but also not believable - there's explosions and car stunts, the continuity is all over the place, and the editing is very choppy, and not in an Edgar Wright way - it's jarring and makes it hard to follow.It's not Michael Bay's best work, and not his worst.It's a Functional Five at best.

reviews.review_title: Brilliant Netflix have stepped up their game
reviews.content:
I absolutely loved this movie, it had everything I could ever ask for it didn't feel like 2 hours and by the end I just wanted to watch it all over again and that is extremely rare for me.unlike some films I loved all of the main characters in this movie they all bought game. bring on the next installment Netflix.
Don't listen to the negative reviews make up your own mind.
Tons of talent, beautiful people, gripping action, too bad they forgot to hire any writers. Story? Plot? Character development? Nope, let's get'm humpin' & blow some s&:t up!!!
Can I give negative stars? Beyond bad ... changed it after 5 mins, couldn't even get through the opening sequence. 5mins of my life I'll never get back.

reviews.review_title: It's a Michael Bay movie - what did you expect?
reviews.content:
Just exactly what I needed after an exhausting day. An absolute overload of violence and blowing stuff up. Ryan Reynolds was great and the supporting cast was excellent.
One problem with Michael Bay - he really doesn't know what to do with female actors except show off their bodies. The women made the most they could of their parts, but you can tell they were there because there would have been complaints if they weren't.
Looking forward to the sequel.

reviews.review_title: Brilliant if you don't take it too seriously
reviews.content: I thought it was amazing fast paced amazing driving scenes great acting and darkly comic. There are continuity issues and ludicrous action scenes. The negative reviews are from people who didn't realise the whole point. One I read criticised the editing. It was spelled incorrectly. It was never meant to be taken too seriously. It's really fun though.
Soooo superficial...the truck is breaking the car mirror in the chase and few seconds later the mirror is back :) later the mirror is missing again...
Complete drivel. About as shallow as it gets. Hollywood at its worst. I don't know how anyone would be happy to see themselves in this.

Okay so there were a few comedic scenes in this movie (mostly thanks to Reynolds and his usual stick) but overall, the movie was empty.You don't really care about any of the characters, as there is no depth to them and they don't develop much either. As well as the fact they are generally referred to as numbers and skill sets.Most of the scenes are horridly cut, to the point where it is genuinely dizzying at times, and the cuts in scenes not really matching up with one another. Some scenes look like they've stopped briefly, or have gone a bit stop-starty, but I think that's just the cut between each one.Yes the action scenes are okay, over the top as with most movies nowadays, but okay. Kind of a mix between dead pool and fast and furious if you're looking for something similar.Overall, the movie is below tolerable. Acting and action scenes average, otherwise generally dreadful.

reviews.review_title: One of the worst films in a long time.
reviews.content:
It couldn't be more American.... Exaggerated brutality, tons of weapons,
Terrorist attacks, war and sex (in the room next to dead bodies). But I'm probably not the target group either. #cs.

Loved EVERY MINUTE of this film! From the beautifully intricate editing style, to the humor, to the gorgeous cinematography, to the incredibly skilled acting and action sequences. Will be watching 6 Underground again for sure. Excited to see more movies like this on Netflix!!!

reviews.review_title: It ain't Shakespeare but it's a load of fun
reviews.content: The amateur Roger Eberts on here with their inherent snobbery should sit this one out.It's a good old fashioned action romp watch it laugh have fun don't over think it just let it wash over you and you'll enjoy yourself
Some people are crazy to say this isn't good. It's interesting, crazy and funny from the start, not sure how any one is even complaining about this movie

reviews.review_title: I felt dumb, thinking "am I missing something?"
reviews.content:
The 1st 18 minutes is LITERALLY a car chase with about 8 bystanders being injured. Ok.
THEN - a '15 minutes ago' '6 months earlier ' 'Present day' '4 years ago' 'Present Day'
In the 1st 40 minutes, I went back and rewatched several scenes, thinking my WIFI was skipping important parts.
No, it wasn't.
I've not ever said a movie is 'bad'
However, this.. the back and forth from future to past, partial backstories that just stop suddenly, then there's numbers on the screen and nothing is really explained. Did they have a 1st mission? Why are those 2 having sex? Why did she do that? Why did that guy shoot that man?
Honestly, I felt as though I was at a Avant Garde Gallery/Show where everyone was enthusing about how they (insert pretentious words here) and I was standing in the corner feeling ignorant because I just didn't understand what was going on.
The movie has an "Edited for Television and Time" quality, as if I am missing an hour of viewing.
I watched this twice, and still have questions, so maybe I'm not "smart" enough for this movie.

reviews.review_title: Michael Bay is hardworking on Recycling
reviews.content: The only best part is the beginning racing scene, other than that, none. You can stop watching after the racing.The idea in final battle scene with a huge magnet, didn't Michael Bay used it already in Transformers 2?I really hope that Michael Bay is not just good at Recyling on his work but also in his life.
You will like this but I hate both of these piles of garbage.

reviews.review_title: We need more movies like this
reviews.content: Sure it has some political undertones but the message is that even if you have power, If you use that power to hurt people someone is looking after those who can't help themselves. Some bad ass chicks too.

reviews.review_title: More Proof that Micheal Bay sucks
reviews.content: This is more proof that Micheal doesn't know how to shoot an action movie or any kind of movie and simply reverts to type by distracting from bad storytelling and editing but moving quickly between shots and adding more explosions. The redeeming factors are Ryan Reynold and the music but even those two things can't save this trash pile of a movie!

reviews.review_title: like a beautiful apple which is rotten inside , just pretty to look at just for seconds
reviews.content: Too fast which gives you headache and bad storyline and writing like most of the hollywood movies these days
I gave up after 15min while the first scene was still going... saved almost 1h45min of my life.
I usually don't write reviews but this movie is SOO UTTERLY TERRIBLE I just had to advise not to waste your time

reviews.review_title: Bay will leave his mark... as king of flaws
reviews.content: Disappointing. In the first 20 minutes more than 100 editing errors.. for 150M even a blind should be able to perform something better. Killed Transformers franchise and now he's just burning money.

The most pointless movie I've ever seen. Chaotic, bad lines, poor editing, bad story line, and 80% bad acting. It was really hard to watch with interest. I was hoping for much better, and I like Ryan Reynolds, but I suggest not wasting your time unless you like a lot of noise and pointless scenes for 2 l o n g hours!

Like others have said, if you're expecting a piece of cinematic art history from a Michael Bay film, you're living your life wrong. BUT, if you're expecting a great popcorn action flick, you can't go wrong with this movie.Also, if you're unable to follow the film (as some reviews mentioned), I would advise maybe sticking with kids movies or something. This movie is great, and action-packed, but it's by NO means complicated.
Full, full, full of action! Funny and great acting. Took a bit to get the story line because of the time jumping but turned out to be an awesome movie!
We saw an old story with same action scences , unbeliveble reactions and there were lost of unimaginable mistakes

reviews.review_title: A follow to this would be fantastic!
reviews.content: Watched with no background of the movie. It left me wanting more as a movie like this should. Fast pace, funny one liners, wild rollercoaster of a movie. Strap in and have fun!

Lets make one thing clear, this isn't pride and prejudice nor is it the kings speach.
This is an action packed movie that just keeps giving. Perfect to sit down, watch and enjoy. You don't have to think about this movie which is why its so good, its funny, it's got guns lots of guns, crazy stunts and much more.
The people who rate this movie 2/10, 3/10 clearly don't know a good movie when they see one and have ridiculous high expectations for something so simple. Don't let these reviews fool you, it's a good film, a must see when chilling with a beer, pizza, Chinese or an indian.
Enjoy guys and girls.
Deserve a sequel. A Nice action movie with potential for more
Great movie! My favorite movie so far. This is well worth your time! Enjoy

reviews.review_title: Chaos, funny, weird cuts, a lot of action, and not so great story
reviews.content: This is a Sunday night movie to watch with either the boys or a significant other and enjoy a crazy action packed movie. Micheal bay is clearly written all over this movie and his action sequences are on steroids! Although it's hard to agree with some of the choices in the movie, it's still fun to watch. Expect to laugh, cringe at some death scenes, and say wtf a lot.Ps this might have one of the craziest car chases I ever seen in a movie.

So I only got about 20 minutes in. I really can't stand movies where there are so many inconsistencies in filming that it takes away from any realism at all. If the car has been running into other cars and people and is all scratched up, why does it look new every other scene? If the driver is wearing a hat, why does it pop on and off every other scene? If there's blood all over people, why does it disappear every other scene? Couldn't get past this stuff to see if it was fun or not.
Boring. Tries to be funny but is not. Action scenes are ridiculously bad, exaggerated and let you fall asleep because they seem to never and or create any sort of tension.

reviews.review_title: You Cannot have Deadpool... In all movies.
reviews.content: Movies is great... Action, car chasing amazing... Infact I noticed car chazes have something new that's people falling out of cars.. I didn't see this in fast and furious series.... No reason to give this movie less rating. Yeah story is bit exaggerated.. Bit out of context. But it's far better than a lot of movies... Great entertainer.
This is not movie,this is advertisement,they shot commercials
STFU to all the haters that might have half a brain. This movie was fun and action packed from start to finish. 2 hours of my time well spent.

reviews.review_title: Stupid as usual, but ok with no brain
reviews.content:
I mean "hello?" it's Michael Bay. He stands for "no brain action movies".
Since my brain went into stand by after it had raged over many many cutting issues during the first 10 minutes taking car chase, it was a solid Friday night popcorn movie. Ok, don't get to deep in the dialogues or expect music which fits the scene, but some ideas were really refreshing like the hostage escape with the pool on the roof. I really liked that scene how the sniper helped his team mate in the pool to suck in some air while being under water in the pool by shooting an "ventilation hole" in the glass of the barrier.
I was saying anxious for weeks waiting firbrhus movie. First 30 mins infoubd myself saying, keep watching, just keep watching, nope, I'm done. That was pretty bad.

reviews.review_title: Knock Off Fast and the Furious
reviews.content: I generally like Michael Bay and Ryan Reynolds movies. However this has a lot to be desired. It's like a knock off fast and the furious, with no plot line and bad jokes.

This is a movie for people with Attention Deficit Disorder. Its herky jerky cinematography is a complete distraction. It borders on annoying. Typical Michael Bay, honestly. Ryan Reynolds is like able, when you can hear what he's saying.

reviews.review_title: What did you expect from a MIchael Bay movie?
reviews.content: By clicking play you agree to turn your brain off and enjoy the show. Better than Transformers.
What Bay can do best: mimic old John Woo movies. And of course Nice FX, and no script
THE BEST MOVIE. hopefully the sequel will become official.

This movie honestly was the best, it's effects, music, actors, comedy, all in one. everyone hating and saying it's slot of killing this is probably not your movie genre.hopefully a sequel is coming. i'm going to keep looking forward for it. :)
Funny in just the right places at just the right times. Full of kickass action and a great selection of characters. Hope there's another one in the making soon.

Im am hanging up!!! 3 alfa romeo car! First one,drivers mirror break,second one has no mirror,last one was without any problem!! Just in one scene!!
Many problems in this movie!! OMG!!!

I couldnt get any sort of satisfaction because I had no idea what was happening. The first scene prompted a new view into probably one of the biggest movies to hit Netflix with an all star cast and budget. However it moves almost as fast as the action. To much to soon. Had they slowed down and focused on the story this might have been more of an enjoyable watch. The acting and action is great I just couldnt keep up with it.

Loads of action. Plenty of girls in underwear. Up skirt shots. (Me too?) Loads of gratuitous dead body shots. The editing though! Was there even an editor in this film? It's was awful! Continuity could have been better if they just put all the bits they filmed randomly in to the editing suite, hit compile on the move and did nothing else! Also when was the Yas Marina circuit and hotel in Las Vegas?Funny in parts. RR good as ever! But the editing!
I can help but wonder to whom this movie is targeted.
What a mess of a movie, kept flipping today from last to future but still not explain much.
Come on people it was fun )))) just relax and watch !

reviews.review_title: Great story! Awesome visuals! Perfect cast!
reviews.content: I read a lot of reviews saying that the movie was confusing and just filled with explosions and car chases.I wholeheartedly disagree. The story was great. It made me think of the meme about how there is so many real billionaires, and not one has decided to become Batman. I completely agree with it's premise.So this movie really stood out to me. No caped crusader. But instead we get the witty and talented Ryan Reynolds as Number One. Leading a well-chosen cast in a funny but emotional, high octane, superbly directed and shot film. That I would have paid to see in a theater, and would have enjoyed to rewatch on Netflix!To all the naysayers this is a movie that's about the car chases, and explosions and death-defying stunts that we've come to love from Michael Bay. No one really does it with the grandeur that he does. I hope it becomes a franchise.

reviews.review_title: Great... For first fifteen minutes, after that don't bother!
reviews.content:
Really looked forward to this movie, however with 45 mins left of this flick I am that bored and confused I'm now writing this review! The opening 15 mins were great, I'm here thinking this is another Deadpool style action comedy, however 1 hour 30 in, the only comedy is the plot and script, it's just friggin awful. I am so bored by it, this is an insomniacs cure! $150mil budget, someone been taken for a ride!
Don't know yet how the film ends, but quite frankly I don't care, I have for the last 20 mins been clock watching to see how long is left before it's over, feels a bit like I am on death row just waiting for the hangman to release the trap, please Netflix, stop this awful attempt at making movies, it's just painful! Ryan, seriously! This is how you wish your career to go?
6 Underground? I'd prefer it being the whole cast underground, on the premise they never ever resurface!

reviews.review_title: Hat, no hat, hat, no hat
reviews.content: First 15 minutes of the film Dave Franco has his hat on and off every second scene, super annoying and terrible attention to detail by the creators. Also the side mirror on the drivers side is also on and off and on and off through out the car chase... please guys it should've been so easy to choose someone's costume and clearly in the crash with the truck the mirror got scratched off and then only moments later it's on again ...
I love it... The story, Ryan its just great and fun and like Deadpool fun😍

This movie defines our current generation. Product placement out of the ass, non stop action with a zoomed shaking camera, non existent plot and a lot of attempts at humor.
It's as if a popular youtuber made an action movie for the zoomer audience with ADHD.
It's awful. Loved it.

reviews.review_title: An overall mess of a movie, but some pretty great performances
reviews.content: This movie is, for lack of a better word, a mess. It moves from over the top action scene to flashback and it's never in the right order. Michael Bay proves nothing from this movie. An absolute fantastic movie to play in the background and not pay attention to.On the other hand performances from Reynolds playing "one" is just the right over the top to make this movie watchable. Along with Reynolds surprisingly good performances from Ben Hardy and Corey Hawkins. Unfortunately Bay continues to miss use any female actress, but they do what they can with what there given. One of my personal favorite performances is the odd ball Manuel Garcia-Ruflo. Whenever he's on screen I found myself laughing.

Found 2 significant mistakes in the film1. In the beginning when blood shoots out of the wound in the car onto her face, the next 2 cuts, the blood is gone, then a little comes back later. Bad editing
2. At 45:15, the cars that were all significantly shot up , scattered in the middle of the road, somehow park themselves in a perfect row on the side of the road next cut.There has to be more. I am only this far in the film and had to start posting

I'm not sure what this movie was trying to be. For some time it wants to be serious, for other it's more of a parody of action movies.
The action, shooting and explosions in this movie are terribly overused. The plot is chaotic and naive.
Overall I feel like this movie was created by some 12yo boy trying to be cool.
Funny and lots of action. I had to watch it twice.

reviews.review_title: Its what made movies like Bad boys great
reviews.content:
Making good movies comes down to
Plot/acting/cgi(special effects)/decent scrore/producerThis being an action movie the producers got it right.
Fast paced, editing great. How many times we see a good plot and the producers over kill the movie by either adding a terrible score/ slowing down the movie scenes with slow motion etc.Michael Bay gets full marks for his touch of magic.The cast was great and story telling was great also.One can not add new plots these days as with so many movies how do you add a new spin to movies.Rather use the ingredients of a good movie and just perform the magic. When you try to over compensate these ingredients, movies usually fall short.With 6 underground as an ardent movie fan I thought they ticked all the boxes and delivered a great package.The opening scene was fast paced great car scene and driving at its best. Many movies like fast and furious etc go overkill on cgi/special effects and forget what makes people come to the movies for their love of cars. They over compensate and make the movie scene humanly impossible And kill a good story line.6 Underground had the underpinnings of a great movie
Decent plot, story line and great action. There was never a dull moment. Really liked it sadly it never played on IMAX (or big screen) where it would have truly shined.I was fortunate enough to watch it on a projector with Dolby atmos soundbar which added the cinema effect.Thank you Netflix for this great movie in my opinion shines like the good old classics such as bad boys.

Visually it has some crazy scenes in there keeping you well entertained, but spending half the film narrative going back and forth in time was a little annoying. It passes the time but not a memorable watch and certainly not one I'd watch again.
Great movie. Its Michael Bay and Ryan Reynolds so it is exactly what we expected.

None of the actors or actresses were needed for this film. The story/plot was bad a$$, standing on it's own. A slasher film without killings wouldn't make much sense. A disney film with out a hero to love, feel bad for or cheer for wouldn't fit the Disney brand. That is what this movie was missing - nudity (male or female). Why would the line not be pushed..... Instead duck, cover -run. Dont watch this ......

Super comedy and action
Not boring my favorite movie

Ok so the action sequences were great and truth be told I thoroughly enjoyed the movie. HOWEVER I think it just missed. I believe it couldve just been tweaked here and there and made that little bit better. There is no doubt that major money was spent and the action scenes were at times mind blowing which id expect no less from Michael Bay, but sometimes it felt like it didn't know if it wanted to be an action comedy or a heart wrenching action thriller. Yes I laughed and I also shed a tear and to be honest im not sure what I really wanted the film to be, but I just felt like it was missing something or had too much of something. All in all I did enjoy the film immensely and look forward to an amazing sequel.

Like a bad, low budget, failed Michael Bay parody. If you ever thought Michael Bay had many explosions before, this movie will top it easily. Except they couldnt afford it so they went with lots of bad fireworks in almost every scene.
2 metal beam dont explode when they hit each other! And cars dont roll over, break in the middle and explode because they go off the road!

Too much explosion. I know, this is Michael Bay we are talking about, but shill, too much.
Story is messy. It's like someone want to tell you a 4-hour story, but he only has 20 minutes. So he got panic, grabbed what he could remember and told you that part of the story. Some are necessary to the whole story, some are just not.

reviews.review_title: Action. Comedy. Hold your breath scenes.
reviews.content: Ignore the poor reviews. If you like an action movie with a comedy twist just watch it. It's polished, shows off some remarkable locations and gives you constant edge of your seat moments. Loved it!

Unfortunately, the film is completely over-stylized. As a result, the story is so fragmented that it becomes long-winded. And history teaches that killing the dictator is not enough. For a film that is all about a stylish shootout, should be choosen a plot that is more simple-minded.

This is a comedy..........of errors2slow2 ripmeoff is more like it........Netflix dropped a stinker as this is nothing but a long winded same old that's been on an empty minded run for 20 years..........But they spent millions as there's an actual audience for this rubbish, thoughtless drivel......

reviews.review_title: Most incredible stunt rigging and chase scenes ever
reviews.content: As a movie, the storyline is kind of all over the place. Ryan Reynolds is brilliant. At times it seems the movie makes fun of itself, but if you like stunts, chase scenes . Lifestyles of the rich a d famous, and like to see bad guys die, tune in.

... With plenty of anti Trump Hollywood dogma
Don't take it seriously, it's fun just wish they'd take the bs out
A lot of action. It's non stop. But I think that's to hide the fact that there's a not great storyline?

reviews.review_title: A gem of a film hiding from greatness
reviews.content: Great set pieces ruined by mr Bay's incessant fast cut edit. Humour abounds and there's some great action, however some scenes would have been much better if edited differently. Whatever plot there is, is so disjointed it's difficult to follow. Every great action film is always able to tie scenes together, and why bother with a flashback opening which then is brought up to a final date, only to dip into the past again. Enjoyable...Could have been been great with a bit of film making
Lil over the hill... should have reduced the damage to make it appealing.. but ok can digest ..

reviews.review_title: Fun, better when watching with friends
reviews.content:
Watching movies entertaining the slow-motion, jumping, and fire scenes quite similar to Fast & Furious. Kill people piercing, exploding head.
Conclusion: watching over 18 years old, should only focus on entertainment is the main story, not much story

I didn't know that instagram's algorithm was capable to write, direct and produce a movie. It's an empty movie that just keeps itself standing thanks to explosions, asses, bad editing and a totally wrong and dangerous social message

reviews.review_title: One of the best movies I've ever watched.
reviews.content: I totally love this movie. I don't know why they don't gave good rating.
Its got the action and the fun. Actors are good. Two hours of fun
Love it, everything was on Point, just that the driver die too early, Nice cars
Ehhh. Nahhhh superBay pictures 10/10, story 4/10, cuts 5/10.
Top notch action film! Very comparable to Mission Impossible. Best movie I've seen this year after Endgame. Hoping for a sequel.

reviews.review_title: If you're bored go for it
reviews.content: This may not even be the first editing error but within 5 minutes during the first car chase he gets a mirror knocked off and then 3 seconds later the car is in perfect condition. I'm excited to see what other errors there will be, so far just a generic action flick with lots of explosions and cheesy cool-guy lines.

reviews.review_title: Better if it was a TV show or a second movie was made
reviews.content: I think it was a very good movie. I am upset that Dave Franco got barely any airtime, I think people would've liked it a lot more if he did. Also with this type of movie you need a second movie and to get to know the characters more. It would've done super well as a tv show in my opinion, where they choose people to take down (kind of like the blacklist) and have different episodes on it. Overall i would recommend in hopes of a second movie to back it up. Has some laughable moments too!

FROM THE FIRST SECOUND TOTAL FUN!!!!
ENJOYED THE CONCEPT AND ALL THE ACTION
My hubbie and I watched this movie and thought it was great fun. Ryan Reynolds has really found his niche.

Movie just showed actual picture of world we live in.
Gas bombing, wars , dictators and middle east power.
Based on true stories and facts. For those who didn't see outside their home, they only see window and they small screens this is just a movie and other who saw the world will understand this movie story.
Job Well Done!

reviews.review_title: Not your usual big budget action film. A must see
reviews.content: Loved this. I laughed, I winced, I enjoyed the pyrotechnics and it was sexy. The casting was brilliant. Dave Franco did a cameo. It also had the BEST soundtrack. What more could you want?

And incredibly entertaining, you not gonna find amazing dialogues or perfect storytelling, you gonna find the exact opposite, jokes without a sense and people who gonna make actions without any meaning. And still, you gonna watch it, cause you gonna laught and look at all of the crazy thing that gonna happen on your TV, cause is entertaining. A lot.

This movie is action packed and keeps you on edge but I found myself feeling utterly confused the whole time. The first half hour of the movie felt very rushed and not making much sense. As the movie goes on some gaps get filled in but I felt there was just too much left unexplained. Also the first "heist" scene was very poorly executed between frames (ie. Bullet holes disappearing, car damage disappearing/appearing, unexplained scene changes and no defining dialog). However I enjoy every Ryan Reynolds sarcastic joke and seeing Dave Franco so that won this review a few extra stars.

This movie was just all around awesome! From the cast to the plot to the director and editing. Great action packed movie that starts out crazy and never slows down. I could watch it a hundred times and still never get tired of it. 10 🌟 all day long

I get rather mad when continuity isn't there, hat no hat. Head out window nothing out window, and thats all within 5 minutes. Action sure far far fetched yep. Reynolds is mint as usual. Franco I'm glad he didn't last long seemed outside his acting realm being a driver. I could go on if I finished the movie .
It's a good entertaining movie. I like the underlying message of the movie.

reviews.review_title: Really exciting movie , definitely watch it
reviews.content: What a movie , alittle confusing at first but the actions scenes are the best i have ever seen. So realistic.Story line is brilliant too and looking forward to number 2 already.... stop looking at the reviews and just watch it .. you will not regret it
Best Action movie ever! The graphics, the details, the intensity! It was a fun watch and I wish I had more!

Took me a couple times of watching it to fully understand and grasp the concept of the movie, but after that I haven't stopped watching. It is my go-to movie when I'm bored at home and in need of a good watch.

reviews.review_title: One of the best Movie for me !!!
reviews.content: I have seen lot of thriller and action movies but this one i saw it thrice within two days. I just love how everyone from different world using their skills to rob. I recommend this movie to watch at least once.
I really hope we get a second part with another crazy mission.

reviews.review_title: Overblown high budget action with awful story and terrible screenplay
reviews.content: We're the action scenes well shot? Yes. Were the special effects good? Absolutely! Did it have a good cast? Yes to that as well! Was it enough to keep it interesting and worth watching? Unfortunately, no.It has the effects and action of a high budget blockbuster and of course a great cast (Reynolds, I'm especially looking at you), but it just wasn't enough to be captivating. The story was awful and the plot was terrible, the execution of the plot, even worse. They are out to get rid of the bad people who kill innocent people but leave hundreds of civilians and policemen dead in the wake of their actions. How does that make sense?It fails as a spy movie, it fails as a thriller because there's nothing thrilling about the story, the storyline is far too clunky and jagged. The execution is horrendous. Half the movie goes in backstory and it still feels like it's in the introduction phase, and a bad one at that. Screenplay feels like a parody, consisting of meme-like scenes and lines. There is no character development and what little potential is shown is never really brought to fruition.I understand that a lot of people do like mindless action movie, and I suppose this one does fit the requirements for something like that. However it does feel like a lazy piece of work when you think of the far better potential outcomes that it could have had. The whole movie feels like an amalgamation of an extended music video, a parody and a meme compilation.Half a star for the well shot action scenes and visual effects, the remaining star and a half for Ryan Reynolds and the rest of the cast.

reviews.review_title: Feels like an AI wrote this movie
reviews.content: I'm about half way through watching this movie and I felt compelled to make an IMDB account and review it because I've been tortured enough. I came in with low expectations but evidently not low enough. Mindless action scenes (all the unnecessary parkour??), jokes that are devoid of any humor, zero character development, and a plot that's not worth the paper it was written on. This whole movie feels like something generated by AI based on the following prompts: "parkour, explosions, fast car, Ryan Reynolds, bang bang, bad guy". The only reason this movies on the radar is cause they cast Ryan Reynolds.

They found them and killed them all to find out where one of the two brothers whoms dad lead Turkistan. The evil brother came to the throne and locked away the democracy loving brother so he wouldnt have competition. The evil brother was an asshole so the team decided to give him a not so fantastic day. They blew up all statues of him as well as put the nice brother back on the throne and threw the evil one out from a helicopter from like 20 feet so the people of the country could beat him.
